image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested in the Goblet squat with Kettlebell.

How to make the Goblet squat with Kettle: 1: Place a kettlebell at the top of your chest.Hold the handles of the kettle with both hands.
2: Your feet will be spaced the width of the shoulders (or slightly superior), and oriented slightly outwards.
3: Take a great inspiration and descend by pushing the hips back and simultaneously folding the knees.
4: Continue the descent until the fold of your hips is lower than your knees.
5: Go up by pushing your feet into the ground, stretching your knees and hips until you are again in a high position.Exhale.
6: Repeat this movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: If you have trouble making squats with a bar, this is the best version to help you work the squat vertically.
A dowters Kettlebell squat with Kettlebell will cause better leg development, because adductors will then be involved in the movement.
Always keep your elbows noted to maintain a better balance.

A certain translation of the knees forward compared to the toes is acceptable provided that the knees do not deviate excessively inward or outside.People whose femur is longer will have to let their knees come further forward if they want to remain straight.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with Australian pulls with suspension straps.

How to make Australian pulls with suspen: 1: Attach the suspension straps to a height of hook and adjust the length of the straps so that they arrive about your hips.
2: Lie under the straps, the heels on the ground, then enter the handles with a pronation.
3: Concentrate to keep your whole body from head to toe, in a straight line, while looking at the ceiling.
4: Initiate the movement by contracting the back muscles, pulling the shoulder blades back and bringing them closer to each other, so as to bring your chest back to the handles.
5: Drive slowly until your arms are stretched, holding your body in a straight line.
6: Repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: To protect your shoulders and for effective effort, it is very important to maintain the scapular retraction throughout the movement.
Focus on the contraction of glutes and abdominals so as not to let your basin sag.
For more comfort, do not hesitate to wedge your feet on a support or against a wall to help you do not slide.

To solicit the muscles on different angles and therefore for a more complete muscle development, do not hesitate to alternate with supination and neutral taking (palm of the hands face to face).This is the advantage of the straps, unlike a fixed bar.Keeping the palms face to face (neutral socket) and the elbows near the torso makes it possible to target the large backbone muscles more.If the palms are turned towards the ground and the elbows are apart from the body, the rear deltoids, the trapezius and the rhomboids will be more contacted.
Try to make a maximum contraction at the top of the movement in order to recruit a maximum of muscle fibers.
It is easy to vary the intensity of the exercise, because doing it with a shorter length of straps will make the exercise easier, while a longer length will make muscle work more intense.
To increase the difficulty of the exercise as much as possible, you can place your feet on a support like a bench, in order to have a larger part of your body weight to be towed.
If the exercise is still too easy for you.Do not hesitate to wear a weighted vest or ask a training partner to add bodybuilding discs on your belly!

Training advice.caption: Australian pull -ups with raised feet to intensify the exercise.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked for the suspended knee survey.

How to make the suspended knee survey?: 1: Enter a fixed bar in height, with a spacing of the hands slightly higher than the width of the shoulders.
2: You must use a pronation, that is to say that your palms must be turned outwards when you enter your bar.
3: Return the thighs closer to each other, and bring the navel to the interior of the body.
4: Once you have found your balance and the lower back is flat, slowly bring your knees to the chest, taking care to put the heels up at the hips.
5: Once the knees are practically at the chest, take a break and contract the abdominals as much as possible.
6: With total control, slowly go down your knees and legs.
7: Be sure not to lose tension in your abdominal strap and back so that you can control the body position and avoid swinging back and forth.
8: Arrived in the starting position, do not release your abs and directly carry out the following rehearsal and so on until you finish your series.

9: If you lose your coordination and/or do not manage to keep control over the full amplitude of the movement, you will start to swing, which will degrade your technique and decrease the interest of the exercise.
10: Don't forget to breathe!As with all the abdominal exercises, exhale for contraction and inspire at the time of extension.

Advice for the suspended knee survey: The rise of the suspended knees can be carried out using a tempo (cadence) in order to increase the time under tension, to promote better consciousness and better body control and to improve the muscle activation of the abs.To do this, simply put your knees slowly to a given cadence (2-5 seconds), add a slight break to the top (2-5 seconds), then descend the knees without losing tension (2-5seconds).

The addition of a dumbbell, a balloon or any other kind of light load between the feet is an excellent way to add resistance to this movement.The knee climbs suspended with weight make it possible to develop the strength and volume of the abdominals.
If you want to add speed, go quickly to the climb, take a break at the top and slowly bring your knees back to the starting position while maintaining the contraction.

Focus on the feeling of contraction throughout the amplitude of movement.Do not try to cheat to reach a high number of repetitions.If you feel that your abdominals heat up at the end of your series, you have probably carried out the exercise properly.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked for the squat on a bench.

How to do the squat on a bench?: 1: Install an ordinary flat bench behind you.
2: Placez une barre de weight training sur vos trapèzes supérieurs, légèrement au-dessus des épaules, et empoignez bien la barre.
3: Adopt a spacing of the feet of the shoulder width.Contract the abdominal muscles, open your chest and keep the lower eight back.
4: Inspire then initiate the squat by folding the hips and knees.When your buttocks touch the bench, push on your heels to get up.Exhale at the end of the movement.
5: Keep your abdominal belt tight and your right back throughout the exercise.
6: Repeat the exercise until you have done the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Do not switch too much behind to the point of disengaging the hips.
In high position, keep a slight knee bending to keep the tension on the leg muscles.
As with all flexion movements on the legs, do not rotate your knees inward or outside: they will have to stay in the heel-tie axis throughout the exercise.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the lifting of earth with deficit.

How to make the lifting of earth with de: 2: Position yourself just in front of the bar, with the middle of the foot under the bar.Your posture must be high, with the feet apart from the width of the epaules.Your shoulders must be directly above your hips with a neutral position of the head and neck.
3: Distribute the weight of your body evenly over the whole feet to obtain good stability.Your arms must remain tense on the sides.

4: Make a hip bending and start to flex your knees to lower your body to the bar.Your tibias must be in contact with the bar while remaining straight.Your hips will have to be a little lower than in the standard version.

5: Enter the bar with a pronation.While maintaining a neutral position of the spine, keep the bar near your body and start your movement by pushing your feet in the ground.Starting to get up, contract your glutes and let your hips move forward.
6: While your hips advance, keep your arms stretched and finish the movement upwards by contracting your glutes.Your shoulders must arrive directly above your hips.
7: Start the descent movement with a neutral spine and switch your hips until the bar reaches your knees.Let your hips and knees flex and go down the bar to the ground.
8: Une fois que les disques de weight training atteignent le sol, vous avez terminé la répétition. Faites une courte pause et remettez-vous en position avant de commencer la prochaine répétition.

Training advice: The first thing you need to do is determine how much you want to raise yourself (the height of the deficit).This will largely depend on your mobility.If you don't have much mobility and flexibility in the hips and back, you will not be able to use a very high platform.If this is your case, start with a 5 cm board.
Use an adapted board or bodybuilding discs.Just make sure the surface does not move from the ground and that it is very flat.

Choose the appropriate load for this exercise.Lifting a deficit load is more difficult than lifting a load from the ground.Due to the greater amplitude of movement and the more difficult starting position, you will not be able to lift so much weight.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked for the suspended legs.

How to make the suspended leg release?: 1: Once you are suspended, stretch the median section.While keeping the legs straight, lift them slowly.You should lift your legs as high as possible.
2: Once you are suspended, contract the abdominal muscles to raise your legs while keeping them tense.
3: Raise your legs as high as possible.
4: Slowly go down your legs in the starting position.
5: Repeat the movement as many times as you can or until you finish the number of planned rehearsals.

Training advice: The speed is very important in this exercise.If you swing your legs, the momentum created will help you set up your legs, to the detriment of your abs, which will not benefit much from the exercise.
Do not let your body swing for the same reason.Keep your chest as motionless and stable as possible.
Advanced practitioners can add a load (dumbbell for example) that they will hold between their feet.
Slowing down the descent makes it possible to maximize the work of the muscles (and to limit the momentum).So do not let your legs “fall” once they have brought them to the high position.
Exporging during the rise in the legs allows better contraction of the muscles of the abdominal strap.So breathe in during the legs.
If your level of strength allows it, go down your legs to the lower thirds of the movement and put your legs directly.This practice keeps a very large tension on the abdominal muscles.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested from the lateral elevations guided to the machine.

How to make side elevations to the machi: 1: Start by choosing the load you want to use on the machine for side elevations.
2: Adjust the height of the seat and sit on the machine seat, the feet flat on the ground, apart from the width of the shoulders.
3: Place your arms in the padding and enter the handles.Look straight ahead.You are now ready to start the exercise.
4: Keeping the bents to the bent and moving only the shoulders, start to raise the load until your forearms are just above the parallel.
5: Contract the muscles of your shoulders at the top of the movement and start to lower the load slowly using the same semi-circular movement that you used to mount it.
6: Repeat this movement to the desired number of repetitions.

Training advice: As it is an insulation movement, the technique is more important than the load itself.Check the load at any time to get better results.
Do not rest the load completely between each repetition to keep a continuous tension on the muscles.
If you are using a machine with plates as on the above illustration, take advantage of it to make degressive degrees of time.
Keep the body motionless throughout the movement.This limits the momentum and protect your back.To do this, always keep your abdominal strap well sheathed.
There is no point in putting your arms up beyond the parallel.

Training advice.caption: Lateral elevations with a hound machine.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the lotus.

How to make the lotus posture?: 1: Start by sitting on the ground, legs stretched in front of you with the heels in contact with the ground.Place your hands along your body while keeping the right spine.
2: Slowly spread the legs, keeping the heels on the ground.
3: Fold one leg and place it on the opposite thigh using the hands to bring your foot to you.Make sure that the sole of the foot is directed upwards and the heel as close as possible to the abdomen.
4: Do the same with the other leg so that both legs are crossed.

Training advice: Be sure to keep the right spine and the right head.
Breathe deeply and stay in this position for 2 to 3 minutes.

Do not let your feet get in reversal (the ankles rotate inward and the feet move inside your tibias).This may make your ankles suffer and cause a sprain!Avoid this by performing a plantar flexion and by making a greater lateral rotation of your hips.
You should avoid this posture if you have knee or ankle injuries.

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités aux écartés à la pulley haute.

Comment faire les \u00e9cart\u00e9s \u00: 1: Adjust the two pulleys as high as possible and select the desired load.
2: Enter the two handles with a neutral socket and keep your feet parallel.
3: Just place yourself between the two pulleys, the arms stretched on the side, the elbows slightly bent and the gaze directed forward, so that your body forms a “t” position.
4: Stay straight, the bust sheathed and only move the shoulder joint to bring the two handles closer to your body.
5: Return slowly to the starting position and repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Advice for dismissals in the high pulley: The eccentric is just as important as the concentric in this movement.
Do not tighten the handles that are too strong, as this can cause excessive recruitment of forearms and desbiceps, thus reducing the activation of thepectoral.
Avoid touching or hitting the handles against each other at the time of maximum contraction in order to maintain constant tension on the targeted muscle groups.
To optimize this exercise, be sure to perform it throughout the amplitude of movement.
Be sure to maintain a certain tension in your abs and do not let the bottom of your back arched excessively.

Since this is a monoarticular finishing exercise, there is no reason to use the slightest momentum, which would reduce the muscle stimulus.If you rely on common sense, the use of momentum decreases the tension of the muscle you are trying to work.

Which are the errors to avoid ?.title: The shoulders too forward
Which are the errors to avoid ?.description: This is the biggest error made by most people and it is linked to the use of an excessive load.If you notice that you are planning your shoulders forward when you do the exercise, you work your shoulders and your back, not your pectorals.Keep your shoulders back, your chest out, and your head high while you make your movement.

Which are the errors to avoid ?.title: Arms too folded
Which are the errors to avoid ?.description: Another big problem that we see regularly is excessive bending of the arms.Although it makes exercise easier, it makes it much less effective.So keep your arms with a slight bending, and if you have trouble moving the loads, use lighter weights.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the alternating heel touch.

How to make the alternating heel touch?: 1: Lie on the ground, arms along the body and the legs bent at an angle of about 90 degrees.
2: Turn your hips up from the upper body (backwards from the pelvis) and keep the lower back flat.
3: Lift your soles on the ground by contracting VosabdomailAnda and keep this position throughout the exercise;Keep your eye to the ceiling.
4: Start a hand to the side to touch your heel.Go back to the starting position, look at the other side and touch the other heel with your other hand.
5: Repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals for both sides.

Training advice: Hold the flat back position throughout the exercise to limit the tension in the lower back.
You must maintain a neutral position at the neck.Do not fit your chin at the top of your chest.
Each rehearsal must be slow and controlled.Concentrate more on obtaining a good contraction and a good stretching of the oblique muscles than on the number of repetitions made.
Perform 4 series of maximum repetitions with a minute of rest between the series.
It is possible to increase the difficulty of this cookie to the weight of the corpsen working with an elastic band.The latter will pass behind your back and each end on hold with your hands.
For an even more intense work, you can also exercise the heels on a declined bench.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the lifting of Romanian earth with Landmine.

How to get the lifting of Romanian earth: 1: Stand up with a bar between your legs and place the V Handle, placing both hands on the handle.
2: Standing, start the movement by moving your hips backwards and leaning forward until the bar is just below the height of the knees.
3: Return to the starting position by pushing with all the foot to go up.
4: Repeat this movement to the desired number of repetitions.

Training advice: Focus on pushing the floor to go up, as if you were pushing your feet on a thigh press.
Keep your arms stretched and do not round the bottom of your back.
The amplitude of movement in this exercise will be largely determined by everyone's mobility as well as by its ability to maintain a neutral spine.
If you do not have this handle available, you can do this exercise by intertwining your hands at the helm.
Your weight will naturally move to your heels when you flexion.However, it is important that your weight remains distributed over the whole of your foot and that you do not let your toes lift.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the unilateral shoulder developed with resistance strip.

How to make the developed unilateral sho: 1: Stand up with your foot on the same side as the one you want to work on the elastic.
2: Place your hand inside the upper part of the elastic, using it as a handle.
3: With your shoulder hand in the starting position, the palm turned forward, push the elastic up until your arm is stretched over your head.
4: Then go down the elastic in a controlled way to the starting position.
5: Repeat this movement until the number of repetitions fixed, then change aside.

Training advice: Focus on the feeling of contraction of the deltoid muscle and hold the tension temporarily at the top to obtain a contraction peak.To do this, do not lock the elbow joint which would reduce the tension.

The position of your hands can be turned forward (pronation) or you can use a neutral socket with the palms turned towards the head.You can even change the position of the hands during a repetition (from supination to pronation), which in fact developed Arnold.
To increase resistance, you can use a thicker elastic or two small elastic bands.

Lessries decrease an intensification technique aimed at extending a series and performing more repetitions with a lighter load.In the case of training with free loads, this is done by passing a lighter dumbbell pair than the previous one or removing discs from the bar.You can reproduce a degressive series during the developed shoulder with elastic by making a complete standing series, then passing to the development of half-knee shoulder.This amounts to reducing the load because the elastic is less tense in the kneeling variant.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the posture of the camel.

How to make the posture of the camel?: 1: Put yourself on your knees, spread them with the width of the hips, then put your toes.For beginners, you can start by folding the toes as on the illustration below.
2: Engage the inside of your thighs, enter the lower abdomen and bring the rear lessels back.
3: On an inspiration, lengthen the size of both sides, lift the chest.
4: With the well anchored lower body, on an expiration, start leaning backwards, keeping the high chest and without compressing the neck or lower back.
5: By leaning back, put your hands on your heels.
6: Keep the inside of the thighs engaged, enter the shoulder blades in the back and hold the posture for a few breaths.
7: Take advantage of an inspiration to help you go up, then sit on your heels with a spine in a neutral position.

Training advice: This posture is worth you to take your time to do it well.The main thing to avoid with Utrasana is to relax in the posture and to bring the weight of the back flexion to your neck or the bottom of your back.On the contrary, lift and lie down your chest before you gently ark in the posture.
If your hands do not reach your heels comfortably, use bricks on the sides of each foot or place your hands on your hips.
Try to place a brick between your thighs and tighten it to activate the inside of your thighs.
View you lift your sternum upwards.
If you feel tension or sensitivity in the neck, or if you feel dizzy, keep your neck in a neutral position or with the chin towards the chest so that the neck remains long and relaxed.
If you suffer from a back injury, a softer back posture, such as the Cobraou of the sphinx, can be more suitable.
Helps shoulders and upper back mobility;
Stretches the whole front of the body;
Strengthens the legs and back;
Improves your posture;
Energizes the body and the mind.

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités avec les élévations des calves au Donkey.

Comment faire les \u00e9l\u00e9vations d: 1: Placez-vous dans la machine à lever les calves en plaçant le bas du dos et les hanches sous le levier rembourré de l’appareil. Votre sacrum doit être en contact avec le coussin.

2: Place your arms on the side handles and place the soles on your feet on the calf tray.Your heels must be in extension.Place your toes forward and stretch your legs without locking them.This is the starting position.

3: Lift your heels by expiring by extending your ankles as high as possible.Contract your calves.Make sure the knees remain motionless throughout the movement.Hold this position for a second before going back down.
4: Revenez lentement à la position de départ en inspirant. Abaissez vos talons en pliant vos chevilles jusqu’à ce que vos calves soient étirés.
5: Repeat the exercise until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: If you want to work the internal part of the calf muscle (Legastrocnemienne), you should point your feet outwards.
If you want to work outside the calf muscle (the lateral gastrocnemian), direct your toes inward.
You must be able to put yourself completely on tiptoe during the climb.If you cannot get up completely, the charge is too heavy and you do not take advantage of the exercise as much as possible.
Maximizing stretching in the low position is much more important than lifting an overly heavy load.

Although the most commonly recommended range of repetitions to induce muscular hypertrophy is 8 to 12 repetitions, some athletes prefer to use and respond better to higher repetition ranges when they drive their calves.Series of 15 to 20 repetitions may be what you need to make a group of stubborn muscles.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked with the rowing bust leaning with elastic.

How to do the rowing bust leaning with e: 1: Start the movement by placing yourself on a strip of resistance, the feet apart from the width of the shoulders, the toes pointing slightly outwards.
2: Fold the knees lightly and switch the hips forward.Hold the trunk and flat back throughout the movement.
3: By focusing on your elbows, pull the handles from the elastic band backwards, bringing your shoulder blades closer.Maintain the contraction and slowly return to the starting position.
4: Perform the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: The elastic must be stretched from the start of the movement.So catch your elastic so as to put it in tension in the low position.
Keep your elbows near the body.If you spread your elbows during rowing movement, you will involve your posterior deltoids more.
Do not round your back.Keep the abdominals committed to protect the bottom of your back.

A very frequent error is the internal rotation of the shoulder.This position will not allow you to obtain better contraction and make movement much less effective, in addition to submitting your rotator head to additional stress, which can cause long -term injury.
It is possible to increase the intensity of the effort by doubling the elastic.However, it may be necessary to use a thicker elastic so that the resistance is not too large.
Always perform each movement with a slow and controlled rhythm, avoiding sudden or jerky movements throughout the exercise.
Do not forget to synchronize your breathing by slowly inspiring the descent and slowly expiring the rise (during the effort).

The number of repetitions and series that a person must perform depends on their strength, endurance and level of practice of each.For beginners, it is recommended to start with 2 sets of 12 repetitions per series, increasing the number of series and going to thicker elastics over time.

Training advice.caption: Rowing with elastic can also be carried out with a neutral socket (palm of the hands face to face) in order to vary muscle recruitment.

name: Eka Pada Urdhva Dhanurasana (wheel posture on one leg)

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the wheel posture on one leg.

How to make the wheel posture on one leg: 1: Start by lengthening on your back, bent knees, to take the wheel posture.
2: Place your hands on each side of your head, your fingers turned towards the Epauleset the elbows pointed upwards.
3: Lift your hips, then press your hands to raise yourself in the wheel posture.
4: Move your weight on your right foot and raise your left knee, then stretch your toes to the ceiling.
5: Hold this posture for 2 or 3 breaths, then return to the wheel position.Repeat on the other side.

Training advice: Make sure you spend enough time to warm up, go slowly and get used to the wheel posture before you start.

Your upper leg is in flexion and your lower leg is in extension.However, the basin must remain horizontal and your spine must bend back without any torsion movement.Rotation of the spine during a deep rear flexion can tire the lower back.

Discarding your hands a little more can help you keep your balance on one leg.By centering your foot on the ground, you will get a triangular base increasing more stability in posture, which will allow you a greater amplitude of motion.

name: Extensions des calves debout à la machine

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités aux extensions des calves debout à la machine.

Comment faire les extensions des calves: 1: Adjust the sideboard according to your size.
2: Go under the hold and place the soles of your feet on the platform, the toes pointing straight in front of you, letting the heels hang back.
3: Tendez les hanches et les genoux afin de soulever la cale pour les épaules.Abaissez les talons en dorsifléchissant les chevilles jusqu’à ce que les calves soient complètement étirés.
4: Straighten the ankles and exhale by bending the muscles of the calves.
5: Repeat this movement to the number of repetitions planned.

Training advice: Perform slow and controlled rehearsals.Limit the momentum and take a break at the top to accentuate the contraction.
If you feel pain or pressure on the back of the knee joint, keep a slight knee bending and avoid a complete blockage.
Furthermore, if the knee is not completely locked, make sure that the position does not change for the duration of the rehearsal.
Limit the depth of the heels if you feel any stretch of the sole of the foot during the exercise.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with rowing with dumbbells.

Comment faire le rowing avec dumbbells ?: 1: Enter a pair of dumbbells, then flex the knees and switch your pool to put you in the inclined starting position, in which the upper body is almost parallel to the ground.
2: Avec les dumbbells tenus bras tendus, en gardant le dos droit et en maintenant la flexion des genoux, remontez les dumbbells jusqu’au niveau du ventre ou de la cage thoracique.
3: Tighten the shoulder blades against each other at the top and contract the large dorsals and upper back muscles.
4: Redescendez lentement les dumbbells jusqu’à la position de départ.
5: Repeat the movement until you have finished the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Keep the abdominal muscles contracted for the duration of the movement.

The row of two dumbbells can be carried out with a pronation, neutral socket or supination (reversed).You can even change the position of your hands halfway, starting in pronation and ending in a neutral position.Note that the most natural position of the hands for many people is halfway between the position in pronation and the neutral position.

Periodically changing the position of the hands can contribute to a more complete development of the back.However, you can see that a special socket allows you to feel better muscle contraction than others.You may also find an outlet that you prefer because it is in a perfect “furrow”, perfectly suited to your body, and that it relieves all the concerned joints, including the wrists, the Epauleset the bottom ofback.Do not force yourself to use a hand position that does not suit you.

The pronation, with the elbow elbows, makes the upper back work more, and in particular the upper trapezius and the rear deltoids.The neutral taking more active the great dorsals, the rhomboids and the middle of the back.Supination also acts the dorsals, rhomboids and backgrounds, and allows biceps to work more.
Note that neutral socket is one of the most popular variants and perhaps the easiest to start.
Focus on tightening the shoulder blades against each other and contracting the upper back muscles at the top.Keep your arms relaxed and consider your hands and arms like simple hooks.
Do not use absolutely no swinging or shaking movement to help you make your rehearsals.
If you have a history of low back pain, all rowing exercises should be done with care and with a perfect technique.
Holding a fraction of a second in high position and strongly contracting the large backbone muscles (maximum contraction technique) is one of the best intensity techniques to use with this exercise.

Training advice.caption: This variant of rowing with dumbbells with rotation makes it possible to obtain an even greater amplitude of motion.

name: Vertical extensions of one arm with dumbbell

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the vertical extensions of an arm with a dumbbell.

How to make the vertical extensions of a: 1: Take a dumbbell and sit at the end of a flat bench, the dumbbell resting on your thighs.
2: Hold the dumbbell with a pronation (palm turned towards your feet) with your right hand and lift the dumbbell above your head until your arm is completely tense.
3: By folding only the elbow, slowly go down the dumbbell behind your head until it is roughly at your ear.
4: Contract the muscle at the back of the arm (brachial triceps) to reassemble the dumbbell in the starting position.
5: Do not lock your elbow in a high position and start the movement again until you have reached the number of repetitions desired.
6: Repeat this exercise with your left arm.

Training advice: Start with a light load to assess your ability to control the load.
Keep a slow pace and control the dumbbell throughout the series.
Concentrate to move the load with your triceps without moving the rest of the body.

An error often made during triceps extensions with dumbbells is to make partial removal, which reduces your capacity to effectively develop the muscle mass of triceps.Use a mirror if necessary, or ask a friend to tell you if you have made a complete triceps extension.

You can do this standing exercise, with the feet apart from the width of the epaules.Keep your knees flexible.The posture is essential in this movement, especially since the weight will be behind your head: so make sure that Vosabdomine is committed throughout the exercise.

Training advice.caption: You can immobilize your right arm by placing your left hand on your elbow.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked for the thigh press.

How to make the thigh press?: 1: Sit on the thigh press machine, your back well-plated against the folder.

2: Place your feet on the plate or resistance support.Your feet should be removed from the width of the hips or slightly more spaced.Your whole foot must be in contact with the resistance surface, ensuring above all to keep the heel well anchored.Your legs should form an angle of 90 degrees.
3: Enter the handles to stabilize your upper body.
4: Push strongly with your legs to move the weight battery.Your legs should be stretched and your knees slightly folded, and your shoulders should be above your hips.
5: While keeping the leg alignment, start the reverse movement by slowly folding the hips and knees.
6: Go down until your legs form an angle of 90 degrees.Take a second break in the low position.

Training advice: It is possible to choose the leg muscles you want to request by changing the position of your feet.If your feet are placed lower on the tray, your quadriceps will be more contacted.For greater activation of hamstrings and glutes, place your feet higher on the footrest.
Push with the heels if you want to increase the work of the glutes.
To solicit the quadriceps more, push with tip point.
Do not lock the knees in a high position.This will protect your joints, but also to keep a certain tension on the quadriceps.
Keep the lower back flat against the backrest throughout the movement.
Maintain a neutral position of the head by not looking excessively up or bottom.
It is possible to help by putting pressure on your knees with your hands.Use it only if necessary.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked with Ardha Pincha Mayurasana.

How to do Ardha Pincha Mayurasana?: 1: Start by getting on all fours on yoga letapis, knees lined up with hips and hands aligned with shoulders.
2: Place the forearms on the ground, the elbows with the width of the shoulders and the hands well rooted on the ground.
3: Press the forearms, fingers and palms, and push the hips up and back.Keep the right and long spine, stretching the coccyx upwards.

4: The feet are apart from the width of the hips and the toes point forward.Press your heels on the floor and feel a stretch at the back of your legs.Keep your legs stretched or flex your knees slightly to keep your back flat.
5: Let the head and neck hanging free of the shoulders;The front can rest on the ground.
6: Your body must form a straight line from the heels to the shoulders.
7: The palms of the hands must be turned down and well anchored in the ground.
8: Breathe and hold the posture for 2 to 6 breaths.
9: To relax: fold your legs and lower the hips to return to the table position, or lower yourself completely to the child's position.

Training advice: It is recommended to practice this posture early in the morning, on an empty stomach.If you practice this posture in the evening, be sure to leave an interval of 3 to 4 hours after your last meal.This will not only allow you to keep your stomach empty, but also to have the energy necessary to practice posture.
There are several variants of this posture.You can try to lift one leg both to the ceiling to increase the stretching and intensity of the posture.

If you do not yet know this posture, you can use a wall to support your feet and maintain your balance.This will help you feel more stable and develop the force necessary to maintain the posture without help.

It is advisable to avoid this posture in the event of recent or chronic injury to the arm, back or shoulder.People with cardiovascular disease, hypertension, glaucoma or excessive weight should also avoid this posture.
If you have difficulty maintaining the posture, you can use yoga blocks to support your forearms and thus reduce the load on the shoulders.
While you keep the posture, focus on slow and deep breathing to help you relax and stay focused.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used to side elevations.

How to make side elevations?: 1: Choose a load that allows you to keep a good technique during all series and rehearsals.

2: Prenez les deux dumbbells et tenez-vous debout, les pieds écartés de la largeur du bassin et les genoux légèrement fléchis. Votre corps doit être droit, les hanches légèrement ouvertes vers l’avant et la position de la tête et du cou doit être neutre.
3: Tenez les dumbbells sur les côtés, les paumes de vos mains face à vos jambes.
4: Your palms should be shot slightly inwards of your outer leg (a small pronation).
5: Your arms should be stretched and your elbows slightly folded.All rehearsals must start in this position.
6: Tout en maintenant votre sangle abdominale gainée, élevez les deux dumbbells jusqu’à ce que vos coudes soient à l’horizontale.
7: You should feel tension in your shoulders.Your palms must be turned towards the ground at the top of the movement.
8: Marquez un temps d’arrêt en haut du mouvement, puis redescendez les dumbbells vers vos jambes de la même façon que vous les avez soulevés.
9: Once the starting position is found, start again until you make the number of repetitions desired.

Tips for side elevations: To keep the shoulder muscles under tension, perform 2/3 of the descent and go up directly.
Do not try to take the heaviest charge with this type of exercise.Instead, favor the greatest number of rehearsals while keeping a good technique.

Do not try to carry out this exercise either quickly.The slower and controlled the movement, the better the results.Indeed, explosive rehearsals use the momentum and not the contraction of muscle fibers to lift the load.
To help you make an effective movement, slightly tilt the dumbbells down as if you are pouring a water jug when you lift them.It will thus be more difficult to put your hands higher than the elbows.
When you arrive at muscle burn, do not hesitate to continue the effort by taking a lighter pair of dumbbells.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with AB Coaster.

How to work the abs with AB Coaster?: 1: Kneel in the seat so that your feet are hanging on the rear edge of the support.
3: Move the mobile support forward and up, bringing the knees upwards back.
4: Keep this high position for a second if possible by strongly contracting your abs.
5: Return slowly to the starting position.
6: Repeat the movement as many times as expected.

Training advice: It is possible to adjust the seat on the right or left side in order to work on the oblique muscles.
Do not move your upper body during exercise to isolate the abdominals as much as possible.
Use a slow and regular speed for this exercise.Do not use a momentum to go up, focus on the contraction and use of your abs to go up.
To increase the intensity of the exercise, add bodybuilding discs to the sides.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the Wall Ball Squat.

How to make the Wall Ball Squat?: 1: First, take a ball medicine, the weight you choose will depend on your physical condition.Beginners will be able to start with a ball of 1, 2 or 3 kilos, while the most experienced can use a ball of 7, 8, 9 or 10 kilos.

2: Stand up, your feet apart from the width of the span, facing a wall and holding medicine-ball at the level of your chest.Place your shoulders back and keep your chest open.Go down to a squat position, going as low as possible while keeping the medicinal ball at the chest level.

3: Immediately after reaching the low position of the squat, push on the heels and go up explosively.Simultaneously launch the ball down the wall.It should touch the wall at a height of about 3 meters.Catch the ball to the rebound, come back to the squat position and repeat the movement during the time provided or the number of repetitions desired.

Training advice: When you are at the bottom of the squat, the tight buttocks, the shoulders back, the tight abdominals, the only thing you should think is where you want the ball to go when you get up.
Do not hurry when performing the exercise.Take your time to find the Bontempo Start increasing the speed only when you feel comfortable.

It is the movement of pushing with the legs that will have to participate mainly in the throw of the ball.If you jerk or break down the movement too much, your arms will force too much and you will tire yourself faster.

Check each step and maintain muscle tension in your abs at all times.The biggest error is to release the abdominal strap at the reception of the ball and to literally crash on the ground with the round back.

You will notice that Ball medicines exist in different sizes, shapes and colors.Simply choose one that allows you a good grip, ideally in leather (a rubber ball medicine can hurt you if you take it on your head).

name: External rotation of the shoulder lying down with dumbbell

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with external shoulder rotations.

How to do external shoulder rotations?: 1: Lie on the left side, with the left arm supporting your head.
2: Catch a dumbbell with your right arm and place your arm on the side at an angle of 90 degrees, shoulder in a neutral position.
3: Raise the dumbbell by rotating your shoulder upwards.Take a break of a few seconds.
4: Discover your arm in the starting position.
5: Perform the desired rehearsals, then turn to your right side and repeat the same movement.

Training advice: In the starting position, the working arm must be in “L” position, folded at 90 degrees at the elbow.
Do not use a momentum and limit the movements of the rest of the body as much as possible.
Do not use a heavy load for this exercise.Focus on obtaining a complete shoulder rotation.Be careful, however, not to turn VESPAULES too much.

name: Developed in Landmine on his knees for pectorals

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the developed at the Landmine for Pectorals.

How to do the developed to the Landmine: 1: Place a floor mat or other type of padding (folded towel, etc.) under your knees (for more comfort).
2: Kneal on your two knees in front of the loaded bar.
3: Catch the end of the bar with both hands and lift it in the starting position.
4: Keeping the chest completely straight and the brought abdominals, push the bar upwards and forward until your arms are completely tense.
5: Focus on pushing the bar in front of you and contracting the muscles from the top of the pectorals.
6: Slowly go down the bar to the starting position while keeping control.
7: Repeat the movement to the desired number of repetitions.

Training advice: Do not lean forward and do not let your head go between your shoulders.If you lean forward, it will come back to a developed for the shoulders.So keep the body and head straight.

This exercise is generally carried out in order to develop power in combat sports practitioners.However, if you train to promote hypertrophy (muscle growth), it is better to do this exercise slowly and in a controlled manner in order to maintain maximum voltage on pectorals.

This exercise can be done with a single arm, but this variant tends to make the shoulders work more.The use of two arms is ideal for emphasizing the pectorals, as it allows you to tighten the pectorals and to make a maximum contraction.
You can also do this standing exercise, but it will be a little easier.Unless you tie an elastic bar at the helm, you then increase tension at the top.
Another variant of unique socket is to use a V Handle.

Be careful when you start and finish your series, especially if you use heavy loads.You don't need a heavy load for this exercise, and it may be difficult to bring a heavily loaded bar in the starting position and bring it back to the ground.The use of a cash register, a bench or a rack is a simple solution.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested from Australian pull -ups.

How to do an Australian traction?: 1: Mount a bar on a squats rack almost up to the size.
3: Enter the bar with a plug slightly higher than that of Vospaules.
4: Make work the musclesabdomine and raise the hips by tightening the fessiers.Your body must form a straight line from head to toe.
5: Start the upward movement using your muscles to pull the bar to the middle of your chest, folding your elbows at an angle of 45 degrees.Your wrists must remain in a neutral position.
6: Make sure your body always forms a straight line at the top of the movement.
7: While maintaining a straight position, unfold your elbows and go down to the starting position.Let your shoulder blades deploy.
8: Perform as many repetitions as necessary.

Training advice: Let your shoulder blades withdraw while you pull your body to the bar.
Do not let your buttocks sag, always keep them contracted.
Keep your abs tight for the duration of the exercise.
Do not make half the movement.Go down until your arms are completely tense and go up until your chest touches the bar.
To increase the difficulty, wear a weighted vest or add some bodybuilding discs to the top of your body.
By placing your feet on a bodybuilding bench, you can also increase the difficulty of the exercise.
On the contrary, if your level of strength is not enough, you can go back your feet by folding your legs.
It is also possible to climb the bar to slightly verticize the body to reduce the intensity of the exercise.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with abdominal roulette.

How to build muscle with the wheel with: 1: Get on your knees on a carpet and place the wheel in abdominal in front of you, directly under your shoulders.
2: Before starting to make the movement, contract the abdominal muscles by entering your navel and keeping the neutral spine and flat back.
3: Enter each side handle and keep your arms stretched and stabilized, before slowly rolling the wheel in a controlled manner.
4: Take a break just before feeling that your back will arise, and slowly go back to the starting position while rolling back, while keeping the abdominals under tension.
5: Continue to work on a larger amplitude of movement by further extending your hips as you gain in force.
6: Make as many repetitions as possible and stop just before your technique degrades.Take a break and redo a series until completing the number of series provided.

Training advice: Mastering this accessory requires a high body and a good abdominal strap, which is why it is an exercise intended for people with an intermediate or advanced level of physical condition.Before you train with this roulette, you should first be comfortable with the exercises of the leg of legs.

If you are using abdominal roulette for the first time, start slowly.It is easy to make the mistake of riding too far, but you really have to focus on driving and coming back slowly, a few centimeters at a time, to avoid stressing your spine unnecessarily.

Given the required strength to sheath the abdominal muscles, AB Roller will not suit everyone.People with injuries in the lower back or abdomen should avoid AB Roller until they are completely restored.

Training advice.caption: If you find that the kneeling version is too easy, go to the standing version stretched legs.
If you don't have enough strength to perform the classic version, you can exercise the abdominal wheel with elastic.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used in the horizontal draw with elastic.

How to make the horizontal draw with ela: 1: The execution of the elastic drawing is practically identical to horizontal auction in the gym with a pulley device.The only notable difference is that your feet will be placed in front of you, on the ground, instead of being supported against the tilted foot plates of a machine.
2: Double an elastic (choose one that allows you to make a complete movement).
3: Enter each end with one hand.
4: Place the elastic band around a fixed anchor point, or on your feet (shoes are recommended).
5: Keep your legs stretched and contract the muscles of the abdominal belt.
6: Pull the elastic towards your navel until your elbows exceed the back of your body.
7: Return slowly to the starting position by controlling the elastic.Repeat as many times as necessary.

Training advice: When you shoot the strip, you need to focus on getting your elbows backwards instead of bringing the strip to you, this will help you do not seek your biceps too much during movement.

With this exercise, especially when using an overly resistant strip, practitioners tend to make movements back and forth with the upper body to take momentum.This is an error that will make this exercise less effective.Try keeping the upper body as straight and fixed as possible while pulling your elbows back as much as possible.

A very common error is the internal rotation of the shoulders, when your shoulders are directed forward.This position will not allow you to obtain a more complete contraction and make movement less effective, in addition to imposing higher stress on your rotator cuff, which could cause long -term injury.
Start with strips with light resistance and gradually introduce bands with higher resistance to let the lower back adapt to the movement.

Training advice.caption: The variant of the horizontal draw with an elastic positioned on both feet.

name: Tate press with an arm with dumbbell

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested at Tate Press.

How to do the Tate Press?: 1: Lie flat on the bench and hold a dumbbell above the shoulders.
2: Turn the dumbbell so that the palm of your hand is turned down your body.The elbow is oriented outside.
3: By keeping the elbow fixed, down the dumbbell in a controlled manner until you get an angle of 90 degrees.
4: The dumbbell is now found near the opposite shoulder.Go up the weight by strongly contracting the triceps.
5: After doing all the rehearsals, change aside and repeat the movement.

Training advice: You can place your opposite hand on your elbow to stabilize the joint.
Favor light loads and with long series.It is not an appropriate exercise to work with heavy dumbbells.
Do not hold your arm completely to keep tension on the triceps.
As with all unilateral exercises, start with your weak side and do not make more repetitions with your strong side.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the lifting of earth with elastic.

How to make the lifting of the earth wit: 1: Place the elastic at your feet, the two ends of the band by your side.
2: Position your feet at the width of the shoulders, centered on the strip.
3: Lean while keeping your back straight to grasp the two ends of the elastic.Your hands must be in a neutral position (palms towards you).
4: Straighten up in a standing position by pushing with your legs and contracting your fessiers and your legs.
5: Then flex the hips and knees to return to the starting position while keeping the back straight and controlling the movement.
6: Perform the desired number of rehearsals, taking care to maintain good shape throughout the exercise.

Training advice: Before starting the exercise, perform a complete warm -up to prepare your muscles and joints.
Engage your abs throughout the movement to stabilize your trunk.
Remember to keep your back straight, chest out and shoulders back throughout the exercise.
To increase the intensity, you can increase the number of repetitions, the speed of movement or the resistance of the band.
For more intense work of glutes and hamstrings, you can try the version with a leg of the lifting of earth with elastic.
To seek more than the gluteal, you can try the “Good Morning” version of the elastic lifting with elastic, where the movement is mainly done at the hips, keeping the back straight.

name: Split Squat at the Smith Machine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with the split squat at the Smith Machine.

How to make the Smith Machine split squa: 1: Place yourself in the Smith Machine and position the bar so that it rests comfortably on the upper back / Lestrapezes.
2: Pivot the bar with your wrists to get it from the rack.
3: Place your feet so that your legs are in a split position (the ideal length of the position is that where the two knees form an angle of 90 degrees at the bottom of the movement.
4: Your front foot should be firmly rooted flat on the ground.
5: Keeping the upper chest, straight back and a straight posture (shouldersalized shoulders with hips), lower your body by lowering your rear knee until your two knees form an angle of 90 degrees.
6: Go up in a high position, keeping a slight bending of the front knee at the top of the movement.
7: Repeat the movement from top to bottom until you have made the desired number of rehearsals, then put the hooks back on the support to complete your series.

Training advice: One of the best ways to control the technique is to remember the indication "let the rear knee down down".

If you make the split squats slowly and with a continuous tension, you will feel an incredible burn in your quadriceps, and you will be incredibly satisfied with the results.The continuous tension means that you do not lock the leg in the high position by not standing at the top.

To increase the intensity, do as many repetitions as possible in continuous tension, then when the burn reaches the point where you feel that you can no longer make another repetition, take a break at the top (while completely stretching the leg) to letThe burn dissipate, then continue until you can repeat.Repeat this technique until your thighs are completely exhausted and on the verge of muscle failure.

name: Rowing in neutral seated in the machine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested at Rowing Seated in the Machine.

How to drive the machine?: 1: Préparez-vous à effectuer l’exercice en ajoutant des disques de weight training et en réglant la hauteur du siège. Votre poitrine doit se trouver au sommet du rembourrage.
2: Sit on the machine and enter the handles with a neutral socket.
3: Keeping the chest plated on the support, eyes turned forward and elbows in the sides, slowly pull the handles back as far as possible.
4: Take a break by tightening the shoulder blades against each other, then slowly drop the loads in the starting position without relaxing them.
5: Repeat the movement to the desired number of repetitions.

Training advice: Do not let your chest peel off from the cushion when you pull the loads backwards.Bringing back by pulling the weight is cheating!Focus on the targeted muscles while remaining fixed throughout the series.
Do not hesitate to use Mermaidi Dessangles Your POINTED DE LIMITANT.
It is possible to carry out this exercise one arm after another in unilateral, but be sure to maintain a straight posture and not to excessively pivot your bust.
Keep a slight bending of the arms at the end of movement to protect your elbows.
To fully solicit your muscles, make each movement slowly, avoiding fast and jerky movements.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the Curl dumbbell neutral taken.

How to make the Curl Halter taken neutra: 1: Prenez une paire d’haltères et tenez-vous debout, les dumbbells le long de votre corps.
2: Use a neutral socket, that is to say with the palms turned towards the body.
3: Lightly bend your arms to exert tension on the biceps.
4: En gardant le corps fixe et les coudes sur les côtés, levez lentement les dumbbells aussi haut que possible.
5: Contract the biceps at the top of the movement, then slowly descends the weight in the starting position.
6: Repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Do not look back when you move the dumbbells.Do not go back and forth with the body to take advantage of the momentum generated to make the movement.These practices make it possible to cheat to take heavier loads, but are counterproductive for the training of biceps.
In the same vein, do not flexible legs to propel your dumbbells upwards.Aside from exposing yourself to a greater risk of injury, it has no interest.

Keep a slow rhythm and control the load throughout the series.Once the concentric phase has been carried out, do not neglect the eccentric (negative) movement of movement.If your goal is to develop large biceps, this control will allow you to work with a significant time on a long time, which is essential for muscular hypertrophy.
To intensify your training, use the Debressive Debrication Method to go to the end of your effort.

Training advice.caption: The curl hammer performed alternate will allow you to focus better on each arm, and to take heavier loads.

name: Rotation du buste debout à la pulley

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the rotations of the bust standing in the pulley.

Comment faire les rotations du buste deb: 1: Fixez une poignée double à une pulley à hauteur d’épaule, saisissez-la à deux mains.
2: If you do not have a double handle, a simple handle will do the trick: enter it with the intertwined fingers or one hand above the other.
3: Back up until the cable is tense.
4: Turn the bottom of your body until your feet are far from the pulley, and stand up with a quirky position.
5: By keeping your arms stretched, exhale by pulling on the handle so as to make a rotation movement until your arms are far from the pulley.
6: Hold the position for two seconds.
7: Inspire by reversing the movement and bringing the handle back to the starting position.Repeat the same gesture until you have reached the number of repetitions required.
8: Repeat the exercise, this time by turning to the opposite side.

Training advice: Keep your arms stretched.
Try to limit the rotation of your hips as much as possible and make your bust run as much as possible.
Keep your abdominal belt tight during movement for optimal muscle stimulation.
Avoid repetitions too quickly;Focus on commitment to target muscles.

In order not to thicken your waist, favor long series with light loads.This will allow you to tone your abs, and therefore help you keep a flat and fine waist.Working with heavy loads, on the contrary, may thicken your size thicken by hypertrophiating your oblique muscles.

name: Vertical extension of triceps with elastic

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used to the vertical extensions of the triceps with elastic.

How to make the vertical extensions of t: 1: Tie the elastic on a high support and place yourself in front.
2: Enter the elastic with a neutral socket (palms inward) and bring the elbows along the body.
3: Gain your abdominal strap and block the elbows on the sides.
4: Start the movement by extending the elbows and contracting the triceps.
5: Pull the band down until the elbows are stretched, almost locked, then go up slowly in the starting position.
6: Repeat the movement to the desired number of repetitions.

Training advice: The elastic must always have a certain tension in the starting position.Do not start this exercise with a released elastic.
Keep the shoulder blades tight and make sure they don't tilt forward when you stretch the elbows.
Do not swing your elbows.Some practitioners sometimes swing their elbows from front to back.This makes exercise easier, because the back muscles contribute to it.
Keep the upper body straight and take out your chest.If you are starting to lean forward, the relevant muscles will support the work of the triceps.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the board.

How to make a board for abs?: 1: Lie flat belly on the ground.
2: Fold your elbows and place them directly under Vospaules.
3: The arms will have a slight external rotation with the well -supported fists to increase stability.
4: Keep your legs stretched and apart from the width of the shoulders.
5: Take off your hips from the floor and press your feet on the floor for better stability.
6: Maintain a straight and horizontal position by aligning the top of your back with your hips and legs.

Training advice: For effective sheathing, make a slight retroversion of the basin and engage your elbows down (without moving them).
Do not let the hips sag to the ground.
Since the board can exert a certain pressure on the shoulders, I recommend that you tighten the shoulder blades and thus activate the stabilizers of the shoulder blade.
If you cannot do this exercise with tense legs, put your knees on the ground to reduce the difficulty.

Training advice.caption: To intensify the exercise, ask a training partner to put a bodybuilding disc on the bottom of your back once you are in position.

name: Static squat against a wall (exercise of the chair)

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested in the static squat against a wall.

How to make the static squat against a w: 1: Place yourself so as to have your back against a wall, feet about 60 cm from the base of the wall.Put your arms crossed in front of you or flat against the wall.
2: Start folding your knees, keeping your back in contact with the wall at any time.
3: Go down until the knees are folded at a 90 -degree angle, take a break and keep the position as long as you can, then go up.
4: Repeat the exercise if you wish.

Training advice: When you do this exercise, keep your knees directly above the toes and your head directed forward.
The weight must rest on your heels, not on your toes.Your heels must therefore be in contact with the ground.
You can notice slight tremors in the legs as time scrolls, but keep the position if you can keep a correct position.
At the end of each rehearsal, you have to push on your heels and go up along the wall.If you collapse on the ground, you may hurt your knees.

To reduce the intensity of the sitting position, do not go down too low along the wall.Take a 45 degree angle in the hips rather than an angle of 90 degrees.This will relieve your knees a little and lighten the tension on the quadriceps.

name: Leg curl at the gym balloon

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted in the leg curl with gym ball.

How to make the leg curl at the gym ball: 1: Put yourself in a lying position, feet on a gymnastics ball with your arms stretched on the sides.
2: Start the movement by bending the glutes and putting the hips in extension until you have a straight line between your heels and your head.
3: While keeping the hips in extension, bring your heels back to your buttocks by bending your hamstrings.
4: Return slowly to the starting position and repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of repetitions.

Training advice: Do not let the hips rotate when you flex your legs.
Once used to this movement, you can also do unilateral work and increase the difficulty by working with a single leg at a time.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the pullover with dumbbell.

How to pulle the dumbbell?: 1: Enter a dumbbell with both hands and place yourself on a flat bench, putting your shoulder blades on the bench.
2: Your feet must be firmly rooted on the ground, the knees folded and the buttocks below the bench to allow maximum stretching.
3: By holding the dumbbell with both hands, stretch your arms so that the dumbbell is directly above your head.This is the starting position.

4: By tilting the shoulders back and keeping the arms stretched, slowly lower the load behind your head until the dumbbell reaches the height of the bench or until you feel a stretch of the back muscles.
5: Raise the dumbbell slowly to the starting position.
6: Repeat up to the number of rehearsals desired.

Advice for pullover with dumbbell: Do not bend the elbows, because you would involve your triceps rather than the targeted muscles (pectorals and large dorsals).

Do not let the dumbbell go too far forward.The starting position is directly above your head and the dumbbell should not go further than that.Going too much forward is useless and counterproductive, because you lose tension on the targeted muscles.

name: Extensions des calves assis avec barre

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités aux extensions des calves assis avec barre.

Comment faire les extensions des calves: 1: Sit on a bench, a chair or any other similar place and place the bar at the end of your thighs, near your knee, but not on your knee, of course.
2: Fléchissez vos calves pour soulever vos talons aussi hauts que possible. Contractez et maintenez cette position pendant une seconde.
3: Slowly down your heels in the starting position and repeat the exercise to the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: To enjoy a larger amplitude of motion (and a greater contraction), place a step or a bodybuilding disc in order to put the front of your feet.Let your heels go down as low as possible without touching the floor and then an extension.
The pace of rehearsals must be slow and controlled.
Avoid swinging backwards, but you can look slightly forward.
Never do this heavy exercise without a progressive warm -up.You may cause tension on your ankles and tendons.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the butterfly.

How to make the butterfly posture?: 1: Sit with the right spine and legs apart.
2: Now fold your knees and bring your feet back to the pelvis.The soles of your feet should touch.
3: Take strive to bring the heels as close as possible to your pubis.
4: Take deep inside.By expiring, push the thighs and knees downwards, towards the ground.Make a slight effort to continue pushing them down.
5: Now start beating the two legs from top to bottom like the wings of a butterfly.Start slowly and gradually increase the speed.
6: “Fly” higher and higher, as fast as you can.Slow down, then stop.Inhale deeply and, by expiring, lean forward while keeping your chin high and the right spine.
7: Press your elbows on the thighs or knees, pushing the knees and thighs closer to the ground.
8: Feel the stretching from the inside of the thighs and breathe long and deeply, by relaxing the muscles more and more.
9: Take deep inside and go up the torso.
10: By expiring, gently release the posture.Start your legs in front of you and relax.

Training advice: Firmly grasp your feet with your hands.You can place your hands under your feet to support them.
Breathe normally throughout the exercise.
If you have a groin or knee injury, plan to place a towel under your thighs to support you.
To increase the difficulty, you can lengthen the bust on the ground.

Training advice.caption: Baddha Konasana en position allongée.

name: Ardha Chandrasana (posture of the half moon)

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the half-moon.

How to do Ardha Chandrasana?: 1: Start by taking the posure of the triangle with the left leg forward and the knee slightly folded, while bringing the right hand to the hip.

2: Slowly place your left hand on the ground, in front of your left foot.The hand must be under the shoulder so that you can adopt the right posture.Place your hand so that only your fingertips touches the ground.
3: Try to stretch your left leg while lifting your right foot from the ground.Your left leg should be as straight as possible.
4: Open your hips so that your right hip is above your left hip.
5: Now your right leg will be parallel to the ground.Be sure to flex your foot so that the toes point to the right.
6: Once in balance, raise the right arm and open the chest so that you are on the same plane with your right hand and your left leg.

7: Dans la dernière étape de Ardha Chandrasana, tournez la tête vers le haut de façon à pouvoir voir le bout des doigts de la main droite. Maintenez cette posture pendant au moins 5 respirations. Répétez ensuite la posture de l’autre côté.

Training advice: If you are more beginning and want to do this yoga posture, use a chair as a support.You can also use a brick to support your hand when you go down it.

You can also help yourself with a wall to train on the different stages of the posture.Follow the instructions above to make the posture and press the wall with your raised foot.If you need to adjust your position, put both hands to the floor and move your front foot forward or rear until your rear foot is comfortably flat against the wall.
If you have difficulty with your neck, keep looking at the ground.

People suffering from injury to the legs, hips, Epaules or preferably would avoid avoiding Ardha Chandrasana.Pregnant women and those who have just given birth should also avoid practicing this posture.
If your blood pressure is low, the half-moon posture is not recommended either.
Avoid eating a meal within 40 minutes preceding the yoga session.
Always perform warm -up postures before Ardha Chandrasana.

image_src_note.caption: Advice to master the position of front rack.
The muscles used with the racing carpet.

How to use a racing mat?: 1: Before getting on the racing mat, make sure that the carpet is motionless and the safety loop is fixed to the carpet (if it exists).
2: Go on the carpet and start it using the quick start button or by selecting a program.
3: Make sure the speed is the one you can keep comfortably when you get on the carpet.If you're not sure, start with a rhythm of walking.
4: Start and finish each training session with a warm -up and recovery of at least five minutes.

Training advice: The most important thing is to be as relaxed as possible.Relax your epauleset away from your ears.

Many racing rugs are equipped with integrated programs for specific objectives.By entering information such as your size, weight and age, you will get more precise data from your training sessions.The racing mat will automatically adjust speed and tilt according to your goals, which will allow you to focus on the race.

The racing mat displays a percentage inclination, which corresponds to the slope of the track.In addition to slightly increasing the calorie expenditure, running with an inclination of 1 or 2 % actively helps reduce the impact on the joints.

It is difficult not to look at the console frequently to see how long or distance you have left, but if you look down, your race technique will suffer.Do not fix your feet either.You may run vaulted, which can cause audoset pain on the neck.

One of the main causes of injury on the racing rugs is jumping or falling from a fast march carpet.If you have to run to the toilet, take a towel or get water, slow down the speed carpet and reduce the inclination.Then go out carefully.Do the same when you get back in motion;Do not try to resume where you stopped, at a quick pace or with a strong inclination.

Although it is dangerous to use headphones to run outside, listen to music on the racing mat can be a great way to fight boredom and run longer.Choose motivating songs and create a reading list for your training session, this will save you from continuously scrutinizing time to see how long you have to run.

If you choose to watch TV or movies on a screen, pay attention to your posture, especially your neck and head.Do not get your neck to see the screen, and don't bend to look at it either.If the racing carpet screen is not suitable for your size, drop the videos and favor music or podcasts.
Keep a bottle of water at hand and drink regularly during the practice of any cardio exercise.
Do not select a too steep slope (more than 7 %), because it would exert too much pressure on your back, your hips and your ankles (unless you walk).

Training advice.caption: The advantage of the racing mat is to be able to adjust the inclination very quickly.

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités avec les extensions des calves avec partenaire.

Comment faire les extensions des calves: 1: Stand up in front of a solid support, like a bodybuilding bench.
2: Turn your hips back to the back until your back is parallel to the ground.
3: Ask your partner to sit on the top of your pool.

4: En gardant les jambes tendues sans verrouiller les genoux, poussez les plantes de vos pieds au sol et contractez vos calves pour amorcer le mouvement vers le haut. Contractez vos calves en position haute.
5: Return slowly to the starting position by letting your heels go to the ground.
6: Stop completely at the bottom before you start the next rehearsal.

Training advice: Do not hesitate to use a raised platform of your choice (for example, bodybuilding discs or a bench).This elevation allows a more pronounced stretch of the muscles, a key factor in muscle development.
If you do not have a training partner, it is possible to use a weighted belt to position around your size.
Do your rehearsals slowly and control the load.
Do not be afraid to make a large number of rehearsals, until an extreme burn invades your calves!

Training advice.caption: Donkey Calf Raise was Arnold Schwarzenegger's favorite exercise to build muscle in the calves without machine.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the vertical thigh press.

How to make the vertical thigh press?: 1: Load the machine with the desired amount of weight.Lie on the machine and place your feet on the platform by removing them from the width of the Executive.Enter the side handles of the machine.
2: Make sure your feet are fully tackled on the platform, from the toes to the toes.Engage your pelvic floor and your vosabdominal, keeping the stormy chest (tightened shoulder blades).
3: Push on the platform with your legs until they are completely tense (but not locked) above you, then disengage the safety handles.
4: Descend the platform in a controlled way until your knees form an angle of 90 degrees while you inspire.
5: Then push the platform with the heels and the middle of the foot to return to the starting position.Exhale during this part of the movement.
6: Perform the desired number of repetitions and then put the safety handles back when the platform is in high position.

Training advice: As with most variants of thigh press, you will want to put a lot of weight to do this exercise.This should not be the case for the vertical thigh press, because its angle has the effect of raising the bottom of your back and increasing its trend to round.This exposes the lower back to compression forces, which is why it is not recommended to work with heavy loads.
Be careful that the safety handles are well in place before releasing the tension of your legs.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the wheel posture.

How to make the wheel posture?: 1: Start by lengthening on ledos.Fold your knees and anchor your feet at a distance from the width of the hips and at the same time, directly under your knees.
2: Start your arms back to place your hands along your ears, palms down and fingers pointing to your shoulders.

3: Without letting your feet or knees move away, inspire, then use an expiration to lift your hips, torso and your head enough to place the top of your head on the carpet.Do not rest your weight on your head.
4: Close your elbows to each other, enter the top of your arms inside and start arguing the middle and the top of your back.
5: During the following inspiration, push your hands and feet downwards and go up the posture more upwards.
6: Bring your coccyx to the back of your knees.Make sure your feet are not turned outwards, and root your big toes in the ground.
7: To get out of the posture, enter your chin and go down your body directly on the floor (do not put the top of your head on the ground).

Training advice: To deepen this posture, bring your feet closer to your hands, keeping your forearms and your shins perpendicular to the ground and parallel to each other.
You can use your yoga bricks to help you.The advantage of posting the wheel in this way is that the pressure on the wrists is less, which facilitates the recovery movement.
For those who have tense shoulders, it can be difficult to rise.In this case, it is advisable to work on postures of opening of the chest and shoulders using yoga bricks and a yoga wheel.
In case of steep back, you can make the cat's and cow lapos.This can help bring a little fluidity and flexibility to the spine.

As a rule, it is important to stretch the lower back after Urdhva Dhanurasana.In the Ashtanga Yoga, the wheel posture is followed by a before flexion (for example Paschimottanasana) for 10 breaths.An alternative would be to make the child laposure to stay there for at least 10 breaths to give your back time to stretch.

It is possible for beginners to start by doing this Asana against a wall: hold a few meters from the wall (the exact distance will depend on your flexibility).Spread your feet from the width of the hips or more, and anchor your feet on the ground.Start your arms up and down, as if you were pretending to make Urdhva Hastasana, then continue to straighten the chest by folding the knees and letting the upper back bend and arms stretch towards the wall.Let your head bow backwards.You can stay in this position, or slowly lower your hands lower on the wall.Stay a few moments in a place where you can breathe comfortably, then put your hands on the wall to get out of the posture.

Comment faire des \u00e9cart\u00e9s couc: 1: Prenez les dumbbells au sol avec une prise neutre (paumes vers l’intérieur). Placez-les dans le creux des hanches et asseyez-vous sur le banc.

2: Pour vous mettre en position, allongez-vous et placez les dumbbells près de votre poitrine. Une fois que vous êtes prêt, respirez profondément, puis poussez les dumbbells pour les amener en position haute.
3: Rétractez légèrement vos omoplates, déverrouillez vos coudes et abaissez lentement les dumbbells sur les côtés tout en maintenant le même angle au niveau du coude.
4: Lorsque les dumbbells arrivent au niveau de la poitrine, inversez le mouvement en contractant les pectoraux pour ramener les dumbbells à leur position de départ.
5: Do not touch the dumbbells, and continue with the next rehearsal until the end of the series.

Training advice: Imagine that you try to tighten a tree trunk during movement.
It is not necessary to excessively tighten the handles of the dumbbells.This leads to unnecessary recruitment of forearms and Desbiceps, reducing the stimulation of pectorals.
Avoid making the dumbbells touch or collide at the top of each repetition in order to maintain constant tension on the pectorals.
Always keep your elbows slightly folded and never lower the dumbbells to the point of feeling any pain or pressure in front of the shoulder joint.
Be sure to maintain a certain tension in Vosabdomaux and let the bottom of your back arched excessively.

One of the most common errors is to transform the end -up movement lying down with dumbbells.Although the bench press is an effective exercise in itself, it recruits other muscles to carry out the movement, at the detriment of the pectoral.
Poor common practice is to make too fast repetitions or lift too heavy loads, which can cause significant stresses in the shoulder and elbow joints.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with elongated leg curl.
