How to do the elongated leg curl?: 1: Prepare for the elongated leg curl by selecting the weight you want to use on the machine and adjusting the padding cushions to the length of your legs.

2: Lie flat belly on the machine.The padding should be placed just above the back of your ankles.Your knees should not be in contact with the machine, it would be very unpleasant for your ball joints.
3: Tendez les hamstrings en soulevant légèrement le poids de la pile. C’est la position de départ de l’exercice.
4: Contractez les hamstrings et montez la charge aussi haut que possible.
5: Strongly contract the hamstrings, then slowly down the weight in the starting position.
6: Repeat the movement to the desired number of repetitions.

Training advice: Many practitioners carry out controlled flexion, then let their legs fall quickly in the starting position.Although the bowling of the hamstrings in a lying position emphasizes the concentric part, the eccentric part should not be overlooked.To correct this error, be sure to slowly bring your legs back to the starting position.This correction will maximize your results and reduce the risk of injury.

Always make complete movements by raising the load as high as possible and lowering it as low as possible without it falls on the battery.The more you work with a large amplitude of motion, the more muscle fiber you will mobilize, the more you build.
Also, the work in full amplitude makes it possible to maintain great joint flexibility.

The hamstrings are very fragile muscles.The snaps, elongations and muscle tears are very frequent.To limit the risks of injury, remember to carry out some dynamic stretches before training and static stretching remotely from your leg training.Take the time to warm your legs well by doing a few series with a light load before mounting the load gradually.

name: LEG ISO LATEral Unilateral HAMMER STREGTH

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the LEG Unilateral Lateral ISO Extension.

How to make the lateral iso extension?: 1: Placez les disques de weight training de chaque côté de la machine.
2: Set the depth of the seat according to the size of your thighs.Your knees must be at the edge of the seat and the bottom of your back in contact with the backrest.
3: Place the bottom of your right leg behind the padded sausage.Enter the handles located on the edge of the seat.
4: The leg makes an angle of 90 degrees.Start it until it is completely tense.
5: Start the quadriceps muscles strongly, then slowly down the load to the starting position.
6: Repeat until you make the number of repetitions planned, then change legs.

Training advice: Start with light loads and make slow movements by focusing on the feeling of contraction of the muscles.
Start the leg completely, but don't lock your knee.
Do not put too much load.This will prevent you from stretching your leg completely and will reduce your movement amplitude.
To slightly diversify and accentuate the contraction of the vast internal, turn the tip of the foot inward.To further focus on the vast external, turn it outwards.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested at the Seal Row with dumbbells.

Comment faire le seal row avec dumbbells: 1: Lie flat on a flat bench in height.Adjust your upper body position so that your knees are placed on the bench.Also place your chin on the bench.

2: Saisissez les dumbbells avec une prise neutre. Bras tendus, les dumbbells doivent se trouver directement sous vos épaules. Veillez à ce qu’ils ne touchent pas le sol pendant l’exercice, sinon augmentez la hauteur du banc.
3: Tirez les dumbbells vers le haut et vers le bas du corps.
4: Take a break and contract your back muscles at the top of the movement.
5: Return slowly to the starting position with completely tense arms.Repeat the movement until you make the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: If you do not have access to a raised flat bench, place on each side of a flat bench two Plyo boxes, bodybuilding discs or steps.
Focus on the movement of elbows to reduce the solicitation of biceps.
Keep your elbows near your body throughout the movement.
Tighten your glutes and contract your abs.This will help you prevent any hyperextension of the lumbar column.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested at the bust rotations with bar.

How to rotate the bust with bar?: 1: Le mouvement de rotation debout avec une barre se concentre sur vos obliques. Prenez une barre de weight training et faites-la reposer sur le muscle sous la nuque (muscles trapèzes). Ne faites pas reposer le poids sur votre colonne vertébrale !
2: Stand straight, your feet firmly anchored on the ground at a distance higher than the shoulder width, your back straight.
3: Slowly rotate your chest to the right, then to the left.Put your abdominal belt in tension.
4: Pivot as far as possible.Do not move your head during the torsion, but keep your eyes turned forward.

Tips for bust rotations with bar: Keep your abdominals contracted throughout the series.
Always do controlled and momentum movements.
Make sure you have enough space if you use an Olympic bar!
This exercise can be carried out on a seated position on the edge of a bench.

name: Rotation externe de l’épaule à la pulley

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the external rotation of the shoulder in the pulley.

Comment faire les rotations externes de: 1: Réglez la hauteur de la pulley à la hauteur de votre coude.
2: Tenez-vous debout, le côté droit de votre corps orienté en direction de la pulley avec laquelle vous allez travailler.
3: Saisissez la pulley avec votre bras gauche et pliez votre coude à un angle de 90 degrés tout en gardant votre bras fermement plaqué contre votre flanc gauche.
4: Tirez la pulley vers la gauche pour faire une rotation externe de votre épaule.
5: Hold this position for about two seconds.
6: Bring your forearms back to the starting position.
7: Repeat this movement until you have carried out the desired number of rehearsals.
8: Repeat this series with your other arm.

Training advice: You can make this movement using an elastic or with a dumbbell on the side if you do not have access to a pulley.
Be sure not to use too much load to avoid any injury of the rotator headdress.
Make sure the scapula remains motionless during the external rotation of the shoulder.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested from horizontal extensions in the pulley.

Comment faire les extensions horizontale: 1: Attachez une corde ou une poignée simple à une pulley à hauteur d’épaule.
2: Standing, the right side of your body facing the pulley, grab the rope with your left hand.
3: Take a step to the left to generate a tension on the cable.
4: Place your elbow in the opposite direction of the pulley.
5: Discard your forearm to the left so that your arm is tense while contracting your triceps.Exhale during this part of the exercise.
6: Slowly bring your forearms back and let your arm come back to the starting position.Inspire during this part of the exercise.
7: Repeat this movement until you have made the number of rehearsals desired.
8: Then turn to the left side, so as to work on the right side.

Training advice: It is best to use light to moderate loads for this exercise to minimize joint stress and keep a good technique.
Avoid using momentum when you do this exercise.
Keep your body motionless (do not cheat with your obliques to perform the exercise).Only your arm should move.
Keep the top of your arm horizontally.If your elbow descends, the Grand Dorsal muscle will be involved.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested in dips on a bench.

How to do the dips on a bench?: 1: Sit on the edge of a bench with your hands next to your hips.Your palms must be on the bench, the fingers facing forward.

2: Advance your feet until your hips are slightly forward in the bench.Your legs can be folded or tense.Your shoulders should be at the level of your wrists.Pivot your shoulders outside to engage your back muscles.
3: Your chin must remain in the lowered position throughout the movement.
4: Keep your shoulders and hips in tension while keeping Vosabdominal Contrects.All rehearsals must start in this starting position.

5: While maintaining the same position, slowly fold the elbows and lower the hips to the ground until the top of the arms and the forearms form an angle of 90 degrees.Take a break at the bottom of the movement.
6: Contract your triceps to go up.
7: Finish the movement by exercising a strong contraction of the triceps while maintaining a slight bending of the elbows.
8: Repeat this movement until you have made the number of rehearsals desired.

Advice for dips on bench: Limit the distance to which you descend the hips to reduce the effort to be provided for this exercise.As you gain in force, increase the amplitude of movement.
To protect your shoulders, you have to descend along the bench and do not spread your bust from the latter.

Advice for dips on bench.caption: Comparison of good and bad position for dips on bench.

Advice for dips on bench: Keep your low shoulders, far from your ears, when you do ones on a bench.Try to maintain an elongated neck throughout the movement.
Pay attention to the tension exerted on your shoulders during this exercise.Do not go too low if you start to feel strong tension.Otherwise, you may injure yourself at the level of this joint.
Do not lock your elbows at the top of the movement.By keeping them slightly flexible, you keep the tension on the triceps.

To make this more difficult variant, place two benches in front of the other.Sit on a bench and place your feet on the other.Before lowering yourself by following the movement of dips on a bench, place a dumbbell, Unkettlebellou a bodybuilding disc on your knees.
If you use momentum to make each movement, you will not take advantage of the advantages of this movement.Make slow and controlled movements to obtain optimal results.

Advice for dips on bench.caption: You can place a dumbbell between your thighs to intensify the exercise.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested in machine triceps extensions.

How to make triceps extensions to the ma: 1: Set the load with which you want to work on the machine.
2: Adjust the height of the seat so that your hands can catch the handles when your arms are bent.
3: Sit on the seat and enter the handles on either side.
4: While keeping lesseed backwards, contract your triceps and make an extension of the elbows.
5: Start your arms without locking your elbows and perform a maximum contraction at the end of the movement.
6: Return to the starting position and repeat the movement to finish your series.

Training advice: Keep your back always well stuck on the backrest to avoid jolts of the bust.These jolts are not good for the back and they create momentum reducing the muscle work of the triceps.
Exhale during the contraction (when you hold your arm) and inspire when you release your triceps.
Always accompany the downhill movement (eccentric phase) in order to obtain a time under tensions.
Maintain the right look in front of you and do not look on the side, as it could cause pain in the cervical column.
The feet should be flat on the ground to ensure good stability during the exercise.
Take advantage of the possibility of changing loads quickly to make degreases degressive and literally destroy your triceps.

name: Montées sur banc latérales avec dumbbells

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the climbs on side bench with dumbbells.

Comment faire les mont\u00e9es sur banc: 1: By holding a dumbbell in each hand, stand next to a bench or a box, aside.
2: By making a lateral movement and slightly diagonally, place your left foot in support on the bench.
3: Focus on the work of your left thigh, as well as that of your glutes, and go up on the bench while keeping your weight on your leg working at the top.
4: Going up and closing the movement, stand up straight and keep the chest high.
5: Go back down and descend your right leg towards the floor slowly and in a controlled manner, using the strength of the quadriceps of the leg on the bench again (remember to “landing gently”).
6: Repeat this movement until you have made the number of rehearsals desired, then change aside and work on your right leg.Take your rest time after working on both legs.

Training advice: When climbing, focus on using the leg force on the bench: don't help the other leg downstairs.

Do not neglect the eccentric movement (descent).It is tempting to descend quickly to the ground, and gravity will be happy to help you if you do not resist it.In addition, if you go down too quickly, you risk using the momentum to bounce upwards, using your lower leg to help you.By slowing down, you limit the risk of cheating and increase the activation of the thighs and glutes that you are trying to target.

The climbs on a high support are a variant that will activate your glutes more.A climb on a box higher than the knee, or even in mid-thigh will make you start the exercise with a large hip bending.Because of this important amplitude, the movement looks very much like a squat on a leg (Pistol Squat).As a result, climbs on the side bench made with a large height can be an excellent way to progress at the Squat Pistol, if this is one of your goals.

The climbs on conventional bench are done with one leg at a time, but it is possible to opt for climbs on alternating bench.To do this, you have to climb on one side of the bench with one leg, then go back down to the other side with the other leg.

This point may seem obvious, but the question is still asked: yes, if your target is 8 to 12 repetitions, make 8 to 12 repetitions for each leg, and not 8 to 12 repetitions in total.Doing 20, 24, or even 30 repetitions in total can become very demanding.It will therefore allow you to know where you are at the cardio level.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the Hollow Hold.

How to make the Hollow Hold?: 1: Lie on your back and stretch your arms over your head, so that yourbispress next to your ears.Straighten your legs and put your toes, knees and your feet in contact.
2: Contract the abdominal muscles, intended to bring the rib cage back to the basin.
3: Your shoulder blades must leave the ground when you make the Hollow Hold.You may find it difficult to take off them if you cannot contract the abdominal muscles enough.

4: Lift your feet, your legs, yourepauleset your arms on the floor, keeping the bottom of your back against the ground.The only point of contact must be the region of the lumbar column, which corresponds roughly to the lower third of the spine, from the coccyx in the middle of the back.
5: Hold this position for just a few seconds, then release it.

Training advice: Lie the duration of maintaining the position as you strengthen.

If the weight of your own body is no longer a sufficient challenge, you can perform the Hollow Hold with a weight in your hands and another weight placed on your thighs.You can also just hold a dumbbell in your hands.Needless to say, with the long levers involved in this exercise, a small weight may be sufficient.So avoid the temptation to go too hard, too early.Otherwise, you may see the bottom of your back lift from the ground.

Do not fall into the trap to fold your chin on your chest.Not only does this cause cervical disalemination which increases the risk of tensions at the neck, but it also reduces tension on the abdominal muscles.

image_src_note.caption: Muscles requested from Russian rotations.

How to make Russian rotations?: 1: Sit on the floor and peel off your legs from the floor by folding your knees.You can also (as on the illustration above) stall your feet to increase the stability of the body.
2: By holding an arm load stretched in front of you, slowly turn your bust to the left.
4: Then turn your bust to the right.
5: Repeat this movement until you have made the number of rehearsals desired.

Training advice: Follow the movement of your hands.
Remember to breathe regularly.
Keep your back straight during the movement to protect your spine.
Always contract your abdominal belt and keep it tight throughout the exercise.
Russian rotations are generally carried out with a bodybuilding disc or a Ball medicine, but beginners can be limited to the weight of the body until they have acquired enough strength.

Training advice.caption: Russian Twist with body weight

name: Mounted on side bench with bar

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the climbs on side bench with bar.

How to climb on side bench with bar?: 1: Place a bar on your shoulders, behind your head, using an appropriate load.
2: Stand on the side of a solid and stable bench.
3: Place your foot on a bench adjacent to your body, keeping the other foot firmly rooted on the ground.
4: Push with the foot in support on the bench to get on it laterally, keeping the load in balance on the shoulders.Keep a slight bending in the knee of the support leg.
5: Once standing on the bench, bend the knee and hip of your support leg to rest the foot opposite to the ground.
6: Repeat the movement with the same leg until the end of your series.
7: Then go to the other leg and repeat the same steps.

Training advice: Keep a straight posture and a good balance throughout the exercise.
Check the descent of the working leg in order to avoid hitting the ground too abruptly.
Use a bench or platform of a height adapted to your level of strength and flexibility.
Start with a light load or without weight, then gradually increase the load as you gain in strength and stability.
Do not forget to breathe regularly throughout the exercise.
If you don't have a bar, you can hold dumbbells or kettlebells in your hands to add additional resistance to the exercise.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the developed inclined in the pulley.

Comment faire le d\u00e9velopp\u00e9 inc: 1: Install a bench with an inclination of 30-45 degrees between two pulleys.
2: Lie on the bench and enter the two handles fixed on the low pulleys.
3: Push the pulleys up until your arms are stretched.Exhale during this part of the movement.
4: Then slowly down your hands until you feel a slight stretch in the pectoral muscles.Inspire during this part of the exercise.
5: Repeat this movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Do not lock your arms at the top of the movement.This preserves the elbow joint, but also to maintain significant tension in the pectoral muscles.
Start with light series to warm up before going to heavier series.This will save you from injuring yourself at the level of Explaces.
Focus on the contraction of the pectoral muscles during the exercise to guarantee optimal muscle activation.

Training advice.caption: Be sure to maintain a certain tension in your

name: Flexions of obliques on the lumbar bench at 45 °

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the flexions of obliques on the 45 ° lumbar bench.

How to make the flexions of the obliques: 1: Set the seat so that your upper body can move comfortably from your hips to the ground.
2: Set up on the side on the lumbar bench (45-degree hyperextension bench), the hips on the support and the buster.
3: Call your feet against the foam sausages below.You can cross your legs if you feel more comfortable.
4: Place your hands on your chest or place them at your head.

5: Tilt yourself slowly on the side to the ground, as far as possible and as comfortably as possible.When your upper body is close to the parallel, greatly flex your obliques to return to the starting position.
6: After finishing the series, repeat this movement with the other side.

Advice for flexions of obliques on the l: Long series (20 minimum repetitions) are recommended to refine the size.Short series with in particular additional loads will tend to thicken the size.
Be sure not to lean forward or back (only on the side).In other words, move your chest only laterally.The rotation of the trunk (or even hips) to the right or left represents the largest error.

Lower the bust as much as possible (which allows you to stretch the targeted muscles as much as possible).If you do not feel stretching, it is probably that your amplitude of motion is not sufficient.
Raise slowly and in a controlled manner.
Focus on the bending of the obliques and do not hesitate to achieve a forced contraction at the end of the movement.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the board with suspension straps.

How to make the board with suspension st: 1: Install the suspension straps at the height of your knees.
2: Attach the straps to your feet, keeping your knees on the ground.
3: Then place yourself in the board position with your arms stretched directly under Vospaules.
4: Maintain the position during the scheduled time.
5: Release the board by resting your knees on the ground.

Training advice: Do not let your shoulders exceed your elbows.
Keep your eyes down or slightly forward, but do not look in front of you at the risk of creating tension in the cervical.
If you cannot maintain the stability of the hips or a neutral dudos alignment, stop the exercise.
If the exercise is too difficult to maintain because of a lack of strength in the arms, it is possible to descend the straps and do the board exercise on the forearms with the bent elbows.

To increase the level of difficulty, you can do this exercise with one hand.This is an additional challenge for the oblique muscles which will have to fight to avoid a rotation of the body.Do not forget to change its hand between each series for a balanced development of force.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the chair.

How to do Utkatasana?: 1: Start by putting yourself in the posture of the mountain (Tadasana).
2: Exhale by folding the knees and moving the hips back as if you were sitting on a chair.Return your navel inward and go up it to support the bottom of your back.
3: Move your hips to the back rather than your knees forward, so that you can always see your toes.
4: Inspire by raising your arms along your ears and relaxing your shoulders.
5: Continue to stretch upwards, while continuing to sit lower and lower, for 5 to 10 breaths.
6: To return to Tadasana, exhale by pushing your feet towards the floor to straighten your legs, then bring your arms down, along your body.

Training advice: Remember to group your legs as if they were only one to increase your strength.However, you can also spread your feet more to make your position a little more stable if necessary.
Distribute your weight evenly between the heels and the soles of the feet.
First do the movement of the legs by placing your hands on your hips or on the back of a chair in front of you to support you.
Strengthening and allows you to work the balance of the legs, ankles and feet.
Strengthens the abdominal muscles and lower back.
Stretch the shoulders and open the chest.
Develops confidence and concentration.

name: Curl biceps alternated in supination on inclined bench

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with alternating biceps curl on tilted bench.

How to make the alternating biceps curl: 1: Adjust a bench with an inclination of 45 or 60 degrees.
2: Then lie on the bench so that yourdossait flat and hold a dumbbell in supination (palm up) in each hand, arms during each side.
3: Lift a dumbbell to the top and contract the biceps at the top for 2 seconds.Exhale during this part of the movement.
4: Then go down the dumbbell slowly in the low position.Inspire during this part of the exercise.
5: Make this operation with the other arm, this counts for a rehearsal.
6: Continue your series alternating with arms until you make the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Use lighter dumbbells during this exercise, because the inclined position makes movement more difficult than a standard biceps curl.

Compared to bilateral work, alternating unilateral training will allow you to work with heavier loads for this exercise.This also allows you to better focus on the trajectory of each dumbbell.However, if you run out of time, you can also do it with both arms simultaneously.

A small momentum is acceptable, but be sure not to help you too much from EPALLES to raise your dumbbells.Only your forearms are expected to move for this insulation of biceps.If your elbows are starting to swing too much, it means that your previous deltoids help you cheat and that the dumbbells are probably too heavy.
Keep the biceps under tension by slightly folding the elbows when you keep them in the low position.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the posture of the warrior 2.

How to make Virabhadrasana II?: 1: To put yourself in the posture of the warrior 2, start Startaa (mountain posture) at the back of your carpet and make a large front slit with your left leg, the foot pointing to 90 degrees.
2: On an inspiration, lift your arms parallel to the ground, keeping lespaulesbasses and long neck.
3: By expiring, fold the right leg, keeping the knee above Lacheville.If necessary, slightly adjust the position of your feet and legs to ensure the stability of the posture.
4: Go down the top of your thigh towards the ground, to the left.Press your big toe to maintain your balance.
5: Push the top of your right thigh backwards and anchor the outside of your left foot on the ground.
6: Take your belly and lengthen your spine.Extend your collarbones and the tip of your fingers.Look over your left hand.
7: Stay in this posture for 5 breaths.To return to the starting position, push on your feet and straighten your legs while inspiring.Change the orientation of your feet and start on the other side.

Training advice: To prevent the front knee from going inside, contract the muscles surrounding the exterior of the hips (glutes) to exert an external rotation of the leg.
To prevent the chest from sagging, make the musclesabdomaille work bring back the coccyx down and front (backwards from the basin), which also keeps the dudosetée stockings.
Gradually bring your shoulder blades closer to each other, to keep the chest open.

Pay attention to the opposite movements of the thighs on each side: the front leg makes an external rotation (commitment of the external muscles of the thigh to stabilize the leg), while the rear leg makes an internal rotation (commitment of the internal muscles of the thigh forstabilize the leg).

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted in the vertical draw chest.

How to make the chest vertical draw?: 1: Attach a wide bar to the drawing device for the backbone and sit down.
2: Enter the handle (hands in pronation) and start the movement by lowering the shoulder blades, then pulling the bar until it is roughly under the chin.

3: Even if a slight backward movement is acceptable, try to keep the bust motionless.Keep your feet flat on the floor and make your abs while you pull.The bottom of the movement must correspond to the moment when your elbows can no longer move down without retreating.
4: From this low position, the bar near the chin, slowly bring the bar to the starting position while controlling the climb gently.
5: Repeat the movement to the desired number of repetitions.

Chest vertical drawing tips: Keep a certain tension in the abs when you pull the bar down to make sure that your spine is not overwhelmed.
Do not let the momentum dictate the movement, control the bar throughout each rehearsal.
Make sure the shoulder blades are moving on the rib cage.Do not block the shoulder blade down and do not satisfy yourself with a movement of the gleno-umumeral joint.
Enter the bar just outside your shoulders, but not too wide, especially if you are a beginner.Be sure to keep your elbows pointed out when you go down the bar, not to the sides.

Stop at the point where your elbows should go back to continue pulling the pulley down.If the elbows start back, the shoulder joint will undergo excessive stress.Do not go down the bar until the chin or just below.

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités au curl pulley en position squat.

Comment faire le curl pulley en position: 1: Préparez-vous en attachant une barre droite à une pulley basse et en choisissant la charge que vous voulez utiliser sur la pile.
2: Placez-vous face à l’appareil à pulley et saisissez la barre en la tenant par le dessous, en prise supination (avec les paumes vers le haut), les mains espacées de la largeur desépaules.
3: Crazy yourself completely and put the back of your arms (just behind the elbows) on your knees.Your knees will serve as a support to allow good insulation of biceps.
4: To make the movement, slowly go up the bar to your body as far as possible.
5: Contract strongly the biceps in a high position, then slowly down the bar in the starting position.
6: Repeat the movement to the desired number of repetitions.

Training advice: For best results, use a slow repetition, 2 seconds for the climb and 2 seconds for the minimum descent, to ensure that no momentum interferes with the movement, and that the tension remains constant during the eccentric phase.
If you have wrist pain with a straight bar, do not hesitate to use an EZ bar or a rope.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the shoulders with resistance band.

How to do the shoulders with elastic?: 1: Stand on the elastic with both feet.The elastic should be placed safely under your feet.
2: Place your hands inside the top loop of the band, using it like a handle.
3: With your hands at the shoulders in the starting position, the palms turned forward, push the strip up until your arms are stretched over your head.
4: Focus on the feeling of contraction of the deltoid muscle and temporarily hold the tension at the top of the movement to maximize the contraction.
5: Go down gently until you return to the starting position.
6: Repeat this movement until you have made the number of rehearsals fixed.

Training advice: The position of your hands can be turned forward (pronation) or you can use a neutral socket where your palms are turned towards your head.
To increase resistance, you can use a thicker strip or two strips.

Training advice.caption: The position of the elastic under the heels and hands behind the body makes it possible to reproduce the neck developed.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with lumbar extensions on the bench at 45 °

How to make lumbar extensions on the ben: 1: Place your thighs on the cushion.Fold your knees slightly and fix your feet, keeping them in the axis of your knees.
2: Cross your arms in front of you on your chest.
3: Inspire by leaning slowly from the waist until the upper body is 90 degrees compared to the lower body.
4: Mark a short stop, then exhale and go up until your shoulders, spine and hips are aligned.
5: Avoid arches the lower back and tighten the glutes to the maximum.
6: Make the number of rehearsals and desired series.

Advice for lumbar extensions on the benc: All types of back extension movements should be carried out slowly and under control.Avoid quick movements, such as jolts in one direction, as they can cause muscle injuries or compress your discs.
Although it is tempting to arrange the back as much as possible (hyperextension), this adds unnecessary tension on the lower back.
The safest is to do this exercise with your only body weight.To increase the difficulty, place your hands behind your head and point your elbows to the side.
If you want to add more resistance, take a light charge.
For people with back problems, consult a doctor or a physiotherapist first.They will be able to recommend the surest way to make back extensions.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested from the apart with elastic.

How to do the apart with elastic?: 1: Use a rack or any other medium to fix the strip.
2: Back to anchor point, enter one side of the band in each hand.
3: Take a distance from the band to ensure a good balance.
4: If necessary, move a little to increase the tension of the elastic.
5: Raise your arms up and towards the sides so that the arms are almost parallel to the ground.
6: Bring forward the arms to each other (adduction of the arms) against the resistance of the band.
7: Perform a maximum contraction at the end of the movement, then bring the arms back to the starting position.
8: Repeat the movement until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: For a complete development of pectorals, vary the height of the anchor point.
By fixing the elastic at the top, you will favor the lower part of the pectoral muscles.
Fixed at the bottom and with a movement of the arms up, you will accentuate the work from the top of the pectorals.
Do not hesitate to make a unilateral movement which offers greater amplitude of movement (and therefore a greater muscle recruitment).
Maintain a slight bending of the elbows throughout the movement.
Keep the stormy chest throughout the movement and focus on the contraction of the pectorals when the hands are getting closer.

name: Shrug à la machine à calves

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at Shrug with the calf machine.

Comment faire les shrug \u00e0 la machin: 1: Commencez par ajuster la machine à calves à votre taille.
2: Placez-vous face à la machine à calves de façon à ce que les rembourrages de soutien reposent sur vos épaules.
3: Hold the handles or enter an outlet to immobilize your body during movement.
4: Have your shoulders and contract the trapezius while expiring.Hold this position for a few seconds.
5: Then release your shoulders and bring them down by inspiring.
6: Repeat this movement until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Avoid using an overly heavy load because it will limit your amplitude of motion.Prefer a moderate load with which you can work with tempos or perform maximum voluntary contractions of a few seconds at the top of the movement.
To protect the bottom of your back, keep your abdominal belt tight (contract Vosabdomailau and yourfessiers).
Be sure to keep your shoulders back and the right spine throughout the exercise.
Keep a slight knee bending to preserve this joint.

Since you use the same machine for the boiles of calfs, the shoulder rise, you can combine the exercises.At the top of each elevation of calves, simply perform a shrug.To obtain the best result, keep isolated movements.In other words, do not combine the movement of elevation of calves and shrug into a single fluid movement.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the sweater available at the helm.

How to make the sweater available at the: 1: Place a loaded bar on the ground, at the end of an inclined bench.
2: Lie on your back on the bench and pass your feet under the pads.
3: Catch the bar near your head using a pronation socket, and place it above your chest.
4: By keeping the elbows very slightly bent, inspire by slowly lowering the bar backwards and down by performing a semi-circular movement until you feel a slight stretch at the dorsals.
5: Exhale by slowly reversing the movement to bring the bar back to the starting position, above your chest.
6: Repeat this movement until the number of repetitions planned.

Training advice: Keep your elbows slightly bent to protect the joints from your elbows.
If the bar is too restrictive for your wrists, try with an EZ bar.You can also test Lepull-over with dumbbell the double sweater with dumbbells.
This type of movement may not be suitable for people who have shoulder problems.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the horizontal draw wide.

How to make the horizontal draw wide?: 1: Installez-vous face à la machine à pulley et placez vos pieds sur les repose-pieds.
2: Enter the elongated bar with a wide socket and back up your buttocks until your legs are almost tense.Your chest should be slightly leaning back and your arms should be completely tense.
3: While maintaining your fixed bust, exhale by pulling the bar towards your abdomen.Pull your shoulders back and open your chest at the end of the movement.
4: Hold the position for a brief moment and contract the back muscles.
5: Inspire by bringing the bar back in the starting position, with completely tense arms.
6: Repeat until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Let your shoulder blades move freely by letting them slide forward in the starting position, and bringing them back at the end of the movement.
Do not excessively cam.
Do not swing the torso from front to back.
So that the bottom of your back has time to adapt, start with a light load and gradually add weight.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested at the Sissy Squat.

How to make the Sissy Squat without a ma: 1: Stand up, your feet apart at the shoulder width.Bring your shoulders back and down, and contract your abdominal strap to avoid tension in the lower back.
2: Slowly bend your knees while peeling off your heels from the ground.If you need help, hold a wall for more stability.

3: Lorsque vous abaissez vos genoux vers le sol, déplacez le haut de votre corps vers l’arrière. Cela permet de maintenir votre corps bien droit, des rotules aux épaules, et d’éviter ainsi les blessures. Pour ce faire, vous devez serrer vos fessiers, vos hamstrings et votre ceinture abdominale.
4: When you reach the end of your amplitude of motion (that is to say that you can no longer lower your knees), keep your support on the sole of the foot and return to the starting position.
5: Be sure to keep your body up and down in a straight line when you straighten up.
6: Make as many repetitions as expected in your series.

Training advice: Keep your feet and knees oriented in the same direction.
For each series, alternate the hand with which you enter the support that allows you to keep your balance.
It is possible to make the exercise more difficult by maintaining a load against yourself with the free hand.You can also wear a full backpack as a ballast.
If you suffer from a knee injury or if you feel any pain in the knee joint during movement, avoid this exercise.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested in the squat bar in front.

How to make the squat bar in front?: 1: Put the bar in a rack slightly below the shoulder level, so the knees are slightly folded.

2: Place your hands just outside the shoulder width, go under the bar and let it stand on the shoulders while pushing the elbows forward of the body.Your triceps must remain parallel to the ground.Keep a neutral neck and a flat back.This is your starting position.
3: Inspire and release the bar by bringing your hips forward and stretching your legs.
4: Make a squat (flexion on legs) by folding your knees and pushing your hips back simultaneously.
5: Once the thighs are parallel to the ground, start reverse the movement.Keep your abdominals contracted and push your feet into the ground.
6: Finish the movement by expiring and completely stretching the hips and knees.

Training advice: If you perform a front squat for the first time, choose a light bar;This will allow you to adapt to the technique before lifting a larger load.
The angle of the toes is very individual, it is therefore necessary to experiment several positions to find the one that suits you best.
It is possible to use 2 or 3 fingers during the front squat, as it allows to relieve the wrist.
If you can't hold in a front rack front position, then try the cross -taking position.

A certain move of the knees forward compared to the toes is acceptable provided that the knees does not deviate excessively inward or outside.People whose femur is longer will allow their knees to come forward if they want to remain straight.

name: Extensions des calves debout à la Smith machine

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités avec les extensions des calves debout à la Smith machine.

Comment faire les extensions des calves: 1: Place the bar of the Smith Machine at the height of Epauleset Load the bar.
2: Prenez un step, une cale à calves ou un disque de weight training et placez-les sous la barre.
3: Go up on this accessory and place the soles on your feet on the edge.
4: Enter the bar with a wide socket and place it on the top of your trapezoid muscles (not on the bones of your spine).
5: Pick up the bar and slowly let your heels go down as far as possible.This is the starting position.
6: Then slowly go up your heels as high as possible.
7: Contract the muscles of the calf, then slowly descend your heels in the starting position.
8: Repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Do not let your heels touch the floor throughout the series.
The soles of your feet should be on the edge of the block.
Use the maximum amplitude of the movement by letting your heels descend as low as possible, then by raising them as high as possible.
Make sure your knees do not comply.

name: How do the variants of the lying developed affect muscles?

image_src_note.caption: Taille d’effet des EMG entre les situations. Un nombre positif indique une valeur d’EMG plus élevée pour la première variante indiquée, tandis qu’un nombre négatif indique une valeur d’EMG plus élevée pour la deuxième variante indiquée.

Comment faire les extensions des calves: 1: Place the bar of the Smith Machine at the height of Epauleset Load the bar.
2: Prenez un step, une cale à calves ou un disque de weight training et placez-les sous la barre.
3: Go up on this accessory and place the soles on your feet on the edge.
4: Enter the bar with a wide socket and place it on the top of your trapezoid muscles (not on the bones of your spine).
5: Pick up the bar and slowly let your heels go down as far as possible.This is the starting position.
6: Then slowly go up your heels as high as possible.
7: Contract the muscles of the calf, then slowly descend your heels in the starting position.
8: Repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the board on Swiss Ball.

How to do the board on Swiss Ball?: 1: Place your forearms on the top of the stability tank and back up your feet until your body forms a straight line from your head to your feet.Your body should only be supported by your forearms and your toes.
2: Then perform a slight retroversion of the basin to maximize the contraction of the abdominal muscles.Maintain this position as long as possible.

Training advice: Do not let your body turn on one side or the other.
Keep lespaulesbasses.Do not raise your shoulders.
To make this exercise more difficult, do it while getting balanced on one foot, then on the other.
It is also possible to increase the difficulty by asking a training partner to kick the side.
The extreme version of this exercise is to stay in balance with a Ball medicine under the feet.

name: Curl biceps à la pulley basse

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités au curl biceps à la pulley basse.

Comment faire le curl biceps \u00e0 la p: 1: Mettez-vous en place pour effectuer le curl à la pulley basse en attachant une barre droite à la pulley et en sélectionnant la charge que vous voulez utiliser sur la pile.
2: Place yourself in front of the pulley, your legs apart from the width of the shoulders.
3: Enter the bar with the palms upwards (supination socket), the hands being apart from the width of the shoulders.
4: By keeping the elbows tight on the sides, slowly climb the bar as high as possible.
5: Contract the biceps at the top of the movement, then slowly descends in the starting position.
6: Do not take a break, but go directly to the next rehearsal!

Advice for biceps curls with low pulley: Keep your elbows near the body and do not let them advance when you lift the load.If you can't keep the elbows, reduce the load.
Do not “rest” at the bottom of the movement.When you finish a rehearsal, go directly to the next!
Keep a slow pace and control the load during the descent.

If the load is too heavy, you will be tempted to mobilize the entire upper body using momentum to help you do the exercise.Make sure your upper body is motionless, the only thing that should move during movement being the joint of your elbow.

To take full advantage of the advantages of a biceps curl, you need to move the load to the shoulders and completely stretch the elbow at the bottom.Use a lighter weight if you can't work with a full amplitude.

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités au curl à la pulley vis à vis.

Comment faire le curl \u00e0 la pulley v: 1: Fixez des poignées simples au sommet de la pulley du câble.
2: Adjust the pulleys according to your size from a standing position.
3: The lower part of your arms must be parallel to the ground when your arms are completely bent.
4: Placez-vous au centre de l’appareil à pulley et saisissez les poignées en les tenant par le bas, les paumes vers le haut (mains en supination).
5: Start with the outstretched arms towards the sides.
6: Keep your elbows fixed and slowly bring your hands back to your shoulders.You should only contract your biceps.
7: Tighten the two biceps at the top of the movement: imagine that you make a double biceps installation.
8: Return slowly to your starting position.
9: Take advantage of the resistance in the eccentric part of the movement to help you develop your biceps.
10: Make as much repetitions as desired.

Tips for curl in the pulley vis -\u00e0: Do not let your elbows move once you are in a complete flexion position.They will naturally want to move forward, up and down.Concentrate so that they stay in place.
Do not shoot with the shoulders, the idea being to isolate your biceps.When you recruit any other muscle, it reduces the efficiency of the exercise.

If you use a single pulley at a time, this will allow you to solicit the stabilizing muscles of the trunk much more effectively, such as the muscles of the abdominal strap or the stabilizing muscles of the column.This variant is more interesting in terms of global muscle development.
Do not stop your back, always keep a neutral spine.Do not hyperextension, as it causes unwanted stress on the spine.Likewise, don't look forward either.

A little tip for making two -arms curls when the pulley machine is not spacious enough is to kneel to get a little more extension.It is a little less practical, because the draw line is not as horizontal, it is more vertical and descends downwards.But this will allow you to work with a greater amplitude, and therefore to recruit and build more muscle fibers.

If you train at home and have no machine with pulleys, you can do this exercise with elastic bands.Just attach the strips to a raised and stable place.You can do these biceps by biceps very easily;Or, if you have the right installation, you can place two strips on each side and make the two -arms version.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the posture of the warrior 1.

How to do Virabhadrasana I?: 1: Start in the mountain posture (tadasana), standing, feet apart from the width of the hips and arms along the body.
2: Exhale by spreading your feet about 1.5 meters.Turn your left foot to 90 degrees, so your toes point to the top of the carpet.Pivot your right foot inward at an angle of 45 degrees.
3: Align your front heel with the vault of your rear foot.Keep your front -facing basin of the carpet.
4: Put your weight in your straight heel.Then exhale by folding your left knee on yourchevillegauche.Your tibia should be perpendicular to the ground.
5: Start your arms upwards.Stretch (lengthen) your belly and raise your chest.Keep your palms and your fingers.
6: You can keep your arms parallel or bring your palms together.
7: Gently tilt your head back.Feel your shoulder blades get closer to each other.
8: Hold this position for one minute at most.

9: To release the posture, put your weight on the rear heel and stretch your front leg.Lower your arms.Turn to the right, by reversing the position of your feet, and repeat the movement on the opposite side.

Training advice: Engage your coccyx to the ground, rather than tilting your basin forward.This allows you to benefit from a greater stretch of the lower back.
If you have neck problems, don't look up too much up.
In the event of shoulder pain, keep your arms raised parallel to each other, rather than bringing the palms closer to hands.You can also keep your hands on the hips.
If it is difficult to keep the rear heel on the floor, place it on a sandbag or a firm blanket.

image_src_note.caption: Muscles contacted with thruster.

How to do the thruster?: 1: Stand up, your feet apart from the width of the shoulders, the toes slightly turned outwards.Raise and hold a bar on the front of your shoulders, the top of your arms being roughly parallel to the ground.Your hands should be removed barely more than the shoulder width.Maintain your contracts contracted.

2: Move your hips backwards and squat until your thighs are roughly parallel to the ground.Do not round the lower back, but do not hesitate to go lower if your flexibility allows.Your chest must remain relatively straight.
3: Raise yourself quickly, and use the momentum to help you push the bar up.
4: Go down the bar to the initial position on your shoulders, make a new squat and repeat the movement.

Training advice: Do not hesitate to film yourself making a thruster to check your technique.
Orient your knees slightly outward to better activate your glutes.If you use a good technique, your legs and your glutes will do most of the work.
Do not be frozen at the bottom or at the top.Keep a certain fluidity in your movements.Avoid losing momentum on this exercise.
The abdominal muscles ensure the necessary stability and must be asked for the duration of the exercise.
Optimize your breathing.Inspire when you cush up.Exhale by pushing the bar above your head.
To increase the difficulty, you can do the thruster with Kettlebell.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked with rowing with suspension straps.

How to run with suspension straps?: 1: Start by adjusting the length of the straps and make sure that the handles are parallel.Log from the anchor point.
2: Keep your body straight and your shoulders back and down.

3: Enter the handles and advance your feet until your body forms an angle of 45 degrees.(You can increase the intensity of this exercise by positioning yourself at a lower angle).Keep the weight in your heels, the coccyx entered and the abdominal strap engaged.
4: Hold the handles while keeping a neutral socket (the palms of the hands facing each other).
5: Tighten your shoulder blades while bringing your chest to the handles and keep your elbows near the body.Be sure to open the rib cage well and not to hyperextension of the hips.
6: Drive slowly in the low position and then perform the following rehearsals until you finish your series.

Training advice: Go forward to increase the load and go back to lighten it, it's as simple as that.
Start with an angle of the body larger than the one you think you need.This will allow you to warm up.Then gradually advance your feet to make your series.

The important points on which you will have to watch are the shoulders back and low.The rapprochement of the shoulder blades is also crucial.This will allow you to fully enjoy all the benefits of this movement.

To intensify the exercise, try to do it with a single arm.Just exercise the same way as with both arms, but with one.Just make sure your chest is placed in the right way compared to the anchor point, so that the side that does not work does not pivot towards the ground.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the Overhead Squat with elastic.

How to make the Overhead Squat with elas: 1: Go on the elastic with both feet.Enter the upper part of the band with both hands stretched above the head, spaced about 1 meter.
2: Stand straight, feet apart from the width of the shoulders.Keep the raised chest, right back and right head.Enjoy your abs, this is the starting position.
3: Inspire deeply and make a leg bending by backing off the hips and folding the knees.Continue to push your hands up during the whole movement.
4: Once your thighs are parallel to the ground, reversed the movement to return to the starting position.
5: Repeat the movement slowly 10 to 15 times.

Training advice: As with all squat movements, avoid rounding or arranging your back.
Keep most of the weight in your heels.
If you are able to make more than 10 to 15 repetitions, use a more resistant elastic.
When you squat, you should make sure that the arms do not move forward and that the elastic band remains vertical (not too tilted forward or rear).

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the Sits-Up in the Roman chair.

How to do the Sits-Up in the Roman chair: 1: Sit on a Roman chair with your legs wedged under the padding.
2: Cross your arms on your chest.
3: Keeping your neck neutral, inspire by tilting backwards to lower your chest until reaching an almost elongated position.
4: Exhale by bending the hips to raise the chest to the starting position.
5: Repeat this movement until you have made the number of repetitions planned.

Training advice: The distance between the seat and your feet must be just long enough for your legs to be comfortably placed on the cushion without leaving room for the bottom of yourdos.
The ankles must be bent down to keep the legs in place under the padded supports.
Instead of crossing your arms on your chest, you can place your hands behind your head to make the Sits-up more difficult.
To make the exercise more intense, you can also choose to maintain the low position for a few seconds.
For the safety of your neck, keep it as neutral as possible during the exercise.

name: Extensions of triceps seated with dumbbell

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the extensions of the triceps seated with dumbbell.

How to make the extensions of triceps se: 1: Sit on a flat bench or on a bench set to a seated position.
2: Enter a dumbbell, lift it over the shoulders and hold the upper end of the dumbbell by taking it with the palms of both hands.
3: With the stretched elbows and dumbbells above your head, go down the dumbbell behind your neck, slowly and in a controlled manner.

4: Keeping the position of the top of the fixed arms (using the shoulder joint as little as possible), stretch your elbows until the dumbbell is again above your head and your arms come back inStarting position.
5: Repeat this movement until you have finished your series.

Training advice: It is possible to do the exercise standing, seated or seated with the back in support.If you do the exercise standing or seated without back support, the abdominal muscles are also used to stabilize your body.

Work in all the amplitude of movement.Be sure to make a complete extension, to the point where you feel the triceps contract, and to completely descend the dumbbell, to the point where you feel a stretch in the triceps.
Two other popular variants consist of extending the extension with one arm at a time or with two arms at a time, with a dumbbell in each hand.
Always keep a right posture and do not transform this exercise into a sweater movement.
Keep your elbows inside (plated against your ears) when you raise and go down the load.If you let your elbows move away, you will reduce the tension exerted on the triceps.

To intensify your triceps extensions with dumbbell, try the degressive series method.During your last series, go to the point where you can no longer make another rehearsal, then take another lighter dumbbell and continue until you can make repetitions anymore.When you reach failure again, take a new lighter dumbbell and start making as many repetitions as possible.

If you train biceps and triceps on the same day, try to make a triceps extensions with biceps flexions.Doing two restless exercises between the two also saves time, making it an ideal technique for very pressed people.In addition, this allows to obtain an incredible congestion of the arms!

name: Triceps extensions tilted to the Smith Machine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with the extensions of the triceps tilted to the Smith Machine.

How to make triceps extensions tilted to: 1: Adjust an inclined bench between 30 and 45 degrees and place its highest end under the bar of the Smith Machine.
2: Load the bar with the amount of weight you want to lift.
3: Lie on the tilted bench, the feet firmly anchored in the ground.
4: Enter the bar with a pronation socket (palms up) at a distance close to the width of Expaules.
5: Take the bar and stretch your arms.This is the starting position.
6: By keeping the elbows motionless, slowly descend the bar as low as possible.
7: Take a break, then go up the bar to the starting position shamelessly lock the elbows.
8: Repeat this movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: It is advisable to test the position of the bench without load on the bar before starting the first series.

Tips for Machine Lumbar Extensions: The back extension machine is preferably practiced with light to moderate loads, because the lower back is a sensitive area and too large resistance can be dangerous.

Tips for the inclined developed with dum: Do not let the dumbbells collide with each rehearsal: by making them bounce against each other, you risk losing the stability of your shoulders and injuring yourself.
