4: Make 3 or 4 series of 8 to 12 repetitions.

Training advice: This exercise can be done seated or standing.The advantage of the sitting version is that it decreases parasitic swinging movements of the bust.

The Drag Curl can also be made at the bar or the pulley depending on the equipment you have to train.Each version has its advantages so do not hesitate to vary.The advantage with the dumbbells is that they create fewer muscle imbalances than with a bar, but they do not lift as heavy.
The use of a slow eccentric (descending part) improves muscle voltage and connection.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at Rowing Dumbbells at an arm.

How to do the dumbbell at an arm?: 1: By holding a dumbbell in your right hand, lean to place your left knee and your left hand on a bench to support the weight of your body.
2: Your right hand should be placed exactly under your shoulder and your knees should be placed below your hips.
3: Contract the abdominal muscles to strengthen your bust and stabilize your spine.
4: Your back should be flat and your head aligned with your spine.
5: Lower and retract the shoulder blades (pull your shoulders down and back) without arranging the lower back and hold this position from the shoulders throughout the exercise.
6: Start your right arm (holding the dumbbell) to the ground without letting your chest rotate or your shoulder move to the ground.This is the starting position.
7: Pull the arm backwards, fold the elbow and retract the shoulder blade to bring the dumbbell up and back until it touches the bottom of the rib cage.
8: Avoid pivoting the body or changing the position of your spine throughout the movement.
9: Take a break at the top to contract the background muscles and the posterior deltoid muscle.
10: Gently lower the dumbbell to the starting position while maintaining a flat back.
11: Repeat the movement until you make the desired number of rehearsals.Then change aside and perform the same number of rehearsals.You have finished a series.

Tips for Rowing Dumbbell at an arm: Keep a neutral neck position.So you have to look down and in front of you, so your neck is aligned with the rest of your spine.Do not constitute your neck by folding it to look straight ahead.
If you do not have a bench available as a support, simply place your hand on a stable area (like a dumbbell rack).Place your feet with the shoulders on the same plane, not in a quirky position.
The best way to do this exercise properly is to focus on the retraction of the shoulder blade and go up the dumbbell towards your size.
When you come back to the starting position, do not let your point do a complete protraction.Always maintain a retraction of the shoulder blades at any time.

Tips for Rowing Dumbbell at an arm.caption: The retraction and the protraction of the shoulder blades.

Tips for Rowing Dumbbell at an arm: The most common error is to use excessive momentum.Prefer the use of a moderate load that you can master completely, whether during the concentric phase, only during the eccentric phase.
Again, it is important to use your large backbone muscles and your rhomboids (whose main function is the scapular retraction) to lift the load, not Vosbiceps.

First of all drive your weakest side in order to balance the difference in force between both sides.So, first train your left side if you are right -handed, and your right side if you are left -handed.

Side change: if you can do it, go to the other side and continue the exercise immediately.If however you are particularly breathless or tired after working the first side, take a break of 15 to 30 seconds before changing sides.After doing both sides, rest for 1 to 2 minutes.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with crunch with suspension strap.

How to make the crunch with suspension s: 1: Attach the straps to an anchor point higher than your head, adjusting the straps so that they hang about 30 cm from the ground or the floor.
2: Put yourself in position with your feet inside the straps.Your chest and legs must be straight.
3: Exhale by bending your knees, hips and size and bringing your knees back to the chest.
4: Inspire by putting the knees, hips and extension size to return to the starting position.
5: Repeat this movement until you have made the number of repetitions planned.

Training advice: Keep the feet joined during movement and avoid ranging the suspension straps.
Maintain a neutral spine, preventing your buttocks from sagging or your Cambre.
If the size does not be flexed, the abdominals and the obliques will be activated in an isometric manner and will operate as stabilizers.
If the size flexes, the abdominals and the obliques will be dynamically activated.

Moat your body from the anchor point to create greater resistance during the exercise.You will feel increased tension in the straps and will need to work stronger to pull your knees towards your chest.
Make sure the two straps are the same length.

Training advice.caption: Variant with the elbows on the ground to allow practitioners who do not have enough strength in the arms to do this exercise.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked for the lifting of the earth.

How to make the lifting of the earth?: 1: Trouvez un espace suffisant et commencez par placer une barre de weight training sur le sol.
2: Approach the bar and keep yourself close enough for the bar to be just above your feet, the feet being in the center of the bar.
3: Keep your feet apart from about the width of the shoulders.
4: Lean forward and enter the bar with a pronation socket (hands above).
5: Keep your chest, your neutral spine and your shoulders retracted behind.And above all, keep your hips above your knees.This is your starting position.

6: Inhale deeply, hold your breath and lift the floor bar, keeping the lower back straight.Make sure the bar follows a straight line while you hold your knees and hips.Exhale at the top of the movement.
7: Once you have locked the hips, reversed the movement by backing off the hips and leaning forward.Also flex the legs during this descent phase so as not to put the stretched legs bar.
8: Once the bar is on the ground, put yourself in position and repeat the movement to the number of repetitions desired.

Technical advice: You should keep the fold of the armpit above the bar and the middle of the foot to allow the bar to move straight.

Deadlift is a hip extension movement, not a leg extension movement properly speaking like the squat.If you place the hips that are too low, you will place yourself in an unfavorable position on the biomechanical plane and will limit your potential to lift maximum loads.
Conversely, you should not initiate the movement with the too high pelvis and the tense legs.The hips must therefore be lower than the shoulders.

Technical advice.caption: The position of the pelvis at the start of movement of earth lifts.

Technical advice: To prevent the bar from moving away from the body, you have to focus on the contraction of the large backbone muscles in order to maintain the bar close to the body and allow it to move linearly.
The angle of the toes is very individual, it depends on the anatomy of your hip.Test (slightly back, out or neutral toes) to see what suits you best.
Make sure to wrap your thumbs around the bar to prevent the bar with your hands during movement.

Your point of support should neither be on the heels nor on the toes, but on both.If you focus on keeping your weight entirely on the heels, you will not be able to effectively recruit your quadriceps at the start of the uprising and you will therefore be slow to take off.To avoid this, you must focus on a push with the entire foot and search for three contact points: the big toe, the small toe and the heel.

If you are less efficient at the top of the movement, just before locking, you should incorporate rack sweater exercises, raised from Romanian earth, and/or lifts of earth with chains or elastics.In contrast, if you are weak on the ground, you should integrate lifts of earth with pause and/or "in deficit", that is to say with raised feet to increase the amplitude of motion.This discrepancy aims to reduce the initial dynamics to develop strength on the ground.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the elliptical velo.

How to use an elliptical velo?: 1: Climb on the machine by facing the screen.In general, nothing happens before you start pedaling.
2: To light the monitor, start pedaling by pressing the pedals forward with your feet.Push and pull on the handles regularly.
3: Follow the instructions displayed on the screen to select one of the pre -recorded programs, or choose "manual" to configure your own training.

4: Increase or decrease the pedaling resistance during your drive by pressing the up and down arrows.Most elliptical bikes are equipped with a heart rate sensor integrated into the handles, which you can use to measure the intensity of your training.
5: Before going from the elliptical apparatus, make sure it stopped completely.If, at any time in your training, you start to feel weak or feel pain, slow down or stop completely.

Training advice: Be careful by going on this cardio machine.The pedals can start moving and it is easy to lose your balance.Enter the handles when you get on the machine to help you balance.
Do not lock your knees.Keep your knees slightly bent throughout each movement.

Hold your weight on the back of the feet.By putting all your weight on your toes, you risk numbness of the feet.By keeping the weight on your heels, your leg muscles (quadriceps, hamstrings and glutes) will work stronger and you will increase your endurance to be able to train longer.
You leave resistance to zero, which does not constitute a sufficient effort.
You are switching to the place of standing straight.
You do not change a position between the front step and the reverse to solicit different muscles.Perform an reverse pedaling movement makes it possible to target the hamstrings more.
Your training never varies.Take advantage of the different machine training programs to diversify and intensify your efforts.
Elliptical trash training is often used to perform a cardio exercise at moderate rhythm.But you can also use this device for high intensity fractional drive.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with Jumps Box.

How to do the Box Jumps?: 1: Install a desired height (box) (40, 50, 60 and 70 cm).
2: Place yourself with your feet apart from the width of the shoulders about one step of the box or the raised surface.
3: Fold your knees, as if you were going to make a squat.
4: Bring back your arms lightly behind your body.
5: Then propel your body up and forward.At the same time as your body moves up and forward, swing your arms forward with the momentum.
6: Land on your two feet, keeping your knees flexible and bent.
7: Go back down and start again until you have made the number of rehearsals and desired series.

Training advice: For beginners, it is best to start with a small box.This will allow you to familiarize yourself with movements.

You can start by making Jumps in the context of your warm -up.After completing your initial warm -up, perform 10 to 15 Box Jumps rehearsals in 2 to 3 series.After that, you can go to your shadow training.

If you want to work more about your endurance, you can opt for a lower cash register and a higher number of repetitions.If your goal is to increase power, prefer a higher box and a lower number of repetitions.

You can also choose to add boxes to any training session like a high intensity interval.If you are looking to lose weight, this type of training is very effective.You can for example perform a series of squats, then a series of boxes, alternating both.You can also replace the Box Jumps with the rope designs.

Jump box variations.caption: The Jump Box with reception on one leg.
The Jump box with a leg jump.
The Jump box with reception in pistol squat.
The Jump Box with jump and reception on a single leg.

name: What differences between the classic rear squat and the Safety Bar squat?

image_src_note.caption: Image credit © Doctor-fitness.com

How to do the Box Jumps?: 1: Install a desired height (box) (40, 50, 60 and 70 cm).
2: Place yourself with your feet apart from the width of the shoulders about one step of the box or the raised surface.
3: Fold your knees, as if you were going to make a squat.
4: Bring back your arms lightly behind your body.
5: Then propel your body up and forward.At the same time as your body moves up and forward, swing your arms forward with the momentum.
6: Land on your two feet, keeping your knees flexible and bent.
7: Go back down and start again until you have made the number of rehearsals and desired series.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the exercise of the cocoon.

How to make the cocoon?: 1: Lie on your back, elongated legs and outstretched arms behind the head.
2: Bring your knees back to your chest and lift your buttocks while simultaneously bring your arms back to and above your knees to perform acrunch.
3: Go back to the starting position, but this time keep your legs far enough from the ground for the bottom of your back to be always in contact with the ground.
4: Repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Your arms and legs must move simultaneously to engage the abdominal muscles optimally.

Avoid lowering your heels to the ground to keep the tension on the abdominal muscles, and keep your feet high enough for the bottom of your back to remain in contact with the ground.This is recommended to avoid stressing the lower back.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the posture of wind release.

Comment faire pavanamuktasana ?: 1: Lie on your back, feet joined and arms along the body.
2: Inspire and, by expiring, bring your right knee to your chest and press the thigh on your abdomen with attached hands.
3: Inspire again and, by expiring, peel off your head and chest from the ground and bring your chin to your right knee.
4: Hold this position while you inspire and exhale slowly and deeply.
5: On an expiration, tighten the grip of your hands around your knee and increase the pressure against your chest.
6: On inspiration, release your socket, come back to the ground and relax.
7: Repeat this posture with the left leg, then with both legs together.
8: To finish this Asana, you can swing from front to back or roll from one side to the other by tightening the two knees against the chest, 3 to 5 times, then relax.

Training advice: Do not lift your neck from the ground.Rather lift your upper back.
Always perform this Asana on an empty stomach or, at least, leaving a four -hour interval between your meals and your yoga routine.
The best is to do your yoga session in the morning.If you can't do it in the morning, try to do it in the evening, but be sure to respect the interval between meals.
This Asana requires a lot of energy, so you have to practice Yoga of warm -up before practicing Pavanmukatasana.
Be patient and attentive to your limits.

name: Crunch à la pulley pour les obliques

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités avec le crunch à la pulley pour les obliques.

Comment faire le crunch \u00e0 la pulley: 1: Choose the load with which you want to work.
2: On his knees, face the machine, moving away enough to create a constant tension on the cable.
3: Catch with both hands the ends of the rope attached to the pulley.Your hands must now be on both sides at the top of your head and hold the rope.
4: Flex your waist laterally flex by holding the handles, focusing on the contraction in the obliques on the side where you flex.
5: Continue to go down by tightening the abdominals until your elbows are near your legs.
6: Return slowly to the starting position by controlling the movement, maintaining the contraction in your obliques.Do not rest the weight battery to keep a continuous tension.
7: Perform the desired number of rehearsals, then change aside.

Training advice: Focus on a slow and controlled execution, feeling the contraction of the obliques with each repetition.
To improve the benefits of this exercise, it is important to take a short break at the bottom of the movement by strongly contracting the abdominals.
Make sure there is enough space to make the crunch movement without problem, but do not back up too much, as this could compromise your stability and your execution.
You can also do the exercise by alternating side by one in two according to your preference.
Always inspire by contracting the abdominals to maximize the contraction, and exhale by relaxing.This advice is valid regardless of the exercise for abs or the obliques.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the split squat with suspension straps.

How to make the split squat with suspens: 1: Hang the suspension straps so that the handles are at the knees.
2: Take a step forward and turn ledosals straps.
3: Take a balance on one leg, lifting the back and slide it into a strap.
4: Make a squat by bending the knee and hip of the front leg until the knee of the rear leg is almost in contact with the ground.
5: Return to the starting standing position by extending the hip and knee of the front leg.
6: Repeat this movement until you make the number of repetitions fixed and change aside to work the other leg.

Training advice: Place your hands on the sides or on the hips to help you maintain balance throughout the exercise.
Keep the right bust throughout the exercise.
The front knee must point in the same direction as the foot throughout the movement.
A training partner can help position the strap around the rear foot.
For those who do not have enough strength in the legs, make a partial bending to the limit of your capacities.
For people whose balance is insufficient, consider placing the foot on a fixed object, such as a bench, or placing a hand on a fixed object to help you.

name: Developed lying at the Smith Machine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the Smith Machine -bench press.

How to make the Smith Machine Bench pres: 1: Prepare the Smith Machine by placing a flat bench in the middle of the guided frame.
2: Move the bar up to the hips and add the load with which you want to train.
3: Lie, Ledosbian anchored in the bench and hands placed on the bar, with a spacing slightly higher than the width of the Spales.
4: Detach the bar and slowly lower the load until it is about a centimeter from your chest.
5: Take a break, then slowly lift the bar as far as possible without locking your elbows.
6: Continue until you have made all the planned rehearsals.

Training advice: Lie on the bench so that the middle of your chest is at the level of the bar.
Your feet must be firmly tackled to the ground to support you.
Do not “bounce” the bar on your chest.
Maintain the contact between your shoulders and the bench throughout the movement.Keep your shoulder blades tight so that the upper back and shoulders remain stable throughout the movement.

The position of your elbows is essential for an effective and painless bellied developed.If you get your elbows too much to the torso, you may be in the elbows.On the other hand, if you spread your elbows too much, you may hurt your shoulders.

The back is naturally arched, because the spine is a slightly curved shape.You can keep a slight camber on your back when you are lying down, but always keep your buttocks in contact with the bench throughout the movement.
If you use an inclined machine, you must always install the bench so that when you make the movement, the bar goes back to your head and not to your feet (see explanation below).

Training advice.caption: The developed with inclined bench will allow you to target the upper part of the pectorals more.
The developed with declined bench will allow you to target the lower part of the pectorals more.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted in squats at the Smith Machine.

How to make the Smith Machine squat?: 1: Put the bar of the Smith Machine at the height of the Epaules.
2: Place yourself under the bar by placing it on your shoulders, and enter it on both sides.
3: Unlock the bar by turning it and stay straight to lift it from the support.
4: Take a step forward and spread your feet from the shoulders, the feet pointing slightly on the sides.
5: Keeping your back straight and the torso straight, inspire by descending the bar, bending the hips and knees.Go down until your thighs are at least parallel to the ground.
6: Exhale by pushing the bar up by extending your hips and knees.
7: Repeat the movement until you make the number of repetitions planned.
8: Once finished, fix the bar by turning it on the support.

Training advice: If you start with this exercise, do it without adding load until you get used to it.
The biggest error that people make is to try to make a squat at the Smith Machine as a normal squat.As I mentioned, your feet must be forward, not under the bar as for a squat with a free bar.
Whatever the variant of the squat you make, rounding the lower back is an error.You might be injured.
The advantage of squats at the Smith Machine is that you can more easily vary the spacing of the feet.Thus, you can easily make a squat with the feet attached with a guided bar, than with a free bar.

name: Dips seated in the Hammer Strength machine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the dips seated in the machine.

How to do the machine -seated dips?: 1: Adjust the height of the seat so that your arms are stretched in a sitting position.
2: Chargez la machine avec les disques de weight training prévus.
3: Set up by adjusting the legs legs on your thighs so that you are well maintained.Plate your chest against ventral support.
4: Using the handles on the sides, push with your two arms down.
5: Perform a break with maximum contraction at the bottom of the movement then go up slowly.
6: Make the number of planned rehearsals.

Tips for machine -seated dips: Start with light loads before working with very heavy loads.
Start your arms in the low position, but do not lock your elbows.
The more your bust is leaning forward, the more your pectorals will come into play. Adjust your tilt according to your lens (session focused on pectorals or triceps).

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the Sumo earth lifting.

How to make the Sumo earth raised?: 1: Place yourself directly in the middle of the bar.Your posture must be high, your feet being more widely apart than your hips.Your shoulders must be directly above your hips, with a neutral position of the head and neck.
2: If you train with minimum or sock shoes, grab the floor with your feet to guarantee a stable position.

3: Your feet must be oriented at 45 degrees compared to your body plan.Your knees must exceed your toes.Your arms must remain tense and your palms must be turned forward in your thighs (pronation).An inverted socket is possible if you work with heavy loads.
4: Turn your hips backwards and start to flex your hips and knees to lower your body to the bar.Your tibias must remain straight.

5: Enter the bar and engage your back muscles by rotating your arms until the inner part of the elbow is turned forward.Your hips must be higher than your knees and shoulders higher than your hips.Your chest should be high and your shoulders lightly in front of the bar.All rehearsals must start in this position.

6: While maintaining a neutral position of the spine, keep the bar near your body and start your upward movement by pressing your feet on the ground.In a standing position, contract your glutes and let your hips move forward, while keeping your arms stretched.
7: Start the descending movement with a neutral spine and switch your hips down until the bar reaches your knees.Let your hips and knees be flexed in order to descend the bar towards the ground.
8: Once the plates reach the ground, the rehearsal is over.Take a short break and resume your position before starting the next rehearsal.

Training advice: The positioning of the feet varies considerably from person to person.Rather than spending too much time trying to calculate your ideal spacing, simply experiment and see what is best for your long -term basin while allowing you to generate the most power.For some people, the position will be of semi-Moyenne (hybrid) width while for others, the toes will almost touch the records.
In principle, you should strive to keep your tibias vertical.
Do not let your knees go inside when you lift yourself.Push them on the contrary towards the sides.
Keep the bar near your body to improve the lever effect.
Start with a light weight and increase the load gradually as you master the technique.

When you lift a very heavy bar, take a large inspiration and hold it until the end of the movement.Exhale as soon as you are standing.This method called Valsalva maneuver will help you strengthen and support your bust.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the developed nape of guided bar.

How to do the Guided barre -bar develope: 1: Place a bench under the Smith Machine.
2: Adjust the bar up to Vospauleslorsque you are sitting on the bench.
3: Adjust the safety ties to prevent the bar from going down beyond your shoulders.
4: Sit on the bench and enter the bar with a wide socket, then detach it by rotating your wrists back.
5: Exhale by stretching your arms to bring the bar up.
6: Inspire by lowering the bar behind your neck, stopping before reaching the shoulders.
7: Repeat this movement until you reach the number of repetitions required.
8: Pivot the bar forward to lock it again on the rail.

Training advice: Keep your chest straight, the chest out, and look forward throughout the exercise.
Do not go down the bar too low.
Do not start the series from the low position of the movement.
Do not train until failure with this exercise.

Training advice.caption: Like the shoulder developed in front of the Smith Machine, it is possible to do this standing exercise to more solicit the muscles of the abdominal belt.

name: Horizontal extension of the shoulders with elastic

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used to the horizontal extensions of the shoulders with elastic.

How to make the horizontal extensions of: 1: Stand up, with your back straight, and hold the elastic labande with your arms stretched in front of you, up to your chest.
2: Discard the elastic by bringing your shoulder blades together while bringing your hands backwards.
3: Return slowly to the starting position and repeat the movement to make the number of rehearsals desired.

Training advice: Do not move your head forward during the spacing.Your head must always be in a neutral position.
Avoid release of the elastic band to keep the muscles under tension.

By performing an external rotation of the shoulders and a supination of the forearms (by turning the palms upwards), you can effectively accentuate the mobilization of the rotator cuff, more than if you perform this exercise in pronation (palms down).The external rotation has the effect of opening the shoulder joint, which makes it a perfect exercise for those who usually feel a feeling of "pinch" in the front of the shoulder when they carry loads.

Training advice.caption: The horizontal extensions of the shoulders with a buckle elastic.

image_src_note.caption: Muscles used with machine hip thrust.

How to make the machine hip by machine?: 1: Load the discs on the machine bars.
2: Sit in the machine, your feet well in support on the footrest, and ledos in contact with the folder.
3: Adjust the depth of the placement of the feet so that the foam roll used to lift the load arrives at the level of the hips.
4: Inspire and a movement starting from the heels, contract your glutes to go up the load by expiring.
5: Perform a voluntary contraction of the glutes in high position, then slowly return to the starting position.
6: Repeat the movement until you have reached the number of repetitions desired.

Training advice: Start with a light charge to familiarize yourself with movement and sensations.
Make sure that your back does not stop throughout the movement.
Your body must form a straight line in high position, shoulders, passing through hips to the knees.

Some machines are equipped with a safety lever.To unlock it, contract your glutes until you reach the high position and then remove security.Remember to put it back before the end of your last rehearsal.
Make slow and controlled movements, on a maximum amplitude.

If you feel like Vosquadriceps (the front of the thigh) work too much, your feet may be too close to your hips.If you keep them away from the body, the workload will be transferred to the legs and buttocks.If you keep them too far away, the glutes will be less asked and the hamstrings will be more asked.

Training advice.caption: Hip Thrust with machine extension machine.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked for the squat with Landmine.

How to make the squat with Landmine?: 1: Standing, feet apart from the width of the shoulders, raise the load to the waist.
2: Then lift the bar to the front porting position.Use both hands to hold the bar at the chest height.
3: Inspire and contract your abdominal strap and glutes.
4: Fold the hips and knees to squat as low as your mobility allows it.
5: Take a break at the bottom then push on your feet to go up in the starting position.
6: Repeat until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Do not hesitate to interfere your hands for better socket.
Do not let your knees go inside at any time.

As the video below shows, you can start loading a bar by putting it on a fairly high bench or support.This tip allows you to work with a much heavier load without having to sometimes lift it clumsily from the ground.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked with VRKSASANA.

How to make VRKSASANA?: 1: Stand up, stretch the front of the body by engaging the trunk, lifting the pelvis upwards, lifting the psoas muscles, opening the chest and the rib cage, bringing the shoulders behind and far from the ears, inHaving the neck relaxed and finally by stretching your arms down, on the side of your body.Stay in this posture, variant of the mountain posture, set foot.
2: Focus on your breathing and make sure that the alignment of the shoulders above the hips and hips above the ankles is maintained.Stay in this position for about 2 or 3 breaths.
3: From there, inspire and place the left foot inside the right thigh (at the groin).Make sure that the right foot is well anchored, that the ball joint is raised and that the left hip is neutral.
4: By making flexible movements, relax your hands, inspire and lengthen the arms, bringing them up, above your head.Exhale and bring your hands back to the Namaste position Mudra (gesture of prayer).

5: First learn to feel comfortable with balance by inspiring and expiring slowly.Then, when you are ready, enter the navel (engage the abdominal muscles), bring the pelvis up, open the chest, engage the upper part of the abdomen and the rib cage, then start to lie down,From the basin to the neck.By keeping your arms long and engaged, align your shoulders on the hips and hips on the ankles.Stay in this position by breathing gently and deeply up to 3 or 4 times.
6: To relax, exhale by lowering your arms, and bringing the left leg down.
7: Return to the Detadasana posture variant, feet apart, and repeat the steps on the other side.

Training advice: Place the foot anywhere along the interior of the standing leg, except on the knee.If you press the knee, you may destabilize the joint and your posture.

Do not hesitate to rely on a wall or a chair to put you in position.The fact of slightly touching one hand on the wall or even holding near a wall will give you confidence in case you lose your balance.
If your balance is precarious, place your foot on your calf or keep your toes on the floor and place your heel just above the opposite ankle.
You can put your balance to the test by practicing this posture with your eyes closed.
If you have the fragile lower back, try this posture against a wall at first.

name: Extension de la hanche à la pulley basse

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités avec les extensions de la hanche à la pulley basse.

Comment faire les extensions de la hanch: 1: Commencez par attacher une sangle de cheville sur une pulley basse.
2: Keeping the right torso and the stretched leg, exhale by expanding the hip and pull the cable back.
3: Hold the position for a second and contract the gluteal muscles.
4: Inspire by bringing your leg back to the starting position.
5: Repeat the movement until you have made the number of repetitions planned.
6: Repeat the exercise with the other leg.

Training advice: Stand the machine to keep your body stable.
Do not launch your leg back and forth.Keep control of the movement.
You may notice that by making a slight external rotation of the worked leg, you will get better activation of the glutes.
This exercise is ideal for warming up and establishing the connection between the brain and the gluteal muscles before compound exercises like the squat or the earth lifting.

name: Extensions des triceps à la pulley haute à la corde

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités aux extensions des triceps à la pulley haute à la corde.

Comment faire les extensions des triceps: 1: Attachez une corde à une pulley aussi haute que possible et mettez-vous en position debout.

2: Put your feet in front of each other, and grab the rope above your head with a neutral socket (palms face to face), then lean forward by tilting by the hips. Let's like themovement by extending the elbows and bending the triceps.
3: Pull the rope forward and down until the elbows are almost locked, then slowly return to the starting position.
4: Repeat the movement to the desired number of repetitions.

Tips for extensions of triceps with high: If you want to maintain greater tension in the triceps, do not completely block your elbows.
Do not let the rope pull you back or get you to arrange at the lumbar column.
You may have to enter your chin slightly to allow the rope to pass over your head and do not touch the back of your head.
Make sure that the shoulder blades do not bow forward when you keep the elbows.

name: Tirage incliné à la pulley haute

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités au tirage incliné à la pulley haute.

Comment faire le tirage inclin\u00e9 \u0: 1: Place a bench in front of the pulleys so that your head is close to the pulley, as shown in the illustration, and set it up to an inclination of approximately 45 degrees.

2: Réglez la pulley avec une barre attachée suffisamment basse pour que vous puissiez l’attraper confortablement, mais suffisamment haute pour que vous puissiez maintenir la tension de la pulley lorsque vous êtes assis avec les bras tendus au-dessus de votre tête.
3: Enter the bar with your hands apart from the width of spa, keep your shoulders back, the upper chest and engage your dorsals.
4: By lighting the elbows slightly, go down them until your arms are at the chest.
5: Raise your arms slowly until they are almost tense above your head and repeat the movement until you reach the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: You can also use an EZ bar or a rope to perform this exercise.
This exercise is not intended for strength work.Make slow and controlled movements to feel the contraction and stretching of back muscles.
Preferably use a load that you can master with a good execution on at least 6 to 8 repetitions.

Training advice.caption: Bring your arms back as much as possible to recruit as many muscle fibers as possible.

name: Extension des calves à la presse

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités avec les extensions des calves à la presse.

Comment faire les extensions des calves: 1: Load the machine with the desired weight quantity and take place.
2: Sit down and place your feet on the platform by spreading them out of the shoulder width.
3: Take a great inspiration, stretch your legs, keeping the locked safety (if possible).
4: Place your feet at the bottom of the platform.
5: Réalisez une flexion avec les muscles des calves afin de développer la charge. Poussez aussi loin que possible !
6: Bring the weight back to the starting position with an extension of the calves.
7: Repeat this movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: It is possible to make this movement with a greater amplitude by leaving the heels in the void and pushing with the front of the foot.
By orienting the toes slightly outwards, you can focus on the inside of the calves, and orienting them slightly inward, you can accentuate the work on the outside of the calves.
Be extremely careful when you position your feet on the platform.If the security is not in place and you lose control of the latter, you may injure yourself.
Make slow and controlled rehearsals.Limit the momentum and mark a stop at the top to accentuate the contraction.
If you experience any pain or pressure at the back of the knee joint, keep a slight knee bending and avoid locking it completely.

name: Developed to the ground with Kettlebell

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked for the developed to the ground with Kettlebell.

How to do the developed to the ground wi: 1: Start in the position lying on the side with a kettlebell on each side of the body.
2: Get the handle of a kettlebell with both hands and turn slowly on your back.
3: With your free hand, enter the other kettlebell and develop them by contracting your triceps and the pectoral muscles.
4: Go back to the starting position and repeat the movement to the desired number of rehearsals.

Advice for the developed to the ground w: Maintain a greater tension in the pectorals by not completely locking the elbows.
Hold the handle of the Kettlebell slightly tilted at an angle of 45 degrees to keep the elbows in a neutral position.
Do not let the kettlebells collide at the top, it can remove tension on the pectorals and also be potentially dangerous if you lose your stability in the shoulder.
Do not bounce the elbows on the ground at the end of the rehearsal.You may hurt yourself due to the compression forces generated between weight and soil.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested from traction assisted with elastic.

How to do the traction assisted with ela: 1: Set an elastic on a traction bar.
2: Place a foot inside the band.Put on the other leg and catch the traction bar while holding it with a minimum spacing of the shoulders.
3: Tying your legs;Keep the ears far from the shoulders.
4: Contract the large backbone muscles and hoist your body straight to the bar.
5: When you approach the bar with the elbows at a 90 degree angle, contract the upper back to pass your chin over the bar.
6: Return to the starting position by lowering your body in a controlled manner.
7: Repeat the exercise until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Advice for traction assisted with elasti: There are elastic bands with several levels of resistance.If you have several, start with the elastic with the most important resistance and decrease as your level of strength increases.
Take advantage of the elastic force to accentuate eccentric work by going back down as slowly as possible.This approach will allow you to quickly.

name: Dandayamana yoga mudrasana (posture of the standing yoga seal)

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked with Dandayamana Yoga Mudrasana.

How to do Dandayamana Yoga Mudrasana?: 1: To start the posture of the standing yoga seal, you must put yourself in the mountain posture, which consists in standing with your feet attached and hands placed on each side, the palms touching the outside of the thighs.
2: Inhale by placing your arms behind you and intertwining your fingers together.Return the shoulder blades closer to each other, open your chest and look up.
3: Then exhale and while holding your relatively tense legs, lean your upper body towards the floor by making a rocking movement from the hips.
4: Let your head relax from the neck.
5: Keep your arms and legs stretched.If you feel that the weight is found in the heels, try to slightly transfer your weight forward.
6: Breathe and keep this position for 4 to 8 breaths.
7: To release, raise the upper body in a standing position, keeping the shoulder blades tightly against the other, then release the hands and bring your arms back to the body of the body.

Training advice: It is advisable to stretch and warm up a bit before making this posture.

People with stiff hamstrings, limitations in the lower back or tension in the chest and shoulders will find this posture difficult.It can be changed for people with constraints in the lower back, spreading their feet more or slightly folding the knees.

As you get used to this posture and you will be more comfortable, you can try to tender the legs and arms even more to optimize stretching.Return your feet closer if you want to further increase the difficulty.
The posture of the standing yoga seal is contraindicated for people with unmanaged hypertension or for those with back, legs, neck or shoulder injuries.
Pregnant women must also refrain from practicing this posture.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted in the chin draw with kettlebell.

How to make the chin draw with Kettlebel: 1: Stand up, your feet apart from the width of the shoulders, keeping the knees slightly bent and tightening the musclesabdomine.
2: Take a kettlebell by grabbing the handle with two hands.The kettlebell must be positioned in the middle of your legs.
3: Lightly bring your shoulders backwards, then pull the kettlebell to the chin.Your elbows will have to be aligned or slightly higher than your shoulders.
4: Reduce the kettlebell slowly to the starting position, keeping the shoulders back and mastering the load.Maintain a slight bend of the elbows in the low position.
5: Repeat the exercise until you have done the desired number of rehearsals.

Advice for chin draw with kettlebell: Pulling your shoulders backwards will also help you keep your back straight throughout the exercise, as you must avoid internal rotation of the shoulders and not arrange the spine.Keeping the neutral spine will be easier if you hold the abdominal and lesser -aged strap.Although it is an exercise for the upper body, you should feel a certain tension everywhere in your body.
By pulling your elbows above the shoulder level, you will engage more the trapezoid muscles.
Always pull the kettlebell near your body.If your kettle is too far from the body during the draw, the tension will be moved forward to the shoulders.
If you hold your arms down the movement, you lose the tension applied to the deltoid muscles.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested from Cuban rotations.

How to make Cuban rotations?: 1: Stand up standing by holding a dumbbell in one hand.
2: Raise your elbow at the shoulders and let the dumbbell hang directly down, the elbow folded at a 90 degree angle.
3: By keeping your elbow in this position, exhale while lifting the dumbbell until your head is in external rotation of your shoulder.
4: Inspire by slowly lowering the dumbbell to the starting position.
5: Repeat this movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.
6: Repeat the exercise with the opposite arm.

Training advice: You can also do the Cuban rotation with dumbbells with both arms at the same time, either simultaneously or alternately.
Use light dumbbells because the targeted muscle is relatively small.Light loads will also allow you not to risk injuring yourself in the shoulder joint.
You can also use a pulley, elastic or small bodybuilding discs to carry out this exercise.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the shoulder with Kettlebell.

How to do the shoulder with Kettlebell?: 1: Put yourself in a standing position and enter a kettlebell with a neutral socket.
2: Perform a biceps bending (curl) to place the kettlebell at your shoulder, hand in pronation.
3: Develop the kettlebell above your head until the shoulder reaches a complete flexion and the elbow is tense.
4: Slowly go down the Kettlebell to the starting position and repeat the movement to the number of repetitions planned, then change your arms.

Advice for the developed shoulder with K: It is possible to make a small leg bending to help you develop heavier loads.
If the kettlebell bothers you in the low position, hold it in neutral intake and make a rotation by developing the load to the high-hand position in pronation (palm forward).
Do not let your head advance excessively.
Keeping your elbows slightly folded at the top and not locking them completely helps maintain a certain tension on the shoulders.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the posture of the dragonfly.

How to make the posture of the dragonfly: 1: Start putting from the mountain.Put your weight in your right leg and cross your left leg above the knee so that your tibia is parallel to the ground.
2: Fold your right knee at an angle of about 90 degrees, as if you were sitting on a chair, and turning your upper body to the right.
3: Place the plantar vault of your left foot as close as possible to the left armpit or at least on the Middle Detriceps.By placing your foot up on your arm, you will get better stability.

4: Place both hands on the floor and press the back of your left arm on your right thigh.The left arm supports the left leg and, ideally, you will use your bust to avoid resting the body weight on the right arm.

5: Start the right leg and allow him to act as a "stop" for the left foot, providing her with solid support.Maintain the position for 5 to 10 breaths before replacing the two feet on the ground and returning to the mountain posture.
6: Repeat the exercise on the other side.

Training advice: It is necessary to warm up completely before embarking on this posture, because it requires extreme flexibility of hips and hamstrings.Do not try to force your joints to fold when they are not ready.
If you try to do this posture without being flexible enough, you may find it difficult to keep your foot on your arm.This can cause a fall forward.

Do not be surprised if both sides are very different.Many factors come into account so that this posture is successful, but the opening of hips is the factor that can make the posture accessible on one side but not on the other.

There is not really a version for beginners, but Parsvabakasanaest a good preparatory installation.It allows you to feel how you will have to turn your torso and how far you will need to lean forward to peel off your feet from the ground.
Avoid this posture if you suffer from dudos, hips, shoulders, wrists or neck injuries.This posture is not recommended during pregnancy.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the cat and the cow.

How to make the posture of the cat and t: 1: Start by getting on all fours on your hands and knees.Make sure the wrists are parallel, shoulders and knees aligned with hips.Keep the musclesabdominal, and the neutral spine.This is the starting position.Now take a deep inspiration.
2: Exhale and pull the spine upwards, while entering the navel towards the spine.
3: Release the tension in the neck and bring the chin to the chest.The installation should look like a cat that stretches.
4: Inspire, relax the belly and stop your back.Bring the coccyx to the ceiling while straightening the head.Do not exercise pressure on the neck.This is the posture of the cow.
5: Continue back and forth from the cat to the cow and associate conscious breathing with each movement.Inspire during the cow posture and exhale during the cat posture.

Training advice: Repeat these cat and cow postures on a minimum of 10 series or until the abs, the hips, the spine and the neck are completely heated to benefit from all the advantages of these movements.
Make a few series of these postures from the cat and the cow early in the morning or after long periods of seat.You will walk more straight and have a better posture throughout the day!
None of these stretches should be painful.If this is the case, stop and make these postures in a softer, less supported way.
After this warm -up, you can continue to strengthen your back with exercises like Lebird Dogou the exercise of the board.

name: Developed shoulders at the Smith Machine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked with the Smith Machine shoulders.

How to make the Smith Machine shoulders?: 1: Prepare to do the shoulders on the Smith Machine by placing a bench inside, then adjusting the backrest to a 90-degree angle.
2: Sit on the bench and adjust the position so that the bar descends comfortably right in front of your face.
3: Then add the weights you want to use and sit on the bench.
4: Port the bar with the weights and slightly fold the elbows.This is the starting position for the movement.
5: Slowly lower the bar until it is just below the height of the chin, take a break, then go up the bar to the starting position without blocking the elbows at the top of the movement.
6: Repeat the movement until you have made the desired rehearsals.

Training advice: Do not hesitate to test the trajectory of the vacuum bar to make sure that it is neither too close nor too far away.
Do not lock your elbows at the top of the movement.
Always start by warm up (joint and specific warm -up) to reduce the risk of shoulder injury.
One of the most common errors is not to use all the amplitude of movement.This problem usually occurs when you try to go too fast or lift too much weight.

Another option is to make the development shoulder in a standing position rather than in a seated position.You remove the bench and you stand under the bar of the Smith Machine.In this way, you will ask for additional work from your abdominal strap to stabilize your bust.

Training advice.caption: The developed standing for deltoids with a guided machine, also called

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the crescent moon.

How to make the posture of the Moon Cres: 1: Start in tadasana, standing, feet attached, with hands along the body.
2: Take a big step forward with your left leg, keeping your foot flat on the ground.
3: Lightly flex the left knee, aligning the knee.Your right leg remains slightly bent in the back.
4: Placez vos mains sur vos hanches et redressez votre torse .
5: Poussez avec vos mains pour déplacer vos hanches vers le bas et vers l’avant .
6: Inspire deeply and raise your arms over your head, extending your fingers to the sky.
7: By expiring, lower your chest forward, bending the left knee while keeping the knee aligned with the ankle.
8: If you wish, you can slightly tilt your torso back to intensify the stretching.
9: Hold the posture for 30 seconds to 1 minute, breathing deeply.
10: To return to the starting position, inspire and push with the left foot to come back in a standing position.
11: Repeat on the other side by changing the leg.

Training advice: Discover your foot back far enough for the heel of your foot to be above the sole on your foot.
Work on the mobility of your hip to get a better posture in the low slots.

If you have trouble maintaining the balance, you can place your hands on the hips or on a stable support.You can also keep your hands on the ground or place them on yoga bricks or blocks on each side of your front foot.

To take full advantage of the benefits of Anjaneyasana, try to practice it regularly.Integrate this posture into your yoga sequence or create a specific practice to work on the strength and flexibility of hips and legs.
After practicing Anjaneyasana, take a few moments to lie on your back in Savasana (posture of the corpse) to allow your body and your mind to relax and integrate the benefits of the posture.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted in the sweater rack.

How to make the Rack Pull?: 1: Adjust your rack according to the desired height.
2: Enter the bar and put yourself in the classic earth lifting position.
3: Inspire and sheath your abdominal belt, glutes and handle.
4: Tighten the bar against your body, contract large backbone muscles and lift it.Strongly press your feet to the ground to generate impulse and power.
5: Bring the hips back forward and completely lock the movement at the top.
6: Stay tense and keep the load for a second in high position.
7: Go down the load to the starting position and exhale.
8: Repeat this movement until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: The most important thing, by far, is to make sure that your back is as neutral as possible throughout this exercise.You should avoid rounding your back and/or exaggerating the lower back camber.
As you improve, make sure to increase the load and not only limit yourself to descend the starting position of the movement.
To get a stronger commitment to your hamstrings and buttocks, try to vary the degree of rotation of your feet outwards.
If you also want to work your socket, hold the bar longer in a high position.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the Through sweater.

How to make the Through sweater with ela: 1: End the elastic to an anchor point in the low position and grab it with two hands between your legs.
2: Standing, move forward to create a certain tension on the band.

3: Let the elastic pull down until you can no longer keep your back straight.If you go down below, you will only stress your hips more stress and the bottom of your back without getting anything positive.

4: Then contract the glutes and tighten them as much as possible.Focus on working your glutes upwards and not just forward.This is the reason why you need to fix the elastic band in a low position and not up to your hips.
5: Repeat the movement until you make the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: The position of the feet is essential, and you need to open your hips to properly contract your glutes.To do this, adopt a duck position, feet pointing slightly outwards, and spread them from each other at the width of the shoulders.

To intensify your training, when you no longer have any strength to make an additional rehearsal, you can simply take a little step back and take some additional rehearsals that will help you work your glutes even more.
Do not hyperextension of the lower back in the high position when you contract your glutes.
Do not pull the elastic with your arms.Only glutes must work.
To make the exercise more difficult, use a thicker strip or keep yourself away from the anchor point.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted in the pulley sweater.

Comment faire le pull over \u00e0 la pul: 1: Fixez une corde à la pulley haute d’un appareil. Saisissez une extrémité dans chaque main et faites face à la poulie.
2: Bring back your shoulder blades back and down.Your chest should be well opened.
3: Flex the hips back until your chest forms an angle of 30 to 45 degrees.

4: Little from the machine a bit to feel a tension on the cable and be able to completely stretch your arms over your head.You should feel a stretch in the dorsals (the muscles located on the sides of the back).Place your feet with the lead width.
5: Slowly descend your arms to your sides by describing a circle arc, elbows locked, so that your hands are aligned with your legs, or just behind them.
6: Strongly contract your large backbone muscles and slowly return to the starting position.
7: Perform as much rehearsals as expected in your series.

Training advice: Keep a certain tone in Vosabdominelorsque you take the load to make sure you do not excessively arrange the spine.
Always keep a slight bending of the arms.This decreases tension on your elbows and reduces compression forces on your rotator cap.
Only your arms must be in motion in this exercise.Do not make a pendulum movement with the shoulders or the back to use the momentum to move the load to the hips.
This exercise is excellent at the start of the session to preheat the dorsals before making pull -ups.The sweater over is also perfect at the end of a dosen as long as a finishing exertion.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the air squat.

How to look squat?: 1: Stand up, your feet set off with the width of the offenders, the toes slightly turned outwards.Hold your arms along your side, look straight in front of you and shoot your shoulders down and back.Contract your abdominal strap.
2: Fold your knees, push your hips back and squat until your hips are at least at your knees and your thighs are parallel to the ground.Raise your arms forward at the shoulders to keep the balance.
3: Go down more if your mobility allows.Do not round the bottom of yourdos.Make sure your heels remain firmly planted on the ground.
4: Repeat yourself, completely extending your knees and hips at the top of each rehearsal.Lower your arms as you go up.

Training advice: Be sure not to round your back throughout the movement.
Do not let your shoulders move forward.Your upper body must remain motionless, and only your lower body should move.
When you make squats, you should feel that the movement is made by your legs and your fertures.If you feel any pain elsewhere, it means that you should correct your technique.
If you have pain in the lower back during or after making squats, this may be due to the fact that you lean your chest too much forward.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the side board with rotation.

How to make the side board with rotation: 1: Start in the side of side board with your right forearm on the ground.Make sure your shoulder is directly above your elbow, overlap your feet and lift your hips on the ground.
2: Lie your body from head to toe and stretch your left arm upwards.
3: By expiring, bring your left arm under your chest.You will feel your obliques getting involved to help you rotate.
4: Then inspire and unroll your body to reach out your left arm upwards again.
5: Perform the desired number of rehearsals and repeat the exercise on the other side.

Training advice: You should maintain a straight line from the head to hips to the feet.Keep your abdominal strap contracted and your fertures, to help you maintain good stability while you rotate.
To avoid any potential pain or injury in the neck, keep your head in the axis of your spine.Only your gaze should rotate when you hold your arm under you.
Try to turn as far as you can.The goal is to turn until your chest is parallel to the ground.
If you have trouble keeping your hips high throughout the exercise, focus on the reinforcement of obliques with the exercise of the classic side board.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested from weighted pull -ups.

How to make a weighted traction?: 1: Passez uneceinture de musculationchargée autour de votre taille. Les disques de weight training doivent être suspendus entre vos jambes lorsque vous vous tenez debout.
2: Enter a bar with a pronation, a width slightly higher than that of the Spales.
3: Hang the bar, your arms completely stretched.
4: Exhale by pulling your body up until your chin goes above the bar.
5: Hold on position one to two seconds by contracting the back muscles.
6: Inspire by going back down to the starting position, with your arms completely tense.
7: Repeat the movement until you make the number of repetitions planned.

Training advice: If you don't have a weighted belt, you can do weighted pull -ups with a dumbbell placed between your feet.

Having a good catch is crucial, because it is the only point of contact with the bar and it is there that all the force will be transmitted to climb.One of the most common errors is not to pay enough attention to how you hold the bar.The bar must be firmly entered to ensure that the hands do not slide and do not let go for the duration of the pulls.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the Split Squat with elastic.

How to make the Split Squat with elastic: 1: Holding the ends of an elastic in each hand, place the elastic on the ground in front of you and walk on it, the center of your foot firmly holding the elastic.
2: Descend in the slit position with the tip of the foot of your rear leg in contact with the ground, the two knees forming an angle of 90 degrees.

3: Adjust the resistance of the elastic according to your capacities by making turns at the level of the hands until the elastic is tense / slightly stretched (catch the elastic lower to increase the tension).
4: Keeping the upper chest, straight back and a straight posture (shoulders aligned with hips), get up to put yourself in high position, keeping your front leg stretched, but not locked.
5: Go back down in the low position, focusing on the descent from your rear knee to the ground, while focusing on the contraction of the quadriceps of your front thigh.
6: Repeat this movement from top to bottom until you have reached the number of rehearsals desired, then change the leg.

Training advice: You must make the movement with a certain tension from the start in the low position.If this is not possible, the resistance of your elastic is too important.
When you make leg flexions with your elastic, make sure it is well kept under your foot.A defeated band could jump up and hurt you.
All exercises with an elastic can be intensified using a more resistant elastic.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the pistol squat with suspension strap.

How to make the pistol squat with suspen: 1: Attach the straps to an anchor above your head, adjusting the length of the strips so that they hang in the middle of your body.
2: Enter the handles and stand up, the body facing the anchor point.
3: Back up until the suspension straps are completely tense.
4: Standing, feet apart from the width of the hips, stretch the right leg in front of you.
5: Keep the abdominal muscles contracted, the neutral spine and the arms completely tense in front of you.
6: Make a squat while holding your weight on the left heel.
7: Go up in a standing position, pushing with the left heel and maintaining a slight bending of the left knee.
8: Perform the number of repetitions fixed and repeat the exercise with the other leg to finish the series.

Training advice: We tend to shoot the suspension straps with our arms to return to the standing position during the squat pistol.This reduces the work and efficiency of the exercise to the detriment of the targeted area, namely the legs.The straps must be used sparingly, to avoid allowing balance or to relieve you on a small part of the movement, but they should not be used constantly.

Moving your weight forward is a common error during this exercise.Make sure that it is properly distributed: the body must move backwards and the weight must be placed on the heel of the squatting leg.
Another positioning error is not to keep the knee aligned with Lacheville, letting the knees sag to the inside or outside.
To avoid these errors, it may be useful to have someone next to you to check your movement and correct you if necessary.If this is not possible, watch your technique in a mirror.
Your arms must be stretched for the duration of the movement.
To intensify the exercise, it is possible to make a squat pistol with jump.This plumbing work will allow you to develop a great power in the legs.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with a sweater with bar.

How to make the sweater with bar?: 1: Place the bar at the end of the bench where your head will be, unless you have a partner to give it to you.Otherwise, you can also take the bar, sit on the bench and put yourself in position.
2: Lie along the bench or on its length.If you are lying in a perpendicular position, make sure that the top of your back is supported by the bench, with the basin lower than your shoulders.
3: Enter the bar with a width slightly higher than that of the shoulders and hold it directly above your chest, outstretched arm.
4: Flex the elbows slightly, then bring the bar behind your head, until you felt a good stretch at the level of the big backbones.
5: Bring back your elbows up using your dorsals, until your arms are slightly above you.
6: Repeat the movement until you make the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Start with a light charge to learn to master the technique.
Keep the brought abdominals and the stable body.This will help you prevent injury and give you additional stability to mobilize the bar.
Performing the sweater on a declined bench can increase the tension exerted on the dorsals.
Contract large backbone muscles at the top of the movement to maximize the recruitment of fibers and muscle contraction.
Use an EZ bar if you have pain in the wrists.
If you are a fan of Supersets, you can perform the sweater in Superset with the bench press.

Training advice.caption: The Superset Pull-Over with the bench press.

name: Dwi Pada Viparita Dandasana (inverted stick posture)

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the inverted stick posture.

How to make the inverted stick posture?: 1: Start lying down on your back.Fold your knees and place your feet on the ground spaced the width of the hips, a distance from one hand of the buttocks.
2: Raise your pelvis and fold your elbows by placing your hands on the carpet just behind your shoulders.
3: Take off the shoulders and head from the floor and hold your arms well.
4: Inspire and press your hands and feet to make the wheel.
5: When you are ready, evaluate the sensation of the lower back and if you feel good, start to drop the forearms slowly to the ground.
6: Miech your fingers behind the head.

7: Press the elbows, forearms and wrists on the ground to stabilize the posture.Remember to dig the armpits and attract the bicep to the other in an inward rotation.Return his chin slightly, engaging Jalandhara Bandha to protect the neck.
8: Gently advance one foot, then the other, until your legs stretch.Raise your chest by pressing the floor with the soles of your feet.Stay in this posture for a few breaths.
9: Push in the feet, by working the quadriceps until the legs straightens up.
10: To get out of this posture, bring your feet back.Gently let the top of your body go down to the floor and return to the starting position.

Training advice: Before you start this posture, first prepare your back, chest, hip flexors and shoulders.I suggest you practice 5 greetings in the sun has to warm you up, followed by 3 to 5 greetings in the sun B to warm the legs.

You can also add some posture of the Ietanjaneyasana warrior (low slit) to a short standing sequence.Join your hands behind your back and Prautaritta Padottonasana C to open your shoulders.Gomukhasana and Urdhva Danurasana are also excellent preparation postures to include in your sequence.
Place a small cushion or a soft blanket under your head.So, if you decide to extend the posture, you can put the top of your head when you need to rest.

Avoid this posture if you are pregnant, if you suffer from neck or shoulder injury, lumbar injuries, discs, if you are a novice in yoga or if you suffer from hypertension.If in doubt, ask a yoga teacher for advice.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested on the bench climbs.

How to climb on bench?: 1: Préparez un banc de weight training et une paire d’haltères que vous tiendrez sur le côté. Vous pouvez également utiliser un autre type de plate-forme surélevée.
2: Raise your left knee and climb on the platform with your left foot.
3: Once your foot is firmly placed on the surface, use your left heel to support and raise yourself.Place your right foot on the surface as well.
4: Take a short break, then go back with your right leg to come back carefully to the starting position.
5: Repeat this movement until the number of repetitions desired, then repeat it using your right leg.

Training advice: Keep the look up and back straight throughout the exercise.Never let your back round up.
To increase intensity and difficulty, use a higher platform.The higher the platform, the more intense the exercise.
Start by using little or no weight.This exercise requires a lot of balance and caution is in order.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the bear board.

How to make the bear board?: 1: As with a traditional board, put your hands on the floor, in the extension of the Executive, and place your back and your spine in a straight line.Stabilize your shoulders by bringing them to your waist.
2: Fold your knees at 90 degrees and your hips at 90 degrees to find yourself in the classic four -legged position.

name: Ardha Matsyendana (posture of the sitting torsion)

If the vertical draw you bother you in the wrists, use dumbbells instead, a pulley or put up the closet protectors, which exert less pressure on the wrists.
By lifting your elbows upwards, make sure that the head is not leaning forward.

How to make the leg curl declined with d: 1: Prepare a declined bench and choose a light dumbbell to get used to the movement.

Ask a training partner to place the dumbbell between your feet if you have trouble positioning it.

Focus on moving weight with your hamstrings using all the amplitude of movement.

Advice for military developed: For the military developed, start by using a bar with a load that you can control to make 2 to 3 series of 3 to 8 repetitions.Start with a light bar to master the technique before switching to a heavier bar.If you are a beginner, take an empty Olympic bar (20 kilos).
If you have shoulders during movement, try a wider grip.
Taking a great inspiration before starting the movement will help you stabilize your rib cage.Exhale when you lift the bar and inspire when you go down it.
If your bust oscillates too much, the load you are trying to lift is probably too heavy for your abdominal strap that cannot stabilize you.

Keep your ankles in back flexion.This allows your gastrocnemian to contribute as much as possible.If your ankles are not in back flexion, your gastrocnemians will be released and therefore unable to make a sufficient contribution.
The role of your arms in this exercise is only to prevent you from hitting your head on the bench.In other words, your hamstrings must do most of the work.Do not use your arms very little.

Training advice: You can keep your other right leg or bent.

Keep your hard bust.Your back should not arise and your pool should not switch.
Ideally, you should look for a straight line between your knees and your shoulders at the top of the movement.

Do not use an too heavy bar for unilateral hip thrust, as it can exert too much torsion (rotation force) on your lumbar vertebrae.If you want to take heavy, opt for the classic hip movement movement.So favor a light load with long series.

Comment faire les shrugs avec dumbbells: 1: Catch a pair of dumbbells, holding them along your body with a neutral socket (the palms turned to your thighs).

Training advice: The main advice to remember when you make shoulder rise is to imagine that you want to touch your ears with your shoulders.Of course, you can't really do it, and the amplitude of movement during an uprust is very low, but if you are mentally focused on this instruction, you will manage to perform the complete movement.

Remember not to use your arms when you raise your shoulders.You can keep your elbows slightly unlocked, but do not fold them (flexion) during movement, as it would amount to using the biceps to lift the load.This is not an exercise for the arms.

The dumbbells allow you to vary the exercise of the shoulder to change the position of your hands and arms compared to your body.One of the most popular variants is to hold the dumbbells in front of the body rather than on the sides.Some people find that they may lift more charges this way.
Another variant, less known, but just as excellent, is to hold the dumbbells behind the back (palms turned back).

Shrugs with dumbbells are generally standing, but an excellent variant that few people know is the seated shrug.The advantage is that the sitting version cannot be cheated, as the legs cannot be used to lift the dumbbells.

Another variant is the rise of dumbbells in the inclined position.It is carried out with the chest and belly leaning on a very inclined bench.With this inclination, you can do a “secret” exercise used by many bodybuilders and fitness athletes to develop both the upper trapeze and the average trapeze (between the shoulder blades).

The biggest error about shrug with dumbbells is to believe that it is better to roll your shoulders back and forth when you make the movement.This advice has been circulating in the bodybuilding rooms for decades, but it is enough to think about the orientation of the force of gravity to realize that the movement of shift in this way does not allow the different parts to workTrapezius, including the upper and medium trapezius, as we imagine.

The grip force is often a limiting factor during a series of shrugs, which is why many practitioners use lifting straps.Unless you intentionally want to train to strengthen your grip, there is no shame in using bodybuilding straps.

Heavy shrugs may have a slight risk of tension in the lower back.People with history of low backgrounds and those who wish to make shifts as heavy as possible must take this into account.The variant where the dumbbells are held in front of the thighs represents the most risky posture, because the body is slightly deported forward.This is why the version in neutral intake is generally recommended in general (this is undoubtedly the safest version).

A great way to guarantee good technique and make the exercise more difficult is to do maximum contraction for at least two seconds, or even three seconds to obtain a really vigorous maximum contraction.If you can't hold at all at all, this is a sign that you may be using too much weight.

3: Exhale and slowly fold your knees forward while moving your hips and your coccyx lightly back;

9: Perform Uttanasana 5-6 times, from 3 to 4 times a day.

Keep LEDOSET the right neck during the whole series.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with neutral tractions.

How to make the neutral taken out pulls?: 1: Raise your arms and enter the bar over your head using a neutral socket (palms of the hands face to face).
