5: Drive slowly to the starting position in which your arms are stretched again.
6: Repeat this movement until you have made the number of repetitions planned.

Training advice: Some bodybuilding devices or stations have tight, semi-tight or wide handles.Using different positions, you can get a more complete muscle development of all the back parts and avoid getting bored.

Imagine that your hands are hooks and focus on pulling your elbows down and back, gripping your back slightly, opening your chest and tightening your shoulder blades against each other,In order to stimulate your large backbones as much as possible.

Be sure to exercise in a controlled manner, in order to obtain a strong muscle contraction.If you do your rehearsals too quickly, or if you use the Kipping, you may be able to perform more rehearsals, but that does not guarantee that you will get better muscle development.

If you cannot do without assistance at the start, you can start with several variants to help you develop the necessary strength.Among these, let us quote Lestractions assisted with elastic, the tractions assisted with a partner and latractions assisted with bench (or a chair).If you have trouble doing neutral shooting, train with vertical outlet tight.
Once you have acquired the force necessary to make series of about 12 repetitions with your body weight, you can use a ballast belt to add a bodybuilding disc.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the half-grove.

How to make the posture of the semi-gren: 1: Lie on your belly, forearms on the ground, head and bust.
2: Flex the right knee to bring the heel to the corresponding buttock.
3: By pressing the left forearm on the floor, stretch your right hand back to catch the raised foot.
4: Slide your fingers gently to the toes and rotate the elbow upwards.
5: By wrapping your fingers on the toes, bring your foot to the hip.
6: Inhale by lifting the chest and exhale by pressing the foot to the floor to deepen the posture.
7: Inspire by holding the left arm and pressing the left hand towards the ground.
8: Look down and keep the posture, breathing normally.
9: Hold the posture for at least five breaths.
10: Exhale by relaxing the hand and the foot and repeat the posture on the opposite side.

Training advice: The folded knee should be aligned with the hip.
Press the foot only to feel stretching and not pain in the knee.
Hold your foot by the inside, then slide your fingers to reach the toes.

A bolts are the best support for this Asana, especially for beginners.Place a bolts under the lower ribs while lifting the top of the torso.It provides additional support to the body and facilitates uprising.Then place the arm that supports you in front of the bolts.
If necessary, you can wrap a strap around the raised foot.So, rather than reaching the foot with one hand, you can hold the strap to stretch the leg.
Inform your yoga teacher if you have problems in the neck, back, offices, hips or knees.
If you suffer from hernia, it is best not to try Ardha Bhekasana.Also avoid it if you recover from recent surgery in the back or belly.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with Jumping Jack.

How to make Jumping Jacks?: 1: Standing, the legs apart from the width of the epaules.Keep ledosdroit and the musclesabdominal controlled throughout the exercise.Your arms are positioned on the sides.
2: Make a jump simultaneously by spreading your legs and swinging your arms over your head.
3: When your feet touch the ground, return immediately to the starting position by bringing your arms back to the sides.
4: Repeat these movements until you have reached the number of repetitions or the duration provided for the exercise.

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités au développé épaules avec dumbbells assis.

Comment faire le d\u00e9velopp\u00e9 \u0: 1: Prenez des dumbbells au sol et placez-les sur vos genoux si vous faites la version assise sur un banc.

2: Avec un mouvement maîtrisé, effectuez une flexion desbicepspour lever les dumbbells en position de départ. Si vous êtes assis, vous pouvez vous aider des genoux afin de vous aider à mettre chaque haltère en place.
3: Orient your palms of hands so that they are turned forward.
4: Inspirez profondément puis poussez les dumbbells au-dessus de votre tête en tendant les bras et en contractant les muscles deltoïdes.
5: Redescendez ensuite lentement les dumbbells en position de départ.
6: Repeat the movement until you have made the number of repetitions required.

Training advice: Raise the dumbbells vertically.The current error in beginners is to move the dumbbells too far on the sides, which can make you lose your balance and exert unnecessary pressure on your shoulders.
Do not lock your elbows in high position.
The back must be straight throughout the execution.Do not stop your back or round it.

Check the movement and avoid offending the dumbbells against each other at the top of the movement.This is particularly dangerous with heavy loads, as it can make you lose control of the trajectory and cause an injury.
The sitting position reduces the possibilities of cheating.Indeed, it is more difficult to move the torso or to use a leg movement to give you momentum.

It is possible to do this standing exercise which allows you to solicit the muscles of the abdominal strap at the same time.And if you want to maximize the recruitment of oblique muscles, test the version of the shoulders with the unilateral dumbbells.

Training advice.caption: The variant of the shoulders with unilateral standing dumbbells.

name: Extensions des calves assis à la Smith machine

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités avec les extensions des calves assis à la Smith machine.

Comment faire les extensions des calves: 1: Prepare yourself by placing a flat bench in the center of the Smith Machine and placing a step or a hold under the bar if possible.
2: Lower the bar and add the load you want to use.
3: Sit at the end of the flat bench, the thighs under the bar and the toes on the step or the board, the heels during the end.
4: Unlock the bar and let your heels go down as low as possible.This is the starting position.
5: Slowly go up your heels as far as possible, take a break, then go slowly back into the starting position.

Training advice: Work with a slow and regular rhythm.
Raise your toes as high as possible and perform a maximum contraction for 1 to 2 seconds to intensify the effort.
Alternate your sessions with heavy series with few repetitions (8 maximum) and long series with the maximum repetition.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with leg curl elongated with elastic.

How to make the leg curl lying with elas: 1: Attach the elastic band to an anchor on the ground.
2: End the end on your ankles.There are accessories that will allow you a quick and comfortable attachment.If you don't have one, simply wrap the elastic band around your ankles.
3: Lie flat belly on the ground.
4: Flex your legs without raising your hips or lower back, your hips will stay on the ground throughout the exercise.
5: Return slowly to the starting position and repeat the movement to the number of rehearsals desired.

Training advice: If you feel that the resistance is too strong, get closer to the anchor point of the elastic (without completely relaxing it) or opt for a smaller elastic.
If you feel that you slip on the floor, use a yoga carpet or use your hands to keep you on the ground, but always keep your hips on the ground.
Your elastic must be stretched from the start of the movement.Otherwise, your muscles will not work on a complete amplitude of motion.
It is possible to place a small cushion under the pool for more comfort.

name: Vertical draw in the Hammer Strength machine

image_src_note.caption: Muscles contacted in vertical print in supination in the Hammer Strength machine.

How to make this vertical drawing of the: 1: Sit on the seat and firmly wedge the cushions against the top of Vosquadriceps.
2: Raise your arms, enter the handles of the machine with a supination.
3: Contract the back muscles and tighten the shoulder blades against each other, then draw the two handles down simultaneously until they touch the middle of your chest roughly.
4: Raise slowly until you have tense arms.
5: Repeat the movement until you make the number of repetitions fixed.

Training advice: If your loose plug before your back and your vosbiceps, do not hesitate to use Musculation Dessangles the latest series.
Some people find that they can improve the mobilization of back and biceps muscles, decrease shoulders' involvement and pull more loads using an inch outlet.
Do not let the momentum facilitate movement, unless you practice a particular technique such as forced removal.
Keep your shoulders low and tight for the duration of the rehearsal.
The realization of this unilateral exercise generally allows you to work with heavier loads, but also to make movements with a greater amplitude.

Training advice.caption: The variant of the unilateral vertical draw to the machine.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles solicited at the developed with chains.

How to do the developed with channels?: 1: Select the load you want and load the bar.Once the bar is loaded, attach chains to the bar to add additional resistance.
2: Lie flat on a bench and place your hands just outside the shoulder width.
3: Place your shoulder blades by hugging them and pushing them into the bench.
4: Breathe deeply and let your training partner help you lift the bar to maintain a certain tension in the upper back.
5: Let the bar stabilize and make sure the upper back remains well contracted once the bar is removed.
6: Inspire and let the bar go down slowly, bending the elbows.
7: Go down the bar in a straight line to the base of the sternum and touch your chest.
8: Go up the bar in a straight line by pressing the bench, pushing the feet in the ground to engage the legs and stretching the elbows.Make the desired number of rehearsals.

Advice for the developed with channels: Make sure that the chains are well fixed at the ends of the bar and that some links still affect the floor at the top of the movement.

By adding chains to the bar, you will allow yourself to overload the upper half of the movement since the chains lie down and add the most weight at the top of the movement.This allows you to use a weight that you might not be able to manage for a complete repetition, but given the variable resistance of the chain, you will not be blocked at the start of the movement.
With attached channels, the bar will be much less stable.Be aware of it and be ready to control it when you get it out of the rack.

The developed with chains uses the same technique as the conventional bellied developed.If you want more advice on the right technique with a bellied developed, you can read the article on the bench press.

name: Developed sitting the machine for pectorals

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked with the machine developed seated for pectorals.

How to make the machine developed for pe: 1: Adjust the height of the seat so that when you sit on the machine, the handles are placed almost halfway up the pectorals.
2: Use the pedal (if it exists) to lift the weight battery to the starting position where you can easily grasp the handles without excessively stretching your pectorals and shoulders.
3: Hold the handles slightly more apart than the shoulder width as for the standard bench press.
4: From the starting position, push towards the handles until your arms are completely tense in front of you.
5: Reduce your arms slowly in the starting position and repeat the exercise until you have done the desired number of repetitions.
6: When you have finished your series, if your device is equipped with a pedal, use it to easily rest the weight battery without stretching your pectorals or forcing on your shoulders too much.

Training advice: When you make the movement, keep the chest high, with a slight camber in the back.Keep your back against the cushion and do not place your shoulders forward or do not round the top of your back.
Focus on the contraction of your pectoral muscles throughout the movement.
The majority of developed machines seated for pectorals offer two choices of taking.Neutral socket activates pectorals more than deltoids above all, keeping the triceps engaged.
Machines can be bilateral or unilateral.Unilateral machines allow each arm to work independently, which gives you the opportunity to work an arm at a time or alternate with each rehearsal.

If you want to intensify a training session on a seated developed machine and add a surplus of intensity, the Drop Sets technique is particularly suitable.You don't even need to get up from your seat to unload the weights.Just pull the pin, adjust a lighter load and continue to make more repetitions!
It is also possible to work with bodybuilding elastics in order to work the explosiveness of pectoral muscles.This practice is however reserved for experienced practitioners.

Training advice.caption: The developed machine seated for pectorals with elastic to increase muscle work.

Training advice: Depending on the machine, you will have the possibility of taking a wide intake, an average socket or even a tight socket.If you choose a tight socket, it will become the equivalent of a tight -knit developed and make your triceps work more.However, avoid taking a too large plug, as this can limit the amount of weight you can manage.

On many pectoral bodybuilding devices, including Hammer Strength devices, you cannot stay blocked at the bottom.If you fail a rehearsal, you can simply rest the load.On other machines, the handles can be positioned behind your body.It is therefore possible to stretch excessively and strongly solicit your shoulders or your pectorals if you do not use the control pedal or if you do not adjust the machine correctly depending on the length of your arm.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with the machine sitting in the machine.

How to make the machine sitting in the m: 1: Load the machine with the desired amount of weight.
2: Adjust the height of the seat so that the lever is close to the Epaules axis.
3: Sit on the machine your back well in support against the seat.
4: Place the elbows on the cushions and enter the bar by behind.
5: Pull the lever forward and down until the elbows are on each side of the body.
6: Come back slowly until the shoulders are fully flexed or the arms are parallel to the chest.
7: Repeat the movement until you make the number of repetitions planned.

Training advice: The amplitude of movement depends on the individual flexibility of the shoulders.So don't go back too much if it gets too much on your shoulders.

Make this exercise rather at the end of the encestors for the dospour destroy your large backbone muscles.If you do it at the start of the session, you may burn your strength and have enough juice to make it from heavy prints.

name: SUPTA MATSYETRASANA (posture of the rotation of the lying spine)

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with Panta Matsyendrasana.

How to do Parta Matsyendrasana?: 1: Lie on your back, your arms stretched flat on the sides in the epaux axis.
2: Start your right leg in front of you and fold your left knee by tightening it against your chest.
3: Inspire and, by expiring, slowly bring your left knee to the ground level, on the right side of your body.Turn your head to the left and look at your left palm.
4: Hold this position for 1 to 2 minutes.
5: Slowly turn your head towards the center and straighten your chest and leg.
6: Repeat the posture on the opposite side.

Training advice: Make sure your two shoulder blades touch the ground, even if it means that your knee does not completely touch the ground.During the rotation, one of the shoulder blades will tend to take off from the ground.
Feel the stretching of your thigh, your groin, your arms, your neck, your belly and your back when you hold the posture.
Visualize your basin which turns on one side and the upper back which turns towards the opposite side.
If the bent knee is very far from the ground, place it on a support (folded towel or other).
Thisposure of Yoga is to avoid in the event of hip injury, back, or abdominalhernie.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the frog.

How to make the posture of the frog?: 1: Put on all fours, hands under your shoulders and knees under your hips.
2: Move your weight forward on your hands.
3: Slowly, move your knees to the sides, keeping them aligned with your hips.
4: Keep your knees folded and your ankles behind you, in the extension of your knees.
5: Turn your toes to the sides.

6: Build on your forearms, elbows under the shoulders, joining the palms of the hands or placing them on the ground.You can also extend your hands forward, placing your chin or forehead on the ground.

7: Stay here and breathe deeply for five to ten breaths or as long as your body wishes.Your breathing, as in all yoga postures, is an excellent guide.If you force too much on stretching, your breathing will be shorter and more forced.If you can take long, slow and deep breaths, this is an indication that stretching is suitable for your body.
8: Continue to open the hips while folding the legs.Lift your coccyx, stretch the bottom of your back and feel a deep stretch of the thighs and hips.

9: Hold this posture for a maximum minute.With training, you can hold it for 3 to 5 minutes.To release the posture, place your hands under your shoulders and gently bring your knees back to the center.Relax on your stomach or go to the child's laposture to the dog's downspout.

Training advice: Make sure your body is warm before making this posture.
Breathe deeply, focusing on the relaxation and relaxation of tensions.
If you feel intense tensions, rest in a comfortable position or in a restorative posture, such as the posture of the child or the laposture of the corpse.

One of the main advantages of the pose of the frog is deep stomach breathing.This is especially important when you deepen stretching at the basin level and adopt the posture.Resist the urge to hold your breathing.If the stretching seems too extreme and you react by breathing less, release stretching and find all your vigor in breathing.

If this posture is new to you or if your hips or knees are not very mobile, do not force your knees to deviate more to get closer to the ground.Lower your body only if you feel comfortable.As long as you feel stretching and you breathe deeply, this posture will be beneficial to you.

If your knees are sensitive, you can place a blanket below, or even fold the end of your yogapis more comfort.If the posture of the frog is too uncomfortable or if your hips and muscles fail to carry out the movement in its entirety, reduce the distance between your knees and do not drop your chest and your hips so close to the ground.You can also consider bringing your feet together to reduce the intensity of stretching.You can also place rolled blankets or bolts under your hips to support your body while you work to improve the flexibility of your thighs.
If none of these adaptations works, try the semi-grenouille laposture, where one leg is in the frog position and the other is tense backwards, allowing the torso and the belly to rest on the ground.

name: Lifted from earth to trap bar

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the lifting of the earth at the trap bar.

How to get the lifting from Trap Bar?: 1: Put your shoulders, hips and trunk in tension, inspiring and expiring before lowering yourself to the handles of the bar.
2: Fold the hips and knees to lower your body to the traction labarre.
3: Enter the handles of the hexagonal bar and engage your back muscles by rotating your arms so that the inner part of the elbow is front.

4: Raise your hips and turn them over until you feel a stretch in the back of your legs.Your hips must be higher than your knees and shoulders higher than your hips.All rehearsals must start in this position.

5: While maintaining the neutral spine, keep the hexagonal bar centered and start your movement up by pushing the ground with your feet.As you start to straighten, contract your glutes and let your hips move forward.

6: When your hips move forward, keep your arms stretched and finish the movement by tightening the buttocks while maintaining a neutral position of the spine.At the end of each rehearsal, your shoulders must arrive directly at the level of your hips.

7: Start the descent movement.When you lower to the starting position, focus to keep the centered trap bar and hold a neutral spine.Pivot your hips, letting your knees bend to bring the bar back to the ground.

8: Lorsque les disques de weight training atteignent le sol, la répétition est terminée. Si vous n’avez pas de disques sur la barre (barre à vide), abaissez la barre jusqu’à ce que vos mains atteignent la moitié de vos tibias.

Training advice: In order to prevent the bar from moving away from the body, you must focus on the contraction of your dorsals to keep the bar near you and allow it to move linearly.
The angle of the toes is very individual, it depends on the anatomy of your hip.Test (slightly or neutral toes) to see what suits you best.
Make sure that the hands are positioned in the middle of the handles to prevent the bar from bowing when you pull.

If you focus on keeping the weight entirely on the heels, you will not be able to effectively recruit your quadriceps at the start of the lifting movement and you will therefore be slow to take off.To avoid this, you need to focus on an entire foot push: 3 contact points are necessary: large toe, small toe and heel.

If you have difficulty performing the end of the movement, you should try to do this exercise in a squat cage with the bar placed up to the knees on the supports.On the other hand, if you are low on the ground, the use of bodybuilding elastic stored at the top of the squat cage can help you take off the ground bar.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked with Savasana.

How to do Savasana?: 1: Lie on your back, extended legs and relaxed arms on the sides.Let your feet take a natural position and put your hands with hands up.Close your eyes.
3: Let your body feel heavy on the ground.
4: Start to release each part of your body, organ and cells, consciously working with the soles of the feet at the top of the head.
5: Relax your face, feeling your eyes fall into their orbits and your jaw loosen.

6: To get out of the posture, gently bring your attention to your body.Start moving your fingers and toes.Eyes closed, fit their knees and roll slowly on the left or right side.Stop a moment and, inspiring, sit comfortably in a sitting position.
7: Take the peace and calm that you will find in this posture for the rest of your day with you.

Training advice: Spread your feet from the width of the hips and relax your arms next to you, the palms turned upwards.There are a lot of nerve endings at your fingertips, and when the palms are turned upwards, you do not feel any sensation in your fingers, and you remain more receptive and open.

Be in harmony and focused on yourself.If your mind begins to wander, try to focus on the sounds around you, then try to find the sound furthest until you find the sound closest to you.Then focus on your breathing.Once you recognize the surrounding sounds, the mind is more capable of relaxing.
Bring your whole being at this special moment.Kiss this Asana with open arms.

Create the conditions necessary for satisfactory and successful deep relaxation.Make your space clean, clear, comfortable, healthy and calm.If you are at home, find a room where you can close the door and be alone, even if it is only for a few minutes.Often, the weight of a blanket can allow you to root deeply on the ground and make your nervous system understand that you can relax safely.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the rower.

Comment utiliser un rowing machine ?: 1: Sit comfortably on the rower, the right back and the firm shoulders.Keep your arms straight and keep the handle well so that you can row effectively.
2: Place your feet in the toes to block them, so that they don't slip while you put.Once you are in this position, you are ready to start working.
3: Push with your feet using your legs to propel yourself backwards.Be sure to pull the cable via the handle with your arms while you grow with your legs back.
4: Once your legs are stretched, lean slightly back while pulling the handle near your chest with your arms.
5: The return phase is to get back in position to start the movement again.During this phase, let yourself slide forward and lean to pass the torso over the legs.

Training advice: Finding a good pace for breathing can really help you in your rowing training.Ideally, the pace of your breathing must correspond to the rhythm of your thrust.
Exhale gradually during the push, to expel the whole air remaining on arrival.Inspire during recovery.
Push with your thighs to propel yourself backwards.The arms must not work too early in the race, otherwise the upper body will get tired quickly, which could cause injuries.
Short movements will exhaust you after a few minutes on the rower.So be sure to go as far as possible backwards.
Unsurprisingly, the hands are put to the test while rowing.The bulbs generally develop first, followed by calluses.To avoid all these inconveniences, use a pair of bodybuilding.
If you need additional padding for your seat, try a folded towel.If your coccyx is really abused, make sure you are properly installed in the seat: the hollow of the seat in your coccyx.
Long and loose clothes will only be bothering when you are on the rower.Short and a curved t-shirt are ideal because they will not get stuck in the seat when you get back and go.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted in the sweater face.

How to face the sweater?: 1: Attachez une corde sur une pulley placée à peu près au niveau de la poitrine.
2: Enter the two ends of the rope with a pronation.
3: Back in order to keep the load with your arms completely stretched and stand up with your feet apart.Fold your knees slightly to ensure a certain stability.
4: Retract the shoulder blades and pull the rope to the face while spreading the elbows on the sides.Remember to spread the ends of the rope and not just to pull it back.
5: Maintain the high position for a second and descend slowly.
6: Repeat this movement until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Advice for the Sweater Face: Pull with your elbows, not with Vosbiceps.

Make sure your shoulder blades remain tight and tense throughout the movement.You have to try to "stick" them to each other.A tip is to imagine that you hold a golf ball between them and that you should not drop it on the ground.
You can use a high pulley or even a low pulley provided you adjust the angle of your body so that your elbows and the angle of the pulley are perpendicular to your torso.

Advice for the Sweater Face.caption: The sweater side with a high pulley.

name: Drag Curl at the Smith Machine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the drag curl at the Smith Machine.

How to make the drag curl at the Smith M: 1: Place the bar of the Smith Machine just above the knee height.
2: Load the bar with an appropriate load.
3: Place yourself right next to the bar, so that your thighs are in contact with it.
4: Enter the bar with a supination (palms of the hands upwards), slightly higher than that of the shoulders.
5: Raise the bar along your body, bringing your hands to your shoulders while pulling your elbows behind your chest.
6: Continue to lift the bar until your biceps are contracted as much as possible.
7: Then go down the bar in a controlled way until your arms are completely tense.
8: Repeat the movement by making 8 to 15 repetitions out of 3 to 4 series.

Training advice: Doing drag curl at the Smith Machine is a great idea, because the machine makes the load of the load practically impossible with the shoulders.That said, many practitioners are still tempted to lift the bar with the trapezoids to be able to lift heavier, a problem which is also found in the drag curls at the Ez bar.Booking up the load with an upturn of shoulders is an example of poor technique and goes against the objective of this insulation.If it is natural to feel a moderate activation of trapezius because you bring your elbows behind your body, you must nevertheless feel the most of the tension in your biceps.So be sure to move the bar only thanks to the contraction of your biceps.

Make sure you make a full amplitude movement.As a rule, you know that you have a full movement amplitude when your forearm flexors are in contact with your biceps.At that time, it is not possible to lift the bar higher without going up with your shoulders, which would do nothing more to your biceps in itself.Also be sure to lower the bar to the bottom.

Do not make the mistake of holding the bar too far from you.On the contrary, try to stand as close as possible to the bar.If you do not hold enough of the Smith Machine, your shoulders will be more requested by the raising movement, which means that your biceps will be less stimulated.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the eagle.

How to make the posture of the eagle?: 2: Place your hands on your hips and press your pool with your hands to anchor yourself well and feel a feeling of connection with the ground.By anchoring yourself, feel a feeling of elevation up of your head and an elongation of your spine.

3: Fold the two knees, raise your left foot and slowly pass your left thigh over your right thigh.Then wrap your left foot behind your right calf, and block it there.(You should not feel tension in both knees, and your left knee should be oriented forward).

4: Start both arms in front of you and wrap your right arm on your left arm, crossing your right elbow on the left arm.Slide your left hand towards your face, cross your forearms and press your palms against each other, lifting your elbows at the height of your shoulders.Try keeping your hands, arms and thighs on a straight line.
5: Stay in this position for five deep breaths, feeling stretching in the upper back.Return to Tadasana, and repeat on the other side.

Training advice: You may find it difficult to pass your raised foot behind the calf of your leg, then balance on your foot in support.As a short -term solution, cross your legs, but instead of hanging your foot up to your calf, press the big toe of your foot up against the floor to help you maintain your balance.
If you find it hard to find your balance, place a brick near the outside of your foot in support and put your foot on it instead of rolling it around your leg.

Beginners and people with difficulty keeping in balance can practice this posture against a wall.Stand up, back to the wall, so that the wall supports the back of your back while you practice posture.

For more intense work, perform the complete posture.Then exhale by tilting your torso forward and pressing your forearms against the thigh of your upper leg.Inspire to relax, then repeat the exercise on the other side.

Practice only the posture of the arms (generally called "arm of the eagle") throughout the day to compensate for the pressure exerted on the shoulders and neck by a sitting position in front of a computer or driving!

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the squat front with dumbbells.

Comment faire le front squat avec dumbbe: 1: Standing up, your feet apart from the width of the pelvis, the toes slightly turned outwards and the right body.Hold a pair of dumbbells at shoulder level.
2: Keeping the gaze directed forward, breathe deeply, then start to flex your legs to make a squat.Go down as low as possible while keeping your back straight.
3: Pak in the low position, then go up by expiring until you come back in a standing position.
4: Continue until you have made all your rehearsals.

Training advice: Inspire, then descend by holding your breathing, then exhale forcefully, going up up.
Make sure that the musclesAbdomine is permanently contracted, which will help you maintain a good alignment of the spine.
Also note that you can be slightly limited with the load you can lift depending on the strength of your arms.You can therefore consider using a higher rehearsal fork for this exercise.
Keep your heels firmly anchored on the ground throughout the movement.Putting with the front of the foot can unbalance you and train your fall.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked for the developed standing with elastic.

How to do the developed with elastic?: 1: Set a strip of resistance to a fixed point of appetite (rack, a door frame, etc.).
2: Arms bent, place your hands on both sides of your shoulders.
3: Go forward to create a certain tension on the elastic and place your feet one in front of each other to gain stability.This is the starting position.
4: Push the handles in front of you until you have stretched arms.
5: Strongly contract a two seconds and go back to the starting position.
6: Perform the number of rehearsals planned in your series.

Training advice: Make slow and controlled movements during the concentric and eccentric phase.
This exercise is excellent for improving the typing speed in combat sports.Just make explosive movements when you hold your arms.However, come back slowly by controlling the return phase.
Do not lock your elbows when you hold your arms.

If you want to accentuate the work from the top of the pectorals, stretch your arms slightly upwards.And to work on the lower part of the pectorals, push down.If the inclination does not seem sufficient to work this or that zone, you can also fix your elastic higher or lower.
Always keep your abdominal strap well contracted during the execution of this exercise.
In order not to create imbalances, vary once in two legs placed forward.

image_src_note.caption: Muscles contacted in Thuster with Kettlebell.

How to do the thrusters with Kettlebell?: 1: Stand up with your legs apart from the width of the shoulders and place two kettlebells on your shoulders with a neutral socket or slightly in pronation.
2: Inspire and perform a squat with the KettleBells by simultaneously bending the knees and hips.
3: Returning to the starting position, use the momentum of the squat to propel the kettlebells upwards by performing a military developed.
4: Exhale once the kettlebells are in high position and reversed the movement slowly while controlling the kettlebells to bring them back to your shoulders.
5: Repeat the movement to the desired number of repetitions.

Training advice: Contract your buttocks and abdominals while you make the movement.
Be sure to keep the weight on your heels.If you make a squat movement on your toes, your body will swing back and forth, and may unbalance you with a risk of falling.
Focus on keeping your back as straight as possible throughout the movement.
You can make thrusters with both arms or alternate an arm between each squat.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the stationary bicycle.

How to make stationary bike?: 1: You must have their knees slightly folded at the bottom of the pedal stroke.

2: The saddle of your bike must be horizontal to support the whole weight of your body and allow you to move to the seat if necessary.A too large tilt upwards can cause discomfort.A too large tilt downwards can slide backwards by pedaling and exerting higher tension on your arms, hands and knees, which can cause injuries.

3: If the handlebars are too high, too low, too close or too far, you may have a pain in the neck, the shoulders, audoset to the hands.A good range allows you to use all the positions of the handlebars and comfortably bend the elbows while driving.As a rule, the handlebars must hide the axis of the front wheel, but it is not an absolute rule.

4: Most stationary bikes are equipped with straps that keep your feet in place on the pedals.Spinning bikes are equipped with clipping pedals that allow cyclists to use their bicycle shoes and crampons to settle in the pedals.
5: After setting your bike, start with the warm -up, then continue each stage of the training.
6: Your legs can get tired quickly if you are not used to cycling.It will take time to acquire endurance, so continue as long as you can and stop when you feel that you are close to your limits.
7: Progress by adding a few minutes each time you train until you reach 30 minutes.

Training advice: Having your feet attached to the pedals allows you to press and shoot the pedals in a circular movement, which creates a flexible and effective pedal stroke.There must be a small space between the top of the strap and your shoe, and yourchevillene should move slightly when you pedal.
The addition of resistance simulates the hills and slopes and solicits the leschio-legs and the fertures than light resistance.

Avoid pressing the handlebars: if you do, you transfer your weight to the handlebars rather than on the pedals.In addition, it tires your wrists and forearms, and the lower body does not work as much as it should, which deprives you of some of the advantages of this exercise.
Do not point your toes down when you pedal, it could exert pressure on your knees.Instead, make each pedal stroke from the sole on your foot.
Keep your head aligned with your neck and spine to avoid tensions at the neck and circulate blood and oxygen to your head.An incline of the neck forward can cause dizziness or dizziness.
You can stop to stretch your legs if necessary.
Make your training sessions at least three times a week, with a day of rest between each session.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at Good Morning.

How to make good morning?: 1: Placez une barre de weight training sur vos trapèzes supérieurs. Tenez-vous debout, les pieds écartés de la largeur des épaules. Gardez les épaules en arrière, la poitrine sortie et le torse bien droit.

2: Contractez votre sangle abdominale puis penchez-vous lentement vers l’avant à partir des hanches. Poussez vos hanches vers l’arrière et maintenez le dos plat. Fléchissez vos quadriceps et vos fessiers et gardez les jambes légèrement pliées. Vous devriez sentir un étirement dans vos hamstrings et vos fessiers.
3: Try to lean as far as possible forward without rounding the lower back.
4: Slowly bring your bust back to the starting position.Again, keep your back flat throughout the exercise.
5: Repeat this movement until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Good Morning is not an exercise where you need to use heavy loads.This is strictly an exercise where the emphasis must be placed on form and technique.Training with a lot of rehearsals will give you better results.
Do not round the bottom of your back, that is to say, do not try to go lower than you can comfortably.Flexibility will come with the regularity of work.

name: How does the solicitation of the muscles evolve according to the load at the developed developed?

image_src_note.caption: Graphic credit © Doctor-fitness.com

How to make good morning?: 1: Placez une barre de weight training sur vos trapèzes supérieurs. Tenez-vous debout, les pieds écartés de la largeur des épaules. Gardez les épaules en arrière, la poitrine sortie et le torse bien droit.

2: Contractez votre sangle abdominale puis penchez-vous lentement vers l’avant à partir des hanches. Poussez vos hanches vers l’arrière et maintenez le dos plat. Fléchissez vos quadriceps et vos fessiers et gardez les jambes légèrement pliées. Vous devriez sentir un étirement dans vos hamstrings et vos fessiers.
3: Try to lean as far as possible forward without rounding the lower back.
4: Slowly bring your bust back to the starting position.Again, keep your back flat throughout the exercise.
5: Repeat this movement until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with the aparts available with dumbbells.

Comment faire les \u00e9cart\u00e9s d\u0: 1: Saisissez les dumbbells au sol en adoptant une prise neutre (paumes vers l’intérieur). Placez les extrémités des dumbbells dans le pli de votre hanche, puis asseyez-vous sur un banc décliné.
2: Pour vous mettre en position de départ, allongez-vous et gardez les dumbbells près de votre poitrine. Une fois en place, inspirez profondément, puis amenez les dumbbells en position haute.
3: Rétractez légèrement vos omoplates, déverrouillez vos coudes et abaissez lentement les dumbbells latéralement tout en maintenant le même angle au niveau du coude.
4: Lorsque les dumbbells arrivent au niveau de la poitrine, inversez le mouvement en contractant les pectoraux et en ramenant les dumbbells à leur position de départ.
5: Sans laisser les dumbbells se toucher, commencez la répétition suivante et continuez jusqu’à la fin de la série.

Advice for apartments available with dum: Use a light version, for example 30 degrees.Extreme positions are not necessarily the most appropriate.
Do not tighten too much the handles of the dumbbells, as this can cause excessive recruitment of the forearms and desbiceps, thus reducing the activation of the pectorals.
Avoid touching or hitting the dumbbells at the top of each repetition in order to maintain a continuous tension on the pectoral muscles.
Always keep your elbows slightly folded and never lower the weight to the point of feeling pain or pressure on the front of the shoulder.
Be sure to maintain a certain tension at the desabdominaire level to not excessively arrange the lower back.

name: Russian twists à la pulley sur Swiss ball

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités avec les russian twists à la pulley sur Swiss ball.

Comment faire les russian twists avec pu: 1: Fixez une poignée à une pulley suffisamment haute pour que vous puissiez tendre complètement vos bras.
2: Placez le Swiss ball à côté de la pulley et allongez-vous dessus de manière à ce que votre poitrine soit dans le même axe que la pulley (voir illustration ci-dessous).
3: Enter the handle with the closest hand, and put the arm directly above your chest, then place your other hand on it to have a firm socket.

4: Keep the hips high, contract your abdominal muscles and rotate by removing the arms from the machine using your abdominal muscles.Your arms must remain tense and aligned throughout the exercise.You only need to use your abdominal strap to rotate your body.
5: Return slowly to the starting position, preventing the load from getting you back too quickly.
6: Make the desired number of repetitions, then repeat the movement on the other side.

Training advice: It is not a bodybuilding exercise that aims to develop strength and it is therefore recommended not to use heavy loads.A light to moderate weight will allow you to make the most of this exercise.
Perform a slow and controlled movement to make sure that the target muscles are fully committed and active.
Make sure the gym ball is fully inflated to guarantee your safety and movement efficiency.
Do not let your hips and the bottom of your body sink during the exercise.You must maintain a neutral and firm position on the ball.

Training advice.caption: It is important to follow the handle in order to guarantee a maximum commitment of the obliques.

name: Élévations frontales à la pulley basse

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités avec les élévations frontales à la pulley basse.

Comment faire les \u00e9l\u00e9vations f: 1: Fixez deux poignées simples sur une double pulley basse.
2: Then stand between the pulleys and grab the two handles.
3: While standing straight, lift both arms to the shoulder level, slightly bent elbows.
4: Drive slowly to the starting position.
5: Repeat this movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: You can alternate the arms rather than lifting them at the same time.
Keep your back straight and your body motionless.Only your arms should move.
If you have to lift heavy loads, shift your feet and lean a little forward to improve your balance.
If you feel pain in your shoulder when you do the front elevations, reduce the height to which you mount the handles.
The advantage of keeping your elbows very slightly bent is to preserve the joints of your elbows.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested in the reverse hack squat.

How to make the reverse hack?: 1: Chargez la machine de hack squat de disque de weight training avec lesquelles vous souhaitez travailler.
2: Place yourself on the platform, facing the machine.Make sure your feet are spread out of the shoulder width and turned outwards.
3: Enter the side handles.Place your shoulders under the padding and make sure your chest is open.Strongly contract your abs.
4: Push up to detach the rack load.
5: Crouching until your legs are parallel to the ground and stay in this position for 1 second.
6: Push up to lift the load and stop just before your knees are locked.
7: Repeat this movement until you make the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: If you place yourself further forward on the platform, you will increase knee flexion for greater activation of the quadriceps.
On the contrary, if you place yourself behind, you will increase the flexion of the hips for greater activation of glutes and hamstrings.
Remember that the movement is led by hips, so push your hips back so that your body can go down.
Do not bounce the load at the bottom, as it increases the risk of injury.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the SUMO squat with dumbbell.

How to make the SUMO squat with dumbbell: 1: Hold a dumbbell with both hands.
2: Place yourself in a position with your feet more apart than the width of the shoulders and point your toes slightly outwards.
3: Maintain your neutral spine (slight curvature inward at the lower back), with your raised chest and your tight abs.Your chest will be slightly leaning forward.
4: Start making a squat, lowering your hips and keeping your weight on your heels.
5: Go down as deeply as possible, ideally to the parallel or just below.
6: Go back up by pushing on the heels, expiring and keeping the same posture.
7: Repeat the movement until you have made the number of repetitions planned.

Training advice: The principle of the SUMO squat is to adopt a broader position than the traditional squat.The position of the sumo is a wide position.However, an extremely wide position with an exaggerated position of the feet outwards can reduce the ability to lift loads by putting you in an unfavorable position.So try to find the position that allows you to lift the most loads while being comfortable.

Although you can try different foot widths (this is another way to vary this exercise), you should always adopt a position that seems comfortable to you depending on your flexibility and the amplitude of your movements.Do not adopt a too wide position if you don't feel comfortable.A very wide position is not necessarily better and can even increase the risk of clashing.

It is normal and correct that your chest is slightly leaning forward.However, if you want to do a job more focused on the quadriceps, adjust the position of your feet and your handling of the dumbbell to keep a torso straight (vertical).
It can be slightly embarrassing to hold the dumbbell with one hand over the other, but there is an alternative.One of the variants is to hold the dumbbell vertically at the upper discs.

Some people do not have the flexibility necessary to do this exercise in depth and in width, but it is not a major drawback either, because each individual can start using the amplitude of movement in which he iseasy.

If you perform the sumo squat from a raised position to obtain a greater amplitude of motion, be sure to be completely warm, increase the depth of your squat gradually from one training session to another andDo not go lower than your amplitude of motion allows it.I have seen many people tear their thigh muscles trying to squat more deeply than what their natural flexibility allowed them or trying to work too heavy too early.
Beginners can start this exercise in body weight.

The increase in the amplitude of movement by going lower, in particular by performing the raised sumo squat, is also a form of progression.However, make very deep or very wide sumo squats with care, as mentioned above.

If you want to make the exercise much more difficult, even using lighter loads, you can slow down eccentric movements and mark breaks in the low position.For example, you can go down in a squat position while counting up to 4, then stay in the low position while counting up to 2 or 3 before getting up in 1 second.

Finally, if you really want to sculpt your quadriceps, you can do this exercise by applying the technique of continuous tension, keeping your knees slightly bent and without locking them at the top throughout the series.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the squat with elastic.

How to make the squat with elastic?: 1: Stand up with your feet a little more apart than the width of the epaules.
2: Pass a elastic band just above the knees.The elastic must be stretched in a standing position.
3: To start squatting, fold your knees and hips as if you were going to sit on a chair that is directly under you.

4: When you cush up, direct your knees to the outside so that they pass directly above your middle toe.It is especially at this moment that it will be necessary to fight against the tension of the elastic.
5: Crazy as low as possible while keeping your knees aligned with your feet and yourdosplat, then push with your feet to get up and return to your starting position.
6: Repeat this movement to make the number of repetitions fixed.

Training advice: Regarding the placement of the feet, imagine that you are on a clock, and point your toes around 11 a.m. and 1 hour.
While squatting, keep your chest open and look straight in front of you to keep your back flat and avoid rounding the lower back
To make sure your technique is correct, do it in front of a mirror or film on your phone.

To obtain the best results, you must achieve a movement on a complete amplitude, which means that your thighs must be parallel to the ground before you start to get up.This will allow you to fully enjoy the benefits of the squat.Some people use a bench or a low chair behind them when they make leg flexions.When their buttocks touches the bench, they know that they have made the movement in all its amplitude.
If the exercise becomes too simple, you can do it while holding a dumbbell in your hands.This amounts to making UNGOBLET SQUATGH elastic.

You can also take a break about three seconds at the bottom of the movement, before going up slowly.The slow break and the rise will further increase under tension and will bring you much more benefits than a quick rise.

Training advice.caption: You can put your arms forward to help you keep your balance as illustrated above.

image_src_note.caption: Trikonasana compared to Parivrtta Trikonasana (right)

How to make PARIVRTTA TRIKONASANA?: 1: Place yourself in front of your start-up carpet.
2: Back your right foot from about 3 to 4 steps.Then turn your right foot by about 45 degrees to the right.Align your straight heel with your left heel.
3: Inspire and raise your arms parallel, to lengthen your spine.Pull the top and inward, and stretch your arms with your fingertips.
4: Turn forward at the hips with your arms in front of you.

5: Exhale and switch your chest to the left and stretch your right hand to the ground, lowering your chest over your front leg.Place your right hand on the floor, outside your left foot, and stretch your left hand upwards.
6: Attach your gaze to your left palm.
7: Hold this posture for five deep breaths.To release it, breathe in and get standing up.Return your feet closer and repeat the exercise on the other side.

Training advice: In the posture of the inverted triangle, it is very important not to rotate the neck too much and to focus on the muscles of the middle and the upper back.Most of us tend to do torsions where it is easy and to avoid twists in difficult places.This generally means that you will overcome the neck, which is relatively mobile, and minimize the work of the middle and the upper back, the part of the spine which, in many people, is less flexible.
Practitioners suffering from injury to the spine and on the back should not perform the inverted triangle posture.
Pregnant women are also asked not to make this posture, because the front flexions and deep twists can be harmful.
Also avoid having Parivrtta Trikonasana in the event of insomnia, diarrhea, and in the event of high blood pressure, do not raise your arms.

This Asana requires intense flexion and stretching of the whole body.It is therefore advisable to prepare your body by making Utthita Ashwa Sanchalansana (Slot posture) and Vidharbhasana (posture of the warrior) to prepare the lower and upper body for an intense stretch.
If you cannot touch the floor with one hand in the opposite direction, place a brick of the desired height next to your front leg and put your palms on it.
You can rely on the wall and make Parivrtta Trikonasana because this Asana requires a significant balance effort for beginners.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the front slots with bar.

How to make the front slits with bar?: 1: Load the bar in a squats rack.
2: Go under the bar and place it at the back of your shoulders as if you were going to make a squat.
3: Gently get the rack bar until you have enough space in front of you to take a big step forward.
4: Get a big step forward, gently placing your front foot flat on the floor and simultaneously lowering your back knee down.
5: Your knees must form an angle of 90 degrees at the bottom of the movement.
6: With the strength of your front thigh, go back to a high position with a fluid movement, making sure to keep your balance while you get up.
7: Make a new slit with the same leg and repeat this movement until you have reached the number of rehearsals desired, then change the leg.Another option is to alternate legs with each rehearsal.

Training advice: This exercise can produce numerous delayed aches (DOMS).It is therefore advisable to start gradually during the first training sessions, otherwise you risk walking strangely for a few days.
While you go down in the low position, keep your head high, high chest, right torso and flat back (do not round your back).

There are countless possibilities to make slots with bar.Beginners can start with a vacuum bar or even with body weight.Olympic weightlifting and crossfit followers often perform this exercise by placing the bar on the front of the shoulders.These athletes also often make slots while holding the bar above their heads (overhead).

The slots (in English Walking Lungs) are one of the most popular variants.Instead of taking a step forward and then returning to the same starting position, the market slots correspond exactly to what their name describes: you walk in the room.This requires a large space and is therefore not necessarily practical in small sports rooms or at home (if time allows, the market slots can be practiced outside).The inverted slot is another very popular variant where you take a step back instead of a step forward.Diagonal slots and side slots involve other leg muscles in movement.
Slirts can also be carried out with any other bodybuilding equipment, such as dumbbells, kettlebells, a weighted vest, etc.

The split squat can be considered as a variant of the slit, with the difference that there is no step, or moving forward or backwards.The split squat is a movement from top to bottom only.Although some people use the terms “slit” and “split squat” indifferently, these are different exercises not to be confused.The slit is an exercise with a movement of steps.The split squat is a stationary exercise (on site).

One of the main errors with the slits is not to go far enough.Your goal is to reach an angle of 90 degrees in the two knees.You do not have to touch the ground with your rear knee, but to obtain a complete amplitude of motion, you must approach it.

Training advice.caption: The front slots with bar, profile view.

Training advice: Avoid leaning too much forward.You should keep the chest right during this exercise, as it reduces the fatigue from the lower back and to solicit the quadriceps.If you look forward, you will notice that the exercise is easier and that is why many people do it, especially when they are tired.It's easier because your lower back and hips take over on your thighs.Although it is natural to lean a little forward, it is important to remain more or less straight and not to round your back.The good benchmarks to remember are: standing straight, your head high, the high chest.

Another error is to take too short steps forward.Short steps can put more pressure on quadriceps, but they also increase knee fatigue.Taking a large enough step forward makes it possible to fully activate the glutes.

If your program provides 8 to 12 repetitions, you must make 8 to 12 repetitions for each leg, and not 8 to 12 repetitions in total!This is also one of the reasons why slots may look like a cardio exercise: you need to do 20 row rehearsals instead of 10.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with curl lying on the pulley.

Comment faire le curl allong\u00e9 \u00e: 1: Set a straight bar on the pulley device.
2: Lie on your back and fold your knees.Place your feet flat on the ground to gain stability.
3: Enter the handbar in pronation (palm up).Your arms must be stretched (but not locked) along the body.
4: Take a great inspiration, exhale and bend the elbows.Contract your biceps and bring the bar back to your chest.Perform a strong contraction in high position.
5: Return slowly to the starting position.
6: Repeat the movement until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Your elbows should be fixed.If the latter move upwards, it means that your shoulders participate in the movement which is not the purpose of the exercise.
Prefer to work with a light to moderate load in complete amplitude, rather than with a heavy load and reduced amplitudes (half-repetitions).
To take muscle, target 4 series of 8 to 12 repetitions with 1 minute of rest.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with lumbar extensions on Swiss Ball.

How to make lumbar extensions on Swiss B: 1: Start by selecting a good size ball and make sure it is properly inflated.
2: Lie on your belly on the ball, keep your feet apart and placed on the floor behind you.
3: Bring your hands behind your head.
4: Now lift your upper body by contracting the lower back muscles.Take a break at the top of the movement.
5: Then go down slowly in the starting position and start again until you make the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Keep your abs entertained throughout the exercise.
To facilitate movement, bring your arms along your body.

It is advisable for your first try to keep your feet apart to promote your stability.As you feel stronger and more confident, bring your feet and legs together to make the abdominal muscles work more.
If you feel that the balance is unmanageable, place yourself near a wall so as to rely with your feet to gain stability.
Avoid doing too much hyperextension.This is not useful and can be dangerous for your spine.
If you want to intensify the exercise without putting your hands behind your head, carry a dumbbell under the chin, or even more difficult, arms stretched in front of you.

Training advice.caption: This variant with the arms along the body is easier for people who do not yet have the strength necessary to exercise with the hands behind their heads.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the Pundulum squat.

How to make the pendulum squat?: 1: Load the machine with the desired amount of weight.

2: Set up with your head and back well-plated against the folder.Your shoulders must be directly in contact with the side supports provided for this purpose.The feet will be flat on the platform in front of you.
3: Push with your legs and unlock the safety by turning the bar in front of you.
4: Make a slow flexion, controlled and as deep as possible, then go back to the starting position.
5: Perform the desired number of rehearsals, then locate the safety of the machine before going out.

Training advice: Place your feet as low as possible on the plate while ensuring that at the bottom of the movement, you have a uniform pressure on the plant and the heel of the foot and that the heels are not lifted.This will obtain maximum knee bending, thus increasing the recruitment of quadriceps.
Go down as low as possible while keeping your back plated against the backrest.

You can change the position of your feet by adopting a wide position to target the inside of the thighs, then a narrow position to target the exterior of the quadriceps.You can also choose a higher foot position to target the hamstrings and buttocks or a lower foot position to put more emphasis on the quadriceps.This variety is essential when it comes to stimulating late muscle groups.

name: Parivrtta Utkatasana (posture of the returned chair)

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the posture of the returned chair.

How to make Parivrtta Utkatasana?: 1: Join your hands in a prayer position in the center of your chest.
2: Adopt the posture of the chair, the knees attached and the weight mainly on the heels.
3: Inspire to stretch your spine.Exhale by turning to the left, and blocking your right elbow on your left thigh.
4: Keep your knees in contact.Keep your body weight in the heels and push the buttocks backwards.
5: Inhale to enter the navel and make the abdominal muscles work.
6: Maintain this position for 3 to 5 breaths before releasing it to make a before flexion.Return to posture of the chair and start on the other side.

Training advice: To avoid a knee injury, make sure that the weight of your body is distributed evenly on both legs.The usual trend is to sink into the opposite leg to the one to which you turn.To avoid this, keep the two knees bent equally and in the same plane.

It is often observed that practitioners look towards the ceiling during Parivrtta utkatasana.This gives the impression that the posture is more pronounced, but the only part of your spine that twists here is the cervical column.However, the goal is in fact to twist from the lumbar column.This is why you must first focus on the torsion in the navel rather than turning your head upwards.
Pregnant women should avoid this Asana because it exerts pressure on the lower abdomen area, which is not good for the baby.
Like the Utkatasana posture, it is an excellent muscle strengthening exercise.This Asana reinforces not only all the legs, desfessiers and thighs with mollets and ankles, but also the abdominals.
Being careful with the right alignment, the posture of the returned chair is beneficial for practitioners with knee problems, because it strengthens the support structures around the knee joints.
If you really focus on the rear flexion of Parivrtta Utkatasana, you also get a beautiful front opening of the chest and despels, as well as an excellent stretch of the spine.
The torsion action provides your abdominal organs with a gentle massage, which can improve digestion.
Maintaining balance in this posture requires a lot of concentration, which makes this Asana an excellent exercise for body and mind.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested at the Jefferson Squat.

How to make the Jefferson Squat?: 1: Place yourself above the center of the bar, feet apart from a width greater than that of the shoulders.One foot must be directed forward and the other towards the side.
2: Croupe yourself and enter the bar using an alternate socket.
3: Tighten the musclesabdomine, take out the chest, take a great inspiration and exhale.Lift the bar by pushing through the heels of your feet.

4: As soon as you have reached the high position, start going down the bar on the ground following the same trajectory.Do not bounce the bar on the ground.Check the load during the descent until the bar touches and then rests on the ground.
5: Repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.
6: For the following series, change the position of your feet.The foot turned forward must now be oriented on the side and vice versa.

Training advice: With the Jefferson Squat, you lift a load as with the lifting of the earth.You cannot store strength on the bar as you would when you get down to the classic squat or to a bench press, because you start the movement in the low position.Therefore, it is not advisable to lift heavy loads.
Before you start the movement, make sure your arms are well stretched.
Consider your arms as hooks.They must remain tense and released throughout the movement.
The racing shoes are too soft and may move your feet during the movement.Instead, wear flat shoes so that the foot is more in contact with the floor.

When you get tired by doing the Jefferson Squat, your body may tend to turn to the side.As far as possible, you should prevent the torso from moving, keeping the right shoulders forward.However, if you can't prevent it, you need to let go of the bar and refocus on the right technique.
As with any variation of squat or deadlift, you must maintain a neutral spine during the lifting.To do this, always keep your chest out and look forward.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the declined sit-up.

How to do the declined crunch?: 1: Adjust the bench according to the desired angle according to your level of strength.
2: Sit on the bench and place your feet under the foam rolls.
3: Lie on the bench and place your hands behind your head or come across them on your chest.
4: Contract your abdominals and go up your bust as high as your abdominals allow it without sitting down completely.Perform your expiration during this phase.
5: Go back down while inspiring, but without your shoulders and the upper back touching the bench.
6: Repeat the movement until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: You can adjust the bench to any tilt angle, as long as you can make your crunchs with good technique.If you find that the angle you use is too trying, adjust the bench to a slightly less inclined angle.
Never use your hands to shoot the head.Not only is it bad for your neck, but it will not allow you to optimize the commitment of your abdominal muscles.
Avoid lying on the bench during each repetition to ensure that you maintain optimal tension on the target muscles.

Training advice.caption: To intensify the exercise, you can maintain a bodybuilding disc on your chest or held up to the high arm stretched as on the illustration above.

name: Sit-up with medicine ball against a wall

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the sit-up with medicine ball against a wall.

How to do the sit-up with Medicine Ball: 1: Take a medicine-ball and lie down, knees folded at an angle of 90 degrees and feet on the ground.
2: Hold the medicine-ball with both hands, arms above your head.
3: By mobilizing your abs, go back to a sitting position while launching medicine-ball against the wall.
4: Catch it when it bounces to you and go back to the ground.Continue until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Determine the number of series, rehearsals and the weight of medicine-ball according to your ability to keep a good technique during all series and repetitions.
The wall must be shock resistant to avoid any damage.
Block your feet under a pair of dumbbells if you need more stability.
You can also do this exercise with a partner.Face to face, simply make passes alternately by making sure not to launch too loudly.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the Overhead squat with dumbbells.

Comment faire l\u2019overhead squat avec: 1: In a standing position, place a pair of dumbbells above your head.The gaze directed forward, the chest raised, the knees and the hips slightly bent and ledosdroit.This is your starting position.
2: Go down to the squat position by bending the hips and knees.When you cush up, keep your body weight on your heels and bring your knees outwards.Hold your back straight.

3: Descendez aussi bas que votre souplesse le permet ou jusqu’à ce que vous ayez atteint une position de squat complète. Évitez de vous pencher excessivement vers l’avant, d’arrondir votre colonne lombaire, et gardez les dumbbells en place tout au long de l’exercice.
4: After a brief break, go back to the starting position by reversing the movement.Repeat this sequence until you have made the number of rehearsals desired.

Training advice: Hold the dumbbells with hands in pronation (palms forward).
Keep your head facing forward.
Start with light dumbbells until you master the technique and balance.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the Through sweater in the pulley.

Comment faire le pull through \u00e0 la: 1: Saisissez une corde fixée sur une pulley basse.
2: Race the cable so that your back is oriented towards the pulley.

3: Éloignez-vous de l’appareil à pulley de quelques pas pour que le câble commence à soulever les poids du rack. Veillez à être suffisamment éloigné pour que le poids soulevé ne revienne pas en contact avec la pile de poids à chaque répétition.
4: Keeping the legs stretched, flex the hips until you felt a slight stretch in the hamstrings.It is possible to slightly bend your knees.
5: Take a break for a second and reversed the movement by extending the hips.
6: Repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Ideally, you should use flat sole shoes like the Converse Chuck Taylors, the Nike Metcons or the Reebok Nanos, in order to maintain a stable position of the foot.Any shoe with spongy sole will not allow you to transfer the force adequately from your feet to your hips.
Do not change the alignment of your spine, keep a neutral column for the duration of the movement.
Make sure to tighten and activate your glutes at any time.
Do not hyperextension of the back at the top of the movement.
If you don't have a pulley, you can perform Lepull Through with elastic.

name: HIIT: The best cardio to burn fat

image_src_note.caption: HIIT in group increases emulation.

name: Complete squat vs parallel squat vs half-squat: what variant is the safest for the knees?

The muscles requested in the sautéed squat.

How to do the saut\u00e9ed squats?: 1: Stand up, your feet apart at the width of the shoulders and your arms in front of you.
2: Keeping the right torso, breathe in by cooking until your thighs are at least horizontally.You can raise your arms horizontally in front of you to help you keep your balance.
3: Exhale by jumping as high as possible, taking care to launch your arms down when you raise yourself.
4: When you land, bend your hips and knees to absorb the impact, and go down by cooking again.Remember to inspire.
5: Exhale by jumping as high again as possible.
6: Continue to repeat the flexion movement, then the jump as many times as expected.

Training advice: Land on the soles of the feet, press your heels when you squat, then push on your heels and jump on the soles of the feet.
Keep your head raised and the right torso.
Keep your knees and your feet oriented in the same direction.
If you want to develop the power of your legs, make shorter landings.
Another way to execute the sautéed squat is to launch your arms up while you jump to promote momentum upwards.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the Larsen -Larsen developed.

How to do the Larsen Beanie developed?: 1: Lie on a flat bench, eyes directly under the bar.Start your arms upwards and enter the bar with a pronation, slightly wider than the shoulder width.
2: Pull your shoulders down and back to fix them.
3: Detach the bar and hold it above your chest.
4: Lie your legs and lift your feet from the ground.This is the starting position.If you prefer, you can put your feet on a well -placed chair or on a second bench.
5: Flex your arms and lower the bar to your chest.Touchely touch it, without rebounding, then go up the bar in the starting position.
6: Make the number of rehearsals planned and then rest the bar at the end of your series.

Training advice: For more security, enter the bar completely and not with a plug -in outlet (suicide grip).
Focus on maintaining your balance, keeping the abdominals well contracted.
Since the balance will be put to the test, it is best to be assisted by a training partner to help you balance or raise the bar if necessary.
If you are starting with this exercise, start with lighter loads compared to those you would have taken at the conventional bend developed.
A good breathing is important for any exercise.Inspire, when you go down the load.Exhale when you push the bar up.

Training advice.caption: The Larsen -Bench developed can also be done with dumbbells if you do not have a developed bench lying with a bar.

image_src_note.caption: Tabata is a method that gives you the impression of having given everything in record time!

How to do the Larsen Beanie developed?: 1: Lie on a flat bench, eyes directly under the bar.Start your arms upwards and enter the bar with a pronation, slightly wider than the shoulder width.
2: Pull your shoulders down and back to fix them.
3: Detach the bar and hold it above your chest.
4: Lie your legs and lift your feet from the ground.This is the starting position.If you prefer, you can put your feet on a well -placed chair or on a second bench.
5: Flex your arms and lower the bar to your chest.Touchely touch it, without rebounding, then go up the bar in the starting position.
6: Make the number of rehearsals planned and then rest the bar at the end of your series.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the lifting of the earth suitcase with an arm.

How to make the lifting of the earth sui: 1: Stand straight next to a toktlebellplacée on the side of your body.Put yourself in a standard earth lift position and push your hips back to switch forward, then enter the Kettlebell.

2: Push the floor with your feet and move your hips forward to stand up.Do your best so that your bust does not turn or lean too much on one side.You can place your free hand on the side or in front of you to counterweight.

3: With the feet apart from the width of the hips and the toes directed forward, bring the hips back and down, maintaining Ledosdroit.When you approach the lower part of the earth lifting, keep the chest high and the abdominal muscles tight.This will allow you to ensure the stability of the lower back and bust.
4: While holding the spine in a neutral position, keep the dumbbell near your leg and start going up by pushing your feet into the ground.
5: Perform the desired number of rehearsals and change aside.

Training advice: You can also use a loaded weight bar or a dumbbell, which you will need to put on a support to reduce the distance to be covered to catch them.

Tighten your shoulder blades against each other to consolidate your back well.A well -maintained back will prevent the chest from pivoting in the middle of the movement.This is a crucial step during the lifting of the soil suitcase and unilateral alliaccece.
The Kettlebell must remain aligned with the center of the foot throughout the movement.
If you have history of back injury, this type of exercise can cause strong tension that can harm this part of the body.Of course, always see a doctor before you start your training program.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the bellied developed inverted.

How to make the bellied developed invert: 1: Lie on the bench and enter the bar with a supination.Your socket should be wider than the shoulder width.
2: Press your feet firmly to the ground to have good stability.
3: Detach the bar and start with your arms completely stretched.The bar must be in the axis of the nipples.
4: Inspire, tighten the bar strongly, and contract your glutes.
5: Fold the elbows and slowly lower the bar.Keep the elbows back on the sides.
6: Make sure the bar moves horizontally along the body while you descend it vertically.The bar must touch your sternum at the end of the movement.
7: Take a break, then go up the bar in the starting position and exhale.
8: Repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Advice for the bellied developed inverte: Make yourself assisted by a similar time to get used to the catch.Indeed, taking will be less safe at first (but you will get used to it), which is why it is essential to be accompanied to avoid any risk.
Keep your glutes on the bench.
Lightly stop the upper back to bring out your chest.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked with Viparita Virabhadrasana.

How to make Viparita Virabhadrasana?: 1: Start by standing on the carpet in the mountain posture (Tadasana).Separate the feet, leaving a distance of about 1 meter, and place your hands on the waist in the posture of the wide angle (Prasarita Tadasana).
2: Starting on the left, inspire, turn the leg, the thigh and the left foot from 90 degrees to the left.By expiring, fold the left leg at the right angle.Thus, the knee is aligned with Lacheville.
3: Make sure the thigh is parallel and that the tibia is perpendicular to the ground.And the rear leg (right) remains straight and well tense.
4: By taking a deep inspiration, climb your hands at the shoulder level, the palms turned down, in laposure of warrior II (Virabhadrasana II).
5: Stay in this position for a while, keeping your back straight, head, neck and back aligned.Then, inspiring, drop your right arm on the right thigh and stretch your left hand upwards.
6: Slowly, with deep expiration, look at the side a little further.Start stretching the left arm to the right, while sliding the right arm simultaneously down, on the right thigh.
7: Finally, let your head go back, looking up.
8: Keep your shoulders relaxed, your chest and the elongated waist.Stay in this position for about 6 breaths.
9: To release, inspire by bringing your arms back into the posture of warrior II, and repeat on the other side.

Training advice: Push the floor with the outer edge of your rear foot for more stability and balance the weight equally between the two feet.
If you feel like you are losing your balance, release your arms and relax the neck before adjusting your feet and legs.
Focus on opening your chest, rather than the amplitude of your bending.

As with any slit position, the knee must not exceed the toes, otherwise you risk exerting too much pressure on the knee.Your knee can tend to derive inward, or this is also stressful for knee joint and you should therefore keep it in the axis.
Do not put any weight on your rear hand, because your balance must come from the force of Vosabdomailau and no from your hand placed on your leg.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the stepper.

How to make the stepper?: 1: Place a flat and safe foot on each step.
2: Press the stepper one foot while the other goes up.Repeat this action with the opposite foot.The sensation must be similar to that of the stairs.
3: Start slowly and increase the speed as you get used to the machine.Start your training session between 6 and 12 minutes.Over time, you can train on the machine for more than 30 minutes.
