Training advice: Some steppers are equipped with handles on which you can place your hands, others not.If your stepper is not equipped with it, bend your arms and move them back and forth as you would jog.If your stepper is fitted with hands bars, hold them firmly, but don't get over it.
Keep the bust straight: don't look forward.It is essential to work on musclesabdomunes and remain stable on the machine.
Make sure the stepper rests on a perfectly flat surface.Do not place the stepper on a carpet or a carpet.Wear sports shoes suitable for sport and do not do this barefoot exercise.

Training advice.caption: The Mini-Stepper to train at home.

name: Écarté à la pulley vis à vis haute à genoux

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités avec les écartée à la pulley vis à vis haute à genoux.

Comment faire les \u00e9cart\u00e9s \u00: 1: Adjust the two adjustable pulleys in the high position.Make sure they are set to the same height.
2: On your knees in front of the pulleys, catch the handles at the end of each cable.Your arms should be slightly bent.
3: By keeping this slight flexion, extend your arms to the outside by controlling the movement, then contract your pectorals to bring your hands forward and bottom against each other.
4: Make a brief break while contracting your muscles, then reversed the movement by slowly bringing your arms backwards back.
5: Make the number of rehearsals planned.

Training advice: Keep your back law and the absorbed abs throughout the exercise to maintain an appropriate posture.
As it is not possible to work with a heavy load, favor long series with at least 10 repetitions.
You can vary the angle of the arms by adjusting the height of the pulleys to solicit the pectoral muscles differently.
You can try this unilateral exercise to focus on one side at a time.This also allows greater amplitude of motion and a greater contraction in the middle of the pectorals.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the Waiter Curl.

How to make the Waiter Curl?: 1: Place a dumbbell in a vertical position on a high surface, like a bench.This will facilitate the next step.
2: Place your hands flat under the upper plate with one hand on each side in supination.
3: Do not enter the plate.Hold the dumbbell like a server would hold a tray.
4: Stand straight with a position of the feet equivalent to that of the shoulders and hold the dumbbell in front of your thighs.
5: While keeping the elbows plated against the body, raise the dumbbell until your chest is up to the height.
6: Return slowly to the starting position.
7: Repeat the movement until you have made your series.

Training advice: Make sure that the dumbbell is oriented upwards throughout the movement.Do not let the dumbbell bow when you make the flexion movement.
Hold your shoulder blades back throughout the movement.
The Waiter Curl is intended to be executed until exhaustion or at the limit of failure to stimulate the muscles as much as possible.
Muscle hypertrophy is the main objective of this exercise.On the other hand, this is not the best exercise if your goal is to develop your strength.
Surrounding your hands around the dumbbell will lead to a commitment from the brachial muscle, because you will hold the dumbbell with a neutral socket.So strive to hold the dumbbell from below.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested in the squat.

How to make the squat?: 1: Prepare the bar by placing it just below the shoulder height and loading it with the load you want to use.
2: Put yourself under the bar, your feet apart from the width of the shoulders.

3: Place the bar so that it is based on the muscles from the top of your back (upper trapezius), not on your spine.The bar must be well positioned and not be a source of discomfort or discomfort.Otherwise, try to add a padding foam.
4: Now place your hands behind your back and enter the bar with a wide socket for more stability.
5: Then bend your knees and straighten your back to prepare to remove the rack bar.
6: Keeping your back straight and looking forward, push with your legs and remove the rack bar.
7: Take two steps back to stabilize.

8: Make an inspiration as deep as possible and block breathing.You should feel that your abdominal strap is completely tense.Descend the bar slowly until the lamobility of your hipset ankles allows you, ideally under the parallel.Once in the low position, get up by pushing with the heels.It is only once in a high position that you can expire, breathe and if you want to redo a rehearsal, redo a complete inspiration and start the movement of movement.

Errors to avoid squat: Round the lower back: it is essential that you keep your back straight when you get together!You can make sure that your back is straight by keeping the look directed forward, the chest out, and the shoulder blades (committed dorsals).Keep your abdominal muscles well contracted throughout the movement to maintain your back in place.
Pushing with the soles of the feet: this exerts unnecessary pressure on the joints and tendons.Always push with the entire foot starting from the heels.

Lean forward: this phenomenon occurs when your hips get up faster than your shoulders.To avoid this, make slow and controlled rehearsals and take out your buttocks when you go down.Also keep your chest curved upwards.

Errors to avoid squat.caption: Profile view of the right back and pelvis positioning during the squat.

Errors to avoid squat: You do not squat low enough: to fully exploit the potential of squats, you must squat at least until your thighs are almost parallel to the ground.

The knees are moving too much: when you make leg flexions, your hips must go down directly down, not come forward.With a light load, perfect your technique by placing yourself aside in front of a mirror.If your knees advance too much, the bar may have a trajectory too much forward.You risk being unbalanced and no longer being able to recruit your muscles optimally to go up.

Knees inside or outside: do not run your knees inward or outside when you go down or climb the bar.This exerts unnecessary pressure on the knee joints.If you are directing your feet slightly outwards (interesting to help recruit the gluteal muscles), your knees must remain in the same alignment.

Errors to avoid squat.caption: Comparison of the good and bad position of the knees during the squat.

Errors to avoid squat: Looking down: as soon as you look down, your back is rounded and you may hurt the lumbar, it's as simple as that.

Look at the sides: you create unnecessary tension on the cervicals which can be a source of injury if you work with a very heavy bar.Indeed, the more important the load, the more the set of the muscles of the body put themselves in tension, even those of the neck!

name: Extensions des triceps couché avec dumbbells

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the extensions of the triceps lying with dumbbells.

How to make the extensions of the tricep: 1: Enter a pair of dumbbells, one in each hand, and sit on the front edge of a flat bench.
2: Allongez-vous et mettez les dumbbells en position de départ, avec les bras tendus au-dessus de votre poitrine.
3: En fléchissant les bras au niveau des coudes, abaissez lentement les dumbbells en même temps, jusqu’à ce qu’ils touchent légèrement l’avant de vosdeltoïdesou descendent jusqu’à vos oreilles.

4: Lorsque vous abaissez les haltères, tout le mouvement doit se faire au niveau de l’articulation du coude, et non pas avec les épaules. La partie supérieure de vos bras ne doit pas bouger de façon importante. Vos coudes doivent être dirigés vers le haut lorsque les dumbbells arrivent en position basse.
5: From this position, using only the strength of your triceps, stretch your arms to return to the starting position.
6: Keep the elbows tight for the duration of the movement.
7: Repeat the exercise until you have done the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: This exercise is generally done with two dumbbells at the same time, but you can also make alternating movements (left arm, right arms, left arm, etc.).You can also do the exercise with one arm at a time (unilaterally), which, according to some people, improves the concentration and laconnexion spirit-muscle, but takes more time, unless you take no rest when you changenext to.

The standard version of expansion with dumbbells is done on a flat bench, but another interesting variant is to use a declined bench.As we mentioned above, one of the potential drawbacks of extensions lying with dumbbells on a flat bench is that there is no more tension at the top of the movement: your triceps therefore benefit from a break untilTo what you lower the dumbbells again.

When you run the movement on a declined bench, the resistance curve changes and the force of gravity always acts on the dumbbells at the top of the movement, so that the triceps retain a certain tension.This is the reason why many people prefer to use the declined version.

This movement can also be carried out on an inclined bench to benefit from another working angle.To maintain the tension, this variation is generally done with the arms slightly behind the head.For people who train at home without a bench, you can do this exercise on the ground.
The biggest error that most people do on this exercise is to use the shoulders to raise the dumbbells, transforming the exercise into apull-over.

The second major error is to let the elbows move away, which can reduce tension on the triceps.It is therefore a common way to cheat with this exercise when it starts to become difficult.So keep your elbows in the same position for the duration of the exercise.
If you do not train in a crowded room and have a dumbbell rack at your disposal, try to make a drop set on your last series of extensions: it's a great way to finish and get congestionmuscles.
The emphasis on the eccentric can make these exercises much more interesting, so try to slow down the rhythm, especially in the descent phase of the movement, and see what it gives.

Last point, but not the least, extensions with lying dumbbells are an ideal exercise to associate with the curl seated with two dumbbells (for biceps) to make Unsuperset.Just make a series of extensions with lying dumbbells, then sit at the end of the bench and, without interruption, go directly to curls with dumbbells.Rest a minute and make a second Superset.Rest for a minute for another minute and make a third and last Superset.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with rear slits with Landmine.

How to make the rear slots with Landmine: 1: Installez-vous avec les pieds écartés de la largeur desépaulesen tenant l’extrémité d’une barre de weight training à hauteur de poitrine, fixée à une landmine.
2: Back a leg and bend the two knees simultaneously.
3: Go down until the rear knee touches the ground.
4: Then push with the front foot and stretch your leg to get up completely and return to the starting position.
5: Repeat this movement until you make the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: At the bottom of the movement, your two legs must form an angle of 90 degrees at the knees.
Keep in mind that with any type of slit, if you want to focus on the quadriceps, remember to take a slightly smaller step, and go up by pushing on the tip of the foot.
On the other hand, if you want to emphasize the glutes and lesischio-legs of a slit, take a slightly larger step and grow with the heel of the foot.
Remember to keep your back straight.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the SVEND PRESS.

How to do the SVEND PRES?: 1: Hold two 5 or 10 kilos “sandwich” discs with both hands flat on each side while touching the discs on your chest.
3: Then keep your body's discs away until your arms are stretched in front of you, while contracting the pectorals.Exhale during this phase of the exercise.
4: Bring the discs to your chest and inspire.
5: Repeat this movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Use bodybuilding discs that you can tighten comfortably with your hands.
You can recruit the upper part of the pectorals by moving your hands slightly upwards.
Make the movements slowly, without haste.
Be sure to tighten the discs strongly against each other for the duration of the exercise in order to effectively solicit the pectoral muscles.
Keep the right bust and curved chest to maintain tension on the pectoral muscles.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the Hack Squat.

How to do the Hack squat?: 1: Before getting on the machine, choose the load you want to raise.You should be able to use a larger load with a hack squat device than with a squat at the helm, but it is always better to start gradually to familiarize yourself with the load.

2: The starting position consists in placing your feet flat on the tray and by giving you the padding that support your back.Make sure your feet is advanced enough to allow you to get down completely.The feet should be spread about the width of the shoulders, the toes being slightly turned outwards.Your knees can be slightly folded at that time.

3: Get the handles that are right in your shoulders.You will first have to stand up to release the lock of the machine.In this position, squat, lowering yourself from the hips so that your buttocks are parallel to your knees.Ret your weight on your heels.

4: From the low position of the squat, go back to the standing position.Push with the heels and legs, not with the knees.Do not completely lock your knees at the top.Once at the top of the movement, inspire and start the movement again.

Training advice: Be sure not to completely stretch the legs between each repetition to keep a large tension on the quadriceps.
Push directly with your heels to maximize the work of the glutes.
By pushing with the middle of the foot, you will seek the quadriceps muscles more.
Keep the lower back against the backrest throughout the movement.
Make sure that the head is not too bent forward.
Do not spread the knees too much, which must remain in the axis of the feet.
It is possible to help yourself by simply pressing the knees with your hands, but only do it if necessary.
The angle of the toes is individual and depends on the anatomy of the hips and the mobility of the ankles of each person.Experience and adjust according to your sensations.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with walking with elastic.

How to walk with elastic?: 1: Start by putting yourself in a standing position, your legs slightly flexed, the hunches bent and the right gaze in front.Wrap an elastic band around your legs, just above your knees.
2: Keep your feet apart at the width of the shoulders and take diagonal steps from one side to the other by advancing.
3: Perform the number of rehearsals desired, forward, but also behind.

Training advice: Check the movements using your muscles, not your momentum.
Always keep your knees oriented outside.
If you do not feel your glutes activate, palpate your buttocks with your hands and try to interrupt the movement at the height of the contraction.
Start with a strip at the knee, progress by moving it towards the ankle, then combine the two positions to obtain a maximum difficulty.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the Belt Squat.

How to make the Belt Squat?: 1: Put the belt around the waist (neither too high nor too low).
2: To start, hold the handles to support you if necessary.Lift the load so that the bar emerges from the support.
3: Perform a flexion of legs, followed by an extension to return to the starting position.
4: To put the load in place, use the lever to bring the bar rest back in place and let the load descend on it.

Training advice: Make sure the chain is not too short or too long.Make a squat without load to check the length.

image_src_note.caption: The draw with the power cart.

How to make the Belt Squat?: 1: Put the belt around the waist (neither too high nor too low).
2: To start, hold the handles to support you if necessary.Lift the load so that the bar emerges from the support.
3: Perform a flexion of legs, followed by an extension to return to the starting position.
4: To put the load in place, use the lever to bring the bar rest back in place and let the load descend on it.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the dips with the rings.

How to do the dips to the rings?: 1: Set the height of the rings so that your feet do not touch the floor between each repetition.
2: Place yourself on the rings and put yourself in the support position.You should be above the rings, your arms stretched, and endure the weight of your body.The rings should not tremble.

3: Go down your body by folding your elbows and keeping your shoulders near the body.Perform regular and controlled movement.If possible, continue to descend until your shoulders almost touch your hands to make a complete movement.
4: Return to the starting position by contracting your triceps.

Training advice: The legs can be bent, crossed or straight during exercise.
To make sure you target the triceps, make sure your body is straight from top to bottom.If you lean, you will make the pectoral muscles work more.
If you start, you can do this exercise with a bench under the rings to rest one or two legs.This will allow you to familiarize yourself with the shoulder stabilization effort.
To intensify the exercise, you can do dips to the rings with a weighted.

name: Vertical extension seated at the bar

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with vertical extensions sitting at the bar.

How to make the vertical extensions seat: 1: Sit straight on a bench and hold a bar above your head with your arms stretched, hands apart from the width of the Spales.
2: Then slowly lower the bar behind your head, the elbows slightly inward, until your forearms are parallel to the ground.Inspire during this part of the movement.
3: Go up the bar to the starting position by bending the triceps, without locking the position at the top of the movement.Exhale during this phase.
4: Repeat this movement until you have made the number of rehearsals desired.

Training advice: The use of an EZ bar is ideal because it relieves tensions at the wrist level.
Look in front of you or slightly up to keep the natural camber from your spine.
Isolate movement so that it is limited to the bending and extension of the elbows while keeping the body and the immobile arms throughout the series.
You can also make this movement with dumbbells in order to benefit from greater freedom of movement.
Do not let your arms go down too much below the parallel during the eccentric (negative) part of the exercise.

name: Svarga Dvijasana (posture of the bird of paradise)

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the bird of paradise.

How to make the posture of the bird of p: 1: Place yourself in the center of the carpet, start with your hand-attached hands and take some breaths here to connect the body with breathing.
2: Flex the bust forward and bring the head so that your gaze is on your left foot.
3: Bring the right shoulder inside the right knee.
4: Place the right hand behind the calf, and move the knee to place the shoulder behind the knee, then link your hands together.
5: Transfer your weight to your free leg (the one that is not linked).
6: When you feel that your other foot becomes lighter, start lifting it from the ground.
7: Keep the lifted leg folded for now and focus on opening the chest by rolling your shoulders up and back.
8: Attach your gaze to a stable point (Drishti).
9: Hold the whole body on a straight line.Pull the navel inward and upward to activate the abdominal muscles.
10: Start extending the leg lifted on the side without letting the hip of the standing leg go to the side.
11: Hold your fixed Drishti and lift the chest and chin slightly up to lengthen the spine.Continue to tighten the abdominal muscles.
12: To release Svarga Dvijasana, slightly fold the two legs and lean your chest again forward until you can comfortably release the link of your hands.
13: Repeat this Asana on the other side.

Training advice: Focus on the alignment of the spine and accept that the raised leg is not as high as you wish.
Avoid rounding the spine and voting your shoulders forward.
Also allow you to fold the raised leg a little, as this will give you more amplitude of motion at the hip joint to tilt it forward and, therefore, lengthen the spine.
Keep the front -oriented support foot.Do not turn it inward or outside.
Discard the toes to distribute the weight of your body homogeneously over the entire foot.
High up the update the standing leg allows better support and better rooting in the ground.

Use a strap around the thigh if your shoulders do not allow sufficient amplitude of motion to link your arms around your leg.This will also allow you to keep the open chest more easily as well as the hip.
Another option in the event of amplitude of motion limited to the shoulders and chest is to stand at the tibia of the leg lifted (by keeping it folded) instead of surrounding it with your arm.
If you have trouble finding the balance in Svarga Dvijasana, do it against a wall.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the Drag Curl.

How to do the Drag Curl?: 1: In a standing position, hold a bar using a supination taking with the width of the offenders.Your arms should be almost entirely tense and the bar must rest on your thighs.

2: Exhale by bending your arms and raise the bar along your body, holding it near the bust.To keep the bar near you, you will have to bring your elbows backwards.Continue to raise the bar as high as you can without letting your elbows move forward.
3: At the top of the movement, keep the position and contract your biceps.
4: Return to the starting position by reversing the movement and descending the bar along your body
5: Repeat the movement until you have made the number of repetitions planned.

Training advice: Maintain a slight bending of the elbow at the bottom of the movement to keep the tension in the biceps.
If you feel discomfort in the forearm or wrist using a bar, opt for a curl ez bar or dumbbells.
As with all exercises, do not neglect the eccentric phase.So don't let the bar down too quickly and control the descent.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the Kickback standing with dumbbells.

Comment faire le kickback debout avec du: 1: By holding a dumbbell in each hand, put yourself in the starting position, standing, your body leaning forward, your back flat, slightly raised head and slightly bent knees.
2: Start with the arms parallel to the ground.Your elbow should be folded at an angle of 90 degrees.

3: En utilisant la force de vos triceps uniquement (sans balancer les haltères), tendez les coudes et levez les dumbbells jusqu’à ce que vos bras soient tendus et que vos triceps soient complètement contractés.
4: Focus on the contraction of triceps at the top.
5: Redescendez les dumbbells en les contrôlant jusqu’à la position de départ.
6: Repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: The biggest error that most people make concerns the position of the arm.Observe the position of the arm in the illustration carefully.You will see that the upper part of the arm remains locked in a position parallel to the ground at the start and at the end.In other words, you are not soliciting your shoulders.

Allowing the upper part of the arm to descend and not keep it in the same position is a huge error that almost everyone commits.If you make heavy kickbacks, a small amount of movement in the shoulder joint is natural and acceptable, but remember that the triceps are not stimulated correctly if you lift the load using your shoulders and thatIt almost becomes a pendulum movement.The action must always revolve around the elbow joint and the triceps must perform most of the work.
If you have a history of low back pain, the version with an arm with a knee on a bench is a good variant, because it considerably reduces the fatigue of the lumbar region.

Many people who suffer from elbow pains by expanding triceps lying with dumbbells or standing in the pulley find that they can make painless kickbacks, due to the unique resistance curve, which can be another advantageof this exercise.

To intensify your training while saving time, try to do a superset with kickbacks with dumbbells and curls with dumbbells.If the strength of your biceps and triceps is almost equal, you can even use the same pair of dumbbells, which is saving time and practicality.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the posture of the plow.

How to do Halasana?: 1: Lie on ledos, arms along the body, palms down.
2: By inspiring, use your musclesabdominal muscles to peel off your feet from the ground, to lift your legs vertically at a 90 degree angle.
3: Continue to breathe normally by supporting your hips and back with your hands and taking them off from the ground.
4: From a slight pendulum movement, pass your legs over your head until your toes touch the ground behind your head.
5: Make sure your back is perpendicular to the ground.Although this position can be difficult to do at first, it generally becomes easier after a few tests.
6: Hold this position for 30 seconds to 1 minute and let your body relax more and more with each breathing.
7: Then slowly return to the starting position.

Training advice: Laposure of the bridge (Setu Bandhasana) is an asana which can be carried out before Halasana to prepare you.
Do this Asana slowly and slowly.Be sure not to force on your neck and not to drive it into the ground.
Avoid making sudden movements by bringing the legs down.
Strengthens the muscles of the neck, the shoulders, the abdominals and the back;
Soothes the nervous system, reduces stress and fatigue;
Tones the legs and improves their flexibility;
Stimulates the thyroid gland and strengthens the immune system;
Help women during menopause.
Avoid practicing this posture if you have a neck injury or if you suffer from diarrhea or hypertension;
Women should avoid practicing this Asana during pregnancy and during the first two days of their menstrual cycle;
Consult a doctor before practicing the plow if you have recent or old problems in the spine.

name: Vertical extensions with both hands with dumbbell

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with vertical extensions with both hands with dumbbell.

How to make vertical extensions with bot: 1: Select the desired dumbbell in the rack and sit on a 60-degree tilted bench.
2: Get the dumbbell with your hands and lift the dumbbell to the top of your shoulder.Breathe deeply, then put it in position above and behind your head.
3: Slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head unlocking your elbows.
4: When your forearms are parallel or just below, bring the dumbbell to the starting position by contracting the triceps to reach out.
5: Repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: The great point of vigilance with this movement is perhaps the stress that it could potentially impose on your elbows.So be sure to warm up enough before considering using heavy dumbbells.Also be careful not to lock the elbows with each rehearsal.
Keep your head in a relatively neutral position, do not let your neck bend forward, as it could exert excessive pressure on the cervical column.
Be sure not to grip the bottom of the spine too much by maintaining tension in the abdominals and glutes.
To improve the tension and the spirit/muscle connection, it is advisable to work on the eccentric phase (descent) of the exercise slowly.
The extension with dumbbell can be made with both hands, or with a single arm.To find out more, see the exercise sheet of vertical extensions of an arm with dumbbell.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the chest press with suspension straps.

How to do the chest press with suspensio: 1: Attach the straps to an anchor above your head.The handles will hang up to the size.
2: Enter the handles, hands in pronation.
3: Lean forward until your body forms an angle of 40 degrees, arms stretched, and the abdominal muscles engaged to keep the right body from head to toe.
4: Go down, flexing your elbows, until your chest reaches the level of the handles in the middle of the straps.
5: Exhale by getting up, keeping the right body, and returning to the starting position.You have made a rehearsal.

Training advice: It is recommended to know how to do severalPes or to have already practiced Ledé developed lying down, that is to say exercises for pectorals in stable conditions, before adding instability with the suspension straps.You must be able to perform this exercise fluidly and smoothly.

Not having enough strength to do this exercise is frequent, especially among beginners.If you cannot execute the chest press properly with straps, it is possible to adjust your position.Reduce the workload (your body weight) by taking a small step forward or by raising the height of the handles of your straps.
To reduce instability, opt for a wide spacing of the feet.
Conversely, if you want to challenge your balance, exercise on a single foot in support.Alternate with each complete series.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the child.

How to do Balasana?: 1: Extend a carpet or towel and kneel on it.
2: From the four-legged position, sit on your feet, put your big toes in contact with each other, then spread your knees to obtain a width equivalent to that of the hips.
3: Take a deep inspiration, exhale, and place your chest on your thighs.
4: Then place your hands along your bent legs, palms up.
5: Your head is in front of your knees and the forehead against the ground.
6: Make your sacrum are on the back of your pool.

Training advice: Balasana being very easy to practice, you can do it longer than other asanas of more level.You can start with 30 seconds and go up to a few minutes.
The position where you lean forward and where your chest rests on your thighs can last 1 to 3 minutes.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the curl tilted in the pulley.

Comment faire le curl inclin\u00e9 \u00e: 1: Placez un banc incliné à 45 degrés. Installez une barre droite sur une pulley basse. Reculez le banc incliné afin d’obtenir une plus grande tension sur la poulie.
2: With both hands, enter the right bar with a supination.Sit and lie on the tilted bench.Make sure your back is firmly tackled on the bench.Your elbows should be aligned with your hips.
3: Take a great inspiration, exhale then make a bend of the elbow;Contract your biceps and bring the bar back to your chest.Strongly contract the biceps in a high position.
4: Return to the starting position by holding the charge.
5: Repeat this movement until you have made the number of rehearsals desired.

Training advice: Keep your elbows fixed throughout the exercise.
Do not let your elbows go up or down and always maintain a slight bending to maintain a constant tension on the biceps.
Do not take off your upper body from the tilted bench to take advantage of the momentum that would allow you to lift the load.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the Bear Plank with Kickback.

How to do the Bear Plank with Kickback?: 1: Start by putting yourself in the bear board position (on the hands and toes).
2: On an expiration, slowly hold out one leg until the knee is at the hip.
3: Keep this position for 2 seconds, then return to the position of the bear board.
4: Perform the same movement with the other leg and continue to alternate between the right leg and the left leg until you make the desired number of repetitions.

Training advice: Keep your back flat to properly engage the abs and glutes and avoid forcing on the lower back.
Tilting your neck up or from left to right can exert unnecessary pressure and cause pain.It is best to continue to look at the soil naturally compared to the position of your spine.
Your breathing must remain deep and regular, even though your abdominals are contracted.
To bring variety to this exercise of adfi abs, raise the leg, keeping the leg bent at 90 °.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with a concentrated curl.

How to do the concentrated curl?: 1: Start by taking a dumbbell and sit on a flat bench.Your legs should be spread more than your hips.
2: Lean down and bring your upper to your legs.

3: Place the elbow of your arm that makes curl on the inside of your leg, and place your opposite hand on the other leg for more stability.Your working arm must be lying with a slight bending of the elbow.The dumbbell must be near the lower part of your calf, the palm turned outwards of your leg.
4: Pivot your shoulder outwards and contract your abs.All rehearsals must be carried out in this position.

5: While keeping your arm in contact with the interior of your leg, contract your biceps, and start to fold your elbow.Fold your elbow until your forearm between almost in contact with your arm.The dumbbell should end up near your shoulder without touching it.
6: Strongly contract your biceps for a second at the top of the movement.
7: Slowly straighten your forearm to lower the dumbbell to the starting position.
8: Take a break from a second at the bottom before starting the next rehearsal.

Advice for concentrated curl: Maintain a slight bending of the elbow at the bottom of the movement in order to keep a certain tension in the biceps.
The fact of making a slow eccentric movement (descending part) of the exercise can help improve tension and muscle connection.
The most common error during the concentrated curl is to perform partial requests.Either the people stop before they have made a full curl, or they do not bring the dumbbell in the starting position.

Another current error made during the concentrated curl with dumbbells is to rush the cadence of the movement.In other words, people make controlled flexions and then let the dumbbell quickly fall down.
Remember that it is always better to lift a lesser load with a good technique than to lift a larger load with a bad form of execution.
This unilateral insulation movement will be very interesting to balance the strength of your biceps if you are a beginner.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the bent over drive.

How to make the bent over disk socket?: 1: Penchez-vous et saisissez les poignées des disques de weight training au lieu de saisir la barre, les mains en position neutre (face à face).
2: Lift the bar and raise your bust slightly until it is tilted between 15 and 45 degrees from the ground, while keeping your back straight.
3: From the starting position at the bottom, start the ascending part (contraction) of the movement by pulling your shoulder blades backwards and bring them closer to each other.
4: Then bring the bar to your abdomen by pulling your elbows upwards.Keep your abdominal belt contracted and your chest raised for the duration of the movement.
5: Pull up as much as your motion amplitude allows it.When you approach the top, contract the upper back muscles to the maximum.
6: Slowly go down the bar in the starting position, where you will feel a slight stretch while retaining a tension in the upper back muscles.

Training advice: Do not make flexions and extensions from the waist when you lift and lower the bar.Hold the same angle of the trunk throughout the movement.
A current error is to use your arms too much.You should imagine that your hands are hooks and that your arms only connect these hooks to the upper back muscles.
As this variant of Rowing offers greater amplitude of motion, be sure to take advantage of it and pull up as high as your amplitude of motion allows it.
When you pull the bar upwards, retract your shoulder blades and feel the contraction of the back muscles intensify.Concentrate mentally on the contraction of the upper back muscles.

Lifting too heavy loads and using too much momentum increases the risk of injury, especially in the lower back.The biggest error is to use your legs or hips to lift more weight than you could normally manage with good technique.
The use of a bodybuilding belt can help some people keep the abdominal belt closed while maintaining intra-abdominal pressure.

It is possible to carry out this exercise unilaterally as shown in the illustration below.Unilateral training is very advantageous because it allows greater desabdominal work.It can also allow you to correct a force imbalance when one side is more dominant than the other.

Training advice.caption: The variant of bent over Row alternating disk.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with the inclined shoulder press.

How to do the shoulder press?: 1: Load the machine with the quantity of load desired.
2: Adjust the bench in height so that your elbows are below the parallel when catching the handles on each side.
3: Sit on the machine, back and head in support against the folder.
4: Inspire to stiffen your abdomen and then develop the load upwards.
5: The arms must be stretched and the elbows slightly bent.
6: Go back up the load in the starting position while slowly expiring.This counts for a rehearsal.
7: Perform the desired number of rehearsals or until failure.

Advice for the shoulder press: Do not let your head advance excessively.
Keeping your elbows slightly bent at the top and not locking them completely helps keep tension on the shoulders.
If you start with this exercise, start by loading the machine with light discs to warm your shoulders;Then increase the load little by little.
If this is the second or third exercise of your session, you can start working directly with your effective charge.
If you want to have strength, make 4 series between 3 and 6 repetitions with 2 minutes of rest between each series.

To promote the hypertrophy of your deltoids, perform 4 series of 8 to 10 repetitions by controlling the descent well.Make your rehearsals without stopping time at the bottom or at the top of the movement in order to have maximum voltage during your series.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted in the chin draw with elastic.

How to make the chin draw with elastic?: 1: Put yourself in a standing with your back in a neutral position (do not put your head forward and do not lean back during this exercise), place your backwards and take out your chest.
2: Place the resistance strip under your feet, and enter the ends with both hands.
3: Pull the elastic upwards thinking of lifting your elbows rather than the elastic.This makes it possible to use deltoids rather than augisses.
4: Drive slowly by controlling the movement to the starting position.
5: Repeat the exercise to the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: If you place your elbows higher than the shoulder level, the tension will be moved to the trapezius and the upper back.
Keep a slight bend of the elbows in the low position to maintain constant tension on your shoulders and trapezius.
Do not let your back arched when you pull the elastic upwards.
When you go up the elbows, be sure not to move your head.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the crunch butterfly.

How to make the crunch butterfly?: 1: Sit on the ground and place yourself in the butterfly position: open knees with the foot plants in contact with each other.
2: Be sure not to lean your head forward throughout the exercise.Keep her aligned with your neck.
3: Lie and place your arms behind your head.Keep your arms outstretched and close hands.
4: Put the hip flexor muscles in tension and contract the abdominals to bring the upper and front up to your body.Take off your upper body from the floor and stretch your arms forward.
5: Go forward until you can touch the floor or your feet.
6: Return to the starting position by lengthening.
7: Repeat the movement until you have made the number of repetitions planned.

Training advice: Make sure your hips are in contact with the ground throughout the exercise.
If you do not open your body and keep your back right, you will especially work the hip flexor muscles.
If you perform too fast rehearsals without respecting the technique, your hips may no longer be in contact with the ground.
Too explosive rehearsals can also unbalance you.
If you have a lot of strength in the abdominals, it is possible to hold a Ball medicine in your hands during the movement to intensify the exercise.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with crunch in the Hammer Strength machine.

How to make crunch at the machine?: 1: Sit in the abdominal machine, your back supported against the folder.
2: Stuck your feet under the sausages.
3: Enter the handles on each side of your head.
4: Exhale by contracting your abdominals to fold your abdomen and your pool so as to pull the handles down and the pouin pantry upwards.
5: Inhale by relaxing the abs and the basin to return to the starting position.
6: Repeat the movement until you make the number of repetitions planned.

Training advice: Adjust the height of the machine's seat for optimal comfort and amplitude of motion.
Hold your back firmly supported against the folder.
Keep your neck in a neutral position: do not force with your neck.
If you cannot make a crunch with a complete amplitude of motion, it may be that you use an overly heavy load.
Do not pull down with your arms;Keep them fixed.The whole movement must be carried out by the bending of your abs.

Training advice.caption: Another version of crunch machine with fixed feet and legs.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the inverted board.

How to make the inverted board?: 1: Sit on the floor, tense legs, and place your hands on the ground to support your body weight.
2: Take off your buttocks from the ground and push your hips up so that your whole body forms a straight line with your arms vertically.
4: Repeat the exercise until you have reached the desired duration.

Training advice: You can also make an inverted board with your forearms to support the weight of your body (see the video below).
Keep your body straight and do not drop your buttocks.
You can point your hands in any direction when you do this exercise.
To increase the difficulty, you can do this exercise on one leg.This variant makes it possible to activate the stabilizing muscles more than a standard inverted board.
You can also lift your legs alternately to intensify this inverted board even more.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested at the Superman.

How to make the Superman?: 1: Lie on the ground on your stomach.
2: Keep your arms and legs completely extended.
3: Raise your arms and legs on the ground simultaneously as high as possible.
4: Hold the position for a few seconds.
6: Repeat this movement until you have made the number of rehearsals desired.

Training advice: Do not raise your arms, bust and legs beyond the feeling of a slight stretch in the back.

You can familiarize yourself with the exercise of the superman by starting by lifting only your arms and chest for a few rehearsals, then lifting only the legs for a few repetitions, before lifting them simultaneously.
You can also exercise the superman Contolaterally, lifting your left arm with your right leg, then your right arm with your left leg, before going to the full superman.
The most interesting part of the exercise is the isometric contraction of a few seconds when your arms and legs are raised.
Your head must remain in a neutral position.Avoid any tension at the neck.

name: Flexions latérales à la pulley basse

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités aux flexions latérales à la pulley basse.

Comment faire les flexions lat\u00e9rale: 1: Fixez une poignée simple à une pulley basse.
2: Place yourself on the side of the pulley.Lean and grab the handle.Then get up and take one or two steps aside from the pulley.
3: Feet apart from the width of the hips, curved breasts, inspire and fold the bust laterally until you feel the muscles contract by expiring.
4: Inspire by slowly bringing the handle back to the starting position by leaning the bust to the pulley.
5: Repeat this movement to the number of repetitions planned.
6: Retournez-vous et recommencez les flexions latérales à la pulley avec l’autre côté.

Training advice: Perform flexions slowly and controlled.
You can either place your hand that does not work behind your head, or keep your arm along your body so that it slips along your leg during the exercise.
Do not lean back when you do lateral flexion.On the contrary, you must slightly lean forward in order to maximize the contraction of the obliques, as you would for acrunchlateral.
Do not use excessive charges for this exercise, as it can cause injury and exert significant pressure on the back and spine.Instead, opt for moderate loads with a large number of rehearsals.
It is possible to place your free hand on your obliques who work in order to better feel the contraction.

Training advice.caption: Variant of lateral flexions in the low pulley with hand on the obliques.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked with the posture of the dancer.

How to make the dancer's posture?: 1: Start in standing position, feet joined.
2: Bring a leg back to your chest and press your standing leg.Raise your ball joint (Duquadriceps commitment) and contract your buttocks.
3: Bring back your folded knee downwards in the alignment of your leg, which has remained in a vertical position.
4: Start leaning forward and stretch your foot up behind you.
5: Put your free arm along your body to hang on your feet up.
6: To get an inverted socket, bring your elbow to the same side outside the leg and turn the palm of your hand upwards, grabbing the tip of the foot.
7: Release your free arm and turn your chest forward from your carpet, lifting your elbow to the sky.
8: Raise your free arm backwards and grab your updated foot.Raise your foot by bombing the chest and straightening your leg in the vertical position.

Training advice: If you start with this posture, stand in the back of a chair or help yourself with a wall to ensure your balance and stability.
Many beginners, when they raise their leg, tend to have a cramp in the back of the thigh.To avoid this, keep your foot to be fucked up (that is to say, pull the top of your foot towards the tibia).

You can use a strap to access the dancer's posture more easily and to keep your straight hips forward of the carpet and your raised knee in the extension of your hip rather than being shifted on the side.
Do not lock the knee of the standing leg.Keep a slight knee bending to avoid this.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the greeting.

How to do Namaskarasana?: 1: Crouching with your feet flat on the ground, spread about 60 cm.With this position in squat, the knees must be well spread and the elbows supported against the interior of the knees.
2: Join your hands in front of your chest to make a gesture of prayer.
4: The eyes can be open or closed.
5: Inspire and lean your head back.Feel a pressure on the back of the neck.
6: Simultaneously, use the elbows to spread the knees as far as possible.Hold this position for 3 seconds while holding your breath.
7: Exhale and stretch your arms directly in front of the body.
8: At the same time, push your knees inward, bringing your arms inward.
9: The head should be leaning forward, the chin pressed against the chest.
10: Hold this position, holding your breathing, for 3 seconds.Return to the starting position.

Training advice: Inspire by bringing the palms closer to the hands in front of his chest.
Exhale by stretching your arms forward.

Some people can crouch without much preparation, while others will need to prepare their bodies for posture.The key to unlocking your squat is to practice it every day.The more you practice it, the more you will be able to explore and maintain this position.

Your heels can lift yourself up when you cush up.To keep your balance, place a folded towel under your heels to stabilize them.Without this, the posture will exert a pressure forward rather than downwards.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the lifting of the earth stretched legs.

How to lift the earth tight legs?: 1: Place the bar above your shoe laces and spread your legs to the width of the hips.
2: Push your hips back and switch forward until your chest is almost parallel to the ground.
3: Start your arms downwards and enter the bar while holding it to the shoulder width.
4: Make sure your spine remains in a neutral position, that your tibias are vertical and that your hips are almost the same height as your shoulders.
5: Lift the bar to reach the standing position.
6: Make sure the bar follows a straight line while you hold your knees and hips.
7: Once you have locked the hips, reversed the movement by pushing the hips back and leaning forward.
8: Return the bar to the ground, put yourself in position and repeat this movement sequence until you make the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Keep the bar near your body to improve the mechanical lever effect.
If you can lower the bar low enough to touch the floor, exercise on a raised platform.
At no time does your back are rounded or snapped up.
Also be sure to perform slow and controlled movements to prevent the momentum from coming into play.

It can be tempting to crouch when you learn to lift loads, because this is what seems natural for most people.Make sure that your legs are as tense as possible and repeat a mantra of the “buttocks back, buttocks back, buttocks back” while you make your movement.

Converse, Vans or other skate shoes brands are your best friends.The lifting of soil in shoes that have a large thickness of foam or “gel” makes the push in the ground practically impossible by being stable.These shoes do not have a raised heel, which makes it possible to immediately imitate the “barefoot” movement scheme and improve mobility.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested at the Shrug Bar.

How to do the bar bar?: 1: Enter a bar at the shoulder width and lift it at the thighs.
2: Keep a spacing of the shoulder width.Contract your abdominal belt and take out the chest.
3: Contract the trapezius and the upper back and lift the bar as high as possible.Imagine you need to bring your trapezius until you touch your ears.
4: In high position, strongly contract your trapezoid muscles and maintain the position for a second.
5: Return to the starting position by holding the charge.Make sure a good stretch at the bottom of the movement.
6: Then repeat this sequence of movements until you have reached the number of repetitions desired.

Training advice: Looking slightly upwards while raising your shoulders can promote contraction, because trapezius participate in the skull movements.This movement must be fluid and controlled, because a ballistic movement could cause a neck injury.
Limit momentum, tremors and excessive load of the load.Everyone laughs at the way you raise your shoulders.
Do not let your head advance excessively when you tighten the trapezi, it can put your neck in a vulnerable position and cause an injury.
Do not rotate the shoulders forward and rear with shrug exercises.Simply follow a straight movement from top to bottom and try to touch your ears with your trapezoids.
Do not forget to expire during the contraction and to inspire during the descending phase, keeping the abdominal belt engaged.
It is essential to keep your arms stretched throughout the movement.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at Curl Spider.

How to do the curl spider?: 1: Install an inclined bench at an angle of 45 degrees.
2: Take a bar and lie down on the tilted bench.
3: Make sure your chest rests on the bench.Keep your legs stretched, but fold your knees slightly.Press your feet on the floor to keep yourself in position.
4: Bring the bar below the tilted bench.Keep a slight decline in the elbow.The bar must be in the alignment of your wrist, your elbows and yourepaules.
5: Take a great inspiration then exhale.Raise the bar until your hands are at the same level as your shoulders.Contract your biceps at the top and hold the position one to two seconds.
6: Return to the starting position while holding the bar.
7: Repeat this movement until you have made the number of rehearsals desired.

Training advice: Make sure your upper body is well stuck on the bench and your shoulders do not move.

Your elbows must remain in the same position throughout the movement.They should not move forward or back.If you let your arms drift forward, your shoulders will do part of the work and decrease the effort of the biceps.
You can use an EZ bar or dumbbells for this exercise.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted in the lifting of Romanian earth with Kettlebell.

How to make the Romanian earth lifted wi: 1: Enter a kettlebell by hand and put yourself in position, the feet spaced with the shoulder width.
2: Standing, straight, start the Romanian lift movement by tilting your hips backwards and leaning forward until the kettles pass below the height of the knees.

3: Take a break at the bottom and reversed the movement by returning to the standing position.To do this, push through your heels and, using your glutes and hamstrings, tend your knees and hips.Make sure that the Kettlebell remains in contact with your legs.Repeat the exercise to the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: The Romanian earth lifting with Kettlebell is an excellent way to focus on the eccentric part of the exercise, when the hamstrings lie down.This is why it is essential to do this exercise slowly in order to maximize the tension on the back of the legs.
You should feel a deep stretch of the hamstrings when your hips retreat.
The whole movement must come from hips.Keep your back straight (avoid rounding your back) and avoid bending the knees excessively throughout the exercise.

It is important to lower the kettlebell as far as your hamstrings allow.Some practitioners stop going down as soon as they feel tension in their hamstrings.To tell the truth, lowering the kettlebell to the knees is a partial repetition.
Do not let the kettlebell move away from the body, it must graze your legs during the eccentric part of the movement.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested at the bust rotations with elastic.

How to rotate the bust with elastic?: 1: Attach an elastic to chest and grab it with two hands.
2: Hold the elastic band with both hands and spread to tension it.
3: Start your arms in front of you, tighten your abs and turn the chest until the arms are stretched on the side opposite the anchor point.
4: Return to the starting position and perform as many repetitions as necessary.
5: Make the movement on both sides.

Training advice: Your legs and pelvis must remain fixed during movement.
Make rather slow and controlled movements.
Flex the knees to ensure better stability.
To increase the difficulty, you just need to move away from the anchor point.
Follow your hands in your hands in order to have a security position of the head.

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités aux extensions des calves au hack-squat.

Comment faire les extensions des calves: 1: Stand on the hack squat machine, your back flat against the support and the padding on the top of your shoulders.
2: Take out the heels from the platform.
3: Unlock the lever so that the machine can move freely (although this is not necessarily necessary).
4: By keeping the knees slightly bent, stretch the ankles to lift the hack squat machine as high as possible.
5: Maintain this position one to two seconds by performing a maximum contraction.
6: Slowly flex your ankles to lower the machine until you feel a slight stretch in your calves.
7: Repeat the movement to the number of repetitions planned.
8: If you unlocked the lever at the start, be sure to put it back in place when you are finished.

Training advice: Keep your back and your right hips and flat against the support.
Your knees should always be slightly bent.Do not lock them.
Make a slow and controlled movement.

If you turn your toes outwards, the internal chief (medial) of your gastrocnemian will be highlighted.On the other hand, if you turn your toes inwards or if you hold them pointed out, the internal and external (side) chiefs of your gastrocnemian will be activated almost equally.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the curly dumbbell.

How to make the curly dumbbell?: 1: Placez un banc incliné entre 30 et 60 degrés, choisissez les dumbbells que vous voulez dans le rack et asseyez-vous bien droit, le dos à plat contre le banc.
2: Avec une prise neutre (paumes vers l’intérieur de votre corps), prenez une grande inspiration et contractez les biceps pour monter les deux dumbbells vers vos épaules.
3: Rotate the cuffs to the outside (supination) in order to increase the contraction of the biceps at the end of the movement.
4: Effectuez une contraction puissante en haut du mouvement puis redescendez lentement les dumbbells en position de départ.
5: Repeat this movement until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Tips for the Inclined Half Curl: Do not let the elbows move behind the body.Likewise, make sure that the shoulder does not move forward: only the forearms should move during the exercise to the force of the biceps.
Maintain a slight bending of the elbow at the bottom of the movement to maintain the tension in the biceps.
Having a slow eccentric movement (descending part) of the exercise improves tension and muscle connection.

Do not make the pendulum with your dumbbells using the momentum to go up: it is completely useless.Prefer to decrease the load to move dumbbells only to the strength of a constant and sustained muscle effort.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with hip thrust with suspension straps.

How to make hip thrust with suspension s: 1: Lie on ledosdevors to the suspension straps adjusted about 50 cm from the ground.
2: Place your feet in the straps, keeping your knees bent at 90 °.It will be your starting position.
3: To make the movement, peel off your buttocks from the floor until full extension, pushing your feet down.
4: Take a break at the top of the movement to properly contract your glutes, before returning to the starting position.

Training advice: Place your arms stretched on the sides to help you stabilize your body.
The body must form a straight line, from the knee neck to the top of the movement.

To intensify the exercise, you can do it unilaterally.To do this, group the straps and spend a single foot inside.Put your completely vertical free leg and make the pelvis flexions and extensions with a single leg.This variant will ask you for an additional deabdominal effort to prevent the body from rotating on one side or the other.

name: Extension of triceps above the head with elastic

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used to the triceps extensions above the head.

How to make the triceps extensions above: 1: Put your feet one in front of the other and place the rear foot on the middle of the elastic band.
2: Place the elastic above your head to put yourself in position with your arms stretched above your head.
3: From there, lower the elastic behind your head so that your hands are slightly below your elbows.
4: Then hold out your arms over your head.
5: Do not forget to strongly contract the triceps.

Training advice: The elbows must be perfectly motionless throughout the execution.Only your forearms and your hand will be in motion.
Keep your head high and look straight in front of you throughout the movement.
As with all the exercises with elastic, make sure you have a certain tension on the elastic from the start.

image_src_note.caption: 25 Pull UP Variations

How to traction?: 1: Place yourself under a traction bar.Jump and enter the bar (hands in pronation) with a width slightly higher than that of the shoulders.
2: Your shoulders, upper back and hips should be properly aligned.The arms are perfectly tense and your body is in suspension.This is the starting position.
3: Take a great inspiration then exhale.Then stand upwards by contracting the muscles of your back.
4: Bring the chin above the bar until the dorsals are well contracted, then slowly down to the starting position.
5: Repeat the movement to the number of repetitions planned.

Training advice: To help you make the movement, imagine that after lowering the shoulder blades, you try to move your elbows to the ground by activating the large backbone muscles.
If you feel that your biceps are too asked, use a false socket (without thumb).
Keep your legs straight if the bar is quite high.
Avoid finding yourself in hyperextension of the lumbar column by tightening the glutes too strongly and by contracting the abdominals.
Go down to the almost complete extension of the arms, but avoid locking them completely, as this can exert a unnecessary constraint on the elbow and shoulder joint.

Be sure to avoid swinging of the body.Indeed, a superfluous swing at the bottom of the traction movement will turn into a large swing during the traction movement.This big swinging will appear instabilities during traction and impose a “S” form.This curved trajectory is not optimal, because if you get too far from the bar, it will be much more difficult to finish the traction.

As with other movements such as the bench press or the lifting of the earth, it is very effective to simulate/imagine that you want to fold the bar.This will facilitate a good position of the scapula throughout the exercise.Keep this in mind!

Never look at the bottom, actually ... Look at the top!This is a very important point to take into account, because it will help you properly position your shoulder blades.Having suspended and looking up to the bar will facilitate a good retraction during traction.So just before you start shooting, try to look at the bar.In addition, this will give you a feeling of confidence, because looking in the direction of the movement will visually guide us and will help you finish the traction.
If you cannot do a single traction in body weight, start by doing negative pull -ups or elastic pull -ups.
To make the exercise more difficult, wear a weighted vest or a bodybuilding belt with weights or hold a dumbbell between your feet.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with unilateral rowing with elastic.

How to do unilateral rowing with elastic: 1: Hold on the elastic hand, and leave one end to the ground.Place your (right) foot inside the loop and stand on the elastic.

2: Place your other foot (left) inside the other end of the elastic.Display your feet to stand on the strip.With your left hand, stretch your arm down and catch the two lengths of the elastic (so that it is doubled) in the middle.Pull it up so that the two parts of the elastic are tense.
3: Pivot your body to the right to position yourself in an open position, slightly diagonally, and adjust your position to feel comfortable and stable.
4: Place your right hand on your right knee or forearm on your thigh to support you.
5: Start the exercise by pulling the elastic upwards, and focus on "lifting your elbow".
6: When approaching the summit, contract the upper back muscles by making a maximum contraction.Maintain this contraction during a fraction of a second at the top.
7: Slowly and under control, go down the elastic in the starting position.Repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.
8: Change side and repeat the exercise until you have done the same number of rehearsals.

Training advice: A unique and incredibly effective variant is to hold a dumbbell and the elastic at the same time.Rowings with dumbbells and elastic will perhaps be a little simpler if you fix the elastic at an anchor point on the ground, a post or a support, but you can always use the version presented here.

Any rowing exercise in a leaning position can cause tensions in the lower back.However, with this version with an arm, where you use the inactive arm to support you, tension and risk of injury are reduced.By placing your free hand on your knee or forearm on your thigh, you support yourself and reduce the tension in the back.You can also place your hand on a wall, the top of a chair, a table or any other solid object to support you.

name: Adho Mukha Svanasana (dog posture head down)

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the dog downstairs.

How to make the posture of the dog downs: 1: For the starting position, place a yoga carpet and put on all fours.Place your hands slightly in front of your shoulders.Your knees must be directly under your hips.
2: Press your hands on the floor.Back back the toes, exhale and gently back down the hips and knees from the ground, face down.Keep your knees and elbows folded for a while.Perform 3 breaths.
3: By expiring, raise the hips and stretch your legs to form an inverted V with your body.

4: The hands are spread from the width of the shoulders, the feet are apart from the width of the hips and parallel to each other.The toes point to the right in front.The heels touch the floor, the ears touch the inside of the arms.
5: Look at your navel.You will feel an intense stretch in the posterior muscles of your legs.This is the final position.Stay in this position as long as you feel comfortable.Breathe deeply.
6: Exhale by folding your knees to return to the starting position.Relax.

Training advice: At the beginning, you can keep your knees slightly folded and your heels peelled from the ground.
Keep your head between your arms, without pressure on the neck.
Be sure to practice this Asana while keeping a good alignment, because it is easy to disinnate in this Asana.
Do not turn your hands outwards.By doing so, pressure is exercised on the outside of the wrists and you risk unbalanced yourself.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the half-skateau.

How to make the half-skate posture?: 1: Sit straight on a yoga carpet on the ground.Flex your legs.
2: Place your hands on the ground to support you and help you do the Asana slowly and easily.
3: Raise your legs half flexed, the front of the leg under the knee being parallel to the ground.
4: Take a balance on the basin and keep a stable position.
5: Start your arms in front of your leg at the knees and balance your body throughout this Asana.
6: Try to maintain your right right than possible for better results.
7: Stay in Ardha Navasana as long as you can (30 to 60 seconds).Continue to breathe normally.
8: With an expiration, lie down your legs and bring your hands back to the ground.

Training advice: Be sure to hire your abs and breathe regularly while you hold this posture.Your breathing should guide you.If you notice that you remember it excessively and that you have trouble reconnecting by concentrating, lower yourself and relax.

Focus on keeping your back straight rather than lifting your feet from the ground.Beginners can execute it while keeping their feet and hands on the ground to improve the balance of the posture while keeping their back straight.
If you start, make Ardha Navasana by placing your feet on the wall while keeping the bottom of the legs parallel to the ground.This keeps balance while keeping the posture.
You can also practice Ardha Navasana while keeping your hands behind your back, the palms touching the ground.

If you are comfortable, you can perform Paripurna Navasana (full boat posture).Unlike the half-skate posture, the knees are not folded and the legs are completely tense.The head and feet remain aligned.The upper body forms a V with the lower body.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the cobra.

How to make the cobra posture?: 1: To start the installation, lie on your stomach and put your forehead on the ground.
2: Place your legs straight back, keeping your feet apart from the width of the hips.Try to extend your toes backwards while pressing the carpet with your ten toes to activate Vosquadriceps.
3: Put your hands on the carpet, next to your rib cage, spreading your fingers and pressing slightly on the ground.
4: Now lift your head, shoulders and chest slowly, keeping the neck long.Try to focus on the uprising of your sternum (the flat bone in the middle of your chest) and slowly raise your chin.

5: Then stretch your arms slowly and carefully, insisting on the opening of your chest.Try to wrap your chest column and keep your lower abdomen in contact with the floor.This will allow the pool to remain anchored on the carpet.
6: Be sure to straighten your arms so that your shoulders are far from your ears.
7: Try to lift your chin and look up until your neck is aligned with the curve that has been set up with the top of yourdos.

Training advice: Try to focus on the push down with your feet to activate your posterior muscles.
Look for moving the lower edge of your shoulder blades.This will help you open your chest.
Be sure to keep a slight bend of the elbows when you perform this Asana.In terms of orientation, orient them backwards, but not on the sides.
Also be sure not to pull your neck too much back.
Breathe regularly by maintaining this posture up to 3 minutes.
People with carpal tunnel syndrome or have a spine injury, back muscles, shoulder muscles and arms should avoid this Asana.
Release your posture if you don't feel comfortable by stretching your back muscles or if you feel a tension in the lower back.
Pregnant women should also avoid this type of position.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with the lateral elevations inclined with dumbbell.

How to make the lateral elevations tilte: 1: En tenant un haltère dans une main, saisissez un poteau, un appareil à pulley ou tout autre support stable avec votre main libre.
2: Place your two feet on hand with which you enter your support and look at the side by holding the dumbbell, letting the dumbbell hang down.
3: Keeping the body motionless and the elbow slightly bent, exhale while lifting the dumbbell on the side.
4: Inspire by bringing the dumbbell in the starting position in a controlled manner.
5: Perform the required number of rehearsals.
6: Repeat the exercise with the opposite arm.

Training advice: Maintain the high to two seconds position to intensify the exercise.
Keep your body motionless;Only your arm should move.
Do not swing the dumbbell;Keep a slow and controlled movement.If you need momentum to mount the dumbbell, you are certainly using an overly heavy load.
If the load is too large, your trapeze will be more requested, which will reduce the solicitation of your lateral deltoid.
Remember to keep your abdominal strap engaged.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the crunch standing with elastic.

How to do the crunch standing with elast: 1: Attach the elastic on a height support (above your head).
2: Catch the elastic with both hands, place your hands on top of your head and position yourself so as to go back to anchor point.
3: Stand up, feet apart from the width of the shoulders, and slightly unlock your knees for more stability.
4: To increase the tension, take a step on the elastic.
5: Lean forward in a flexion movement, bringing your elbows into an arc to your knees.Take your chin and bend your spine so that your back is rounded in the low position.
6: Return to the starting position and start the movement again until you have made the number of repetitions fixed.

Training advice: Exhale (blow the air) during the bending movement, focus on using your abdominal muscles and contract them at the bottom of the exercise.

An excellent way to make the standing crunch is to use a door anchor and tie the elastic at the top of the door, then stand up with the buttocks against the door.This not only gives you stability, and you can feel a stronger abdominal contraction than with the version without support.
Another variant of this standing exercise is the oblique crunch, in which you draw a elbow to the opposite knee and alternate the sides both repetitions.
A widespread variant is to hold the elastic on the shoulders.It is an interesting version and some people find it more comfortable, but it is a little easier, because it creates a shorter lever arm.

Training advice.caption: The crunch standing with an elastic held at the shoulder level.

Training advice: The key is to maintain tension on your abs, so tighten the elastic just enough for you to already have a small tension at the start (top) of the movement.As you go down, you will feel the tension increase and movement will become more difficult at the bottom.When you come back to the starting position, the movement becomes easier again, but you should still feel a certain tension at the top.The elastic should not be completely relaxed.

In order to maintain the tension, some people prefer not to get up completely and work only in the lower three quarters of the amplitude of the movement.Be sure to adjust your speed, the amplitude of the movement, the position of the body, the position of the feet and the position of your hands to maximize the tension you feel on your abs.If you change your technique and you feel less tension on your abs, do not continue.If you change your technique and you feel greater tension on your abs, do not change anything.
One of the biggest errors made by most people during standing crunch is just leaning from the hips.It is not a rocking movement, but a winding movement (bending of the spine).
If you do not experience intense burns at the end of a series, especially when the number of repetitions is high, your technique must probably be improved or you need a thicker elastic.

name: Is Trap Bar soil a good option for training?

image_src_note.caption: Graphic credit © Doctor-fitness.com

How to do the crunch standing with elast: 1: Attach the elastic on a height support (above your head).
2: Catch the elastic with both hands, place your hands on top of your head and position yourself so as to go back to anchor point.
3: Stand up, feet apart from the width of the shoulders, and slightly unlock your knees for more stability.
4: To increase the tension, take a step on the elastic.
5: Lean forward in a flexion movement, bringing your elbows into an arc to your knees.Take your chin and bend your spine so that your back is rounded in the low position.
6: Return to the starting position and start the movement again until you have made the number of repetitions fixed.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used to side elevations with Kettlebell.

How to make the side elevations with Ket: 1: Select the desired load in the rack, then take a few steps back in a clear area.
2: Inspire deeply and lift the kettlebells at shoulders using a neutral socket (palms inward) while keeping the elbows slightly bent.
3: Slowly lower the kettlebells to the starting position, keeping control of the movement.
4: Repeat this movement to the desired number of repetitions.

Tips for side elevations with kettlebell: If you want to keep more tension in the deltoid muscles, do not let the weights touch on your sides and control the eccentric part (descent) of the movement.
Keep LesAbdominaux Contrects and do not lean back or do not stop your back at the top of the movement.
Let the shoulders move freely, but do not completely block the elbows.
Leaning forward can help improve the activation of the rear of the deltoid.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the developed at Landmine.

How to do the developed at Landmine?: 1: Place the end of the bar in the Landmine support and add a load which allows you to make 2 to 3 series of 8 to 12 repetitions.
2: Stay in front of the bar, your feet apart with a width slightly higher than that of the hips, with the slightly bent knees.
3: Enter the bar with both hands, keeping your elbows near the body.
4: To start the movement upwards, contract your glutes and your abdominal strap and then push the bar up and in front of you.
5: Slowly go down the bar and repeat the movement

Training advice: This exercise can be carried out at the end of a session for pectorals, because it requests the middle of the clavicular portion of the large pectoral muscles, an area frequently recalcitrant to develop.
Some sports halls have dedicated support, the famous Landmine.But you can also perform this exercise by placing one end of the bar in a corner.

Landmine developed can also be carried out unilaterally.This allows even more important recruitment of the muscles of the abdominal belt.In addition, this also makes it possible to correct possible imbalances in strength or muscle development between the right and left side.

Training advice.caption: The variant of the unilateral shoulder developed with the Landmine.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested at the Zercher Deadlift.

How to do the Zercher Deadlift?: 1: Start by standing in front of the bar.Your feet should be placed at a distance slightly higher than that of your hips.The bar should be placed above the middle of your feet.
2: Crazy as low as possible.Let your back round slightly.
3: Pass your elbows under the bar, inside your legs.
4: The bar must rest on the top of your forearms, just above your elbows.
5: Contract and engage the abdominal muscles and keep them firmly contracted throughout the duration of the movement.
6: Start lifting the ground bar slowly.Do not make sudden movements.
7: Push your feet into the floor and lift the bar.
8: Put yourself in the vertical position and lock the whole body.
9: Hold this position for a second, then slowly return to the starting position.

Training advice: Due to the high risk nature of this variation in earth lifting, an appropriate and complete warm -up is essential before starting this exercise.

To perform this exercise correctly and with good shape, you need a lot of flexibility and mobility in the lower body.So, before trying this lifting earth or adding it to your training program, you must check if you have the required mobility in the hips, ankles and back to put yourself in the right starting position.
The addition of pounds must be done very gradually and with caution.Even a slight increase in weight, like a few pounds, can make a big difference in this exercise.
This Deadlift variant is quite trying for your forearms and can leave villains.To avoid or at least alleviate this problem, you can use padding for your forearms.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested at the Kettlebell Swing.

How to do the Kettlebell Swing?: 1: Put yourself in a position with your back leaning forward, the knees slightly bent, arms oriented downwards, both hands on the handle of the kettlebell, the chin tucked and the load centered at the feet.
2: The legs should be spread over a distance to the width of the shoulders so as not to risk taking the Kettlebell on the tibia.

3: Began the movement by bringing the kettlebell slightly in front of the body only to the strength of the shoulders.Release the tension and let the kettlebell come back to the starting position.With the force of gravity, the kettle should go slightly further towards the glutes.

4: Take advantage of the creation of this momentum to bring the Kettlebell forward at the shoulders.To do this, firmly contract the muscles of the lower body, and more particularly the gluteal muscles.The load should then rise, the arms and shoulders are only there to accompany the moving kettle.
5: Let the kettlebell come back to the starting position without trying to control the burden beyond measure.
6: Repeat the movement to the desired number of repetitions.
