Training advice: The swing must be a very explosive movement, the goal being to generate a hip extension as quickly as possible.
The load will obviously move to your heels in the descending portion of the exercise, but you should not let the toes rise.
Your chin must accompany your bust, do not worry about looking upwards in the lower part of the movement.
Exhale powerfully when expanding hips, and inspire during the load.
Keep your back flat.When you fold your knees and direct your buttocks back, do not round your back.
Remember to push the ground with your feet when you deploy to increase the power of your swing.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested in the Cossack squat.

How to make the Cossack squat?: 1: Take a wide position so that your legs form an equilateral triangle with the ground.Keep them straight.Make sure your toes are pointed right in front.
2: Inspire, contract your abdominal strap and glutes.
3: Move your weight on your right leg, fold your right knee and sit back as far as possible during the descent.
4: Your left leg must remain straight (extended) while your left foot switches to the heel.Keep your toes pointed upwards.
5: Keep the right heel on the ground and keep the right bust.
6: Take a break at the bottom of the descent, exhale and go back to the starting position.Repeat the exercise with the opposite leg

Training advice: The main error with the Cossack squats is to make the movement too quickly, without any control.Slowness and regularity are the watchwords here.Keep a controlled rhythm, maintaining a constant tension on the muscles during all the amplitude of the movement.
Try to stay straight as possible.Controlled breathing and bust commitment are essential.Also keep your obliques firm, to avoid turning to the side during the movement.

This exercise requires good flexibility.Stretching of adductors and hamstrings, as well as work on the mobility of Lachevilleen parallel of these movements, will allow you to make a correct cossack squat.

If you do not have a sufficient amplitude of motion at the ankle, you will be tempted to lift your heel from the ground to squat lower.Do not go down until the limit of what you can without your heel lifting.Work on ankle mobility exercises while waiting.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested at the Mountain Climber.

How to make the Mountain Climber?: 1: Put yourself in the board position, taking care to distribute your weight equally between your hands and your toes.
2: Check your position: your hands should be spread out of the shoulders, flat back, committed abdominals and aligned head.
3: Bring your right knee to your chest as far as possible.
4: Change the leg, removing the right knee and advancing the left knee.
5: Keep your hips, advancing and retreating your knees as far and as fast as you can.Inspire and exhale alternately with each leg change.

Tips for the Mountain Climber: When the movement is well mastered, you may be surprised to remember your breath.Remember to breathe.

You need to make the movement with good technique not only to maximize the efficiency of the exercise, but also to avoid injury.A frequent error of beginners is, for example, to bounce back on the feet during the execution of the movement.Rebounding can make you believe that exercise is more difficult, while in reality the mobilization of the abdominal muscles is less.

Another technical error that you might make, especially when the movement accelerates, is not to complete the movement completely when your toes touch the ground while you bring your knees to your chest.If this happens, you will not take full advantage of the exercise and you may injure yourself.
If you are not familiar with this movement, it is not uncommon to lose the center of gravity and end up with the body in an inclined position.Keep your body in balance and shoulders above your hands.

You should avoid doing this exercise if you suffer from injury or instability in the shoulders or the basin.The Mountain Climber is an excellent exercise for your knees, but if you have suffered or have to undergo surgery (for example to repair a sports injury or replace a joint affected by arthritis), you should talk to your doctor about itOr your physiotherapist before integrating this movement into your program.

If you have recently been pregnant or have been operated on from the abdomen, you may suffer from a recti diastasis, that is to say from a spacing of the muscles of the abdomen.Until this state is completely restored, you should avoid this type of movement.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the hero.

How to make the hero's posture?: 1: Kneal on the ground, make sure that your knees are placed under your hips.
2: Put your hands on your lap.
3: Take your knees closer to each other to widen the space between your feet.
4: Press the top of your feet on the floor.
5: Exhale and lower your buttocks to sit on the floor between your feet.You may have to manually move your mollets for you.
6: Make sure you are not sitting on your feet, but rather between them, with the top of the feet on the ground.
7: Place your shoulder blades behind and open your chest.Put your hands on your lap.
8: Hold this position for about 30 seconds.Gradually extend the duration as you practice.

Training advice: Avoid this Asana if you have undergone a knee, ankles or back injury and you are not yet healed.
Practice this Asana slowly.Make sure that the alignment of your members is correct to avoid injury and fatigue.
Do not do this Asana if you have heart problems or if you have undergone a heart attack in the past.
Practice this Asana early in the morning at raising.This is when your mind is the most lively and your stomach and your intestines are empty.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the abdominals with a bar.

How to work the abs with a bar?: 1: The two knees on the ground, grab a loaded bar on the shoulders and place it directly under your shoulders.
2: Contract your abdominal muscles, then slowly roll the bar forward.Master the bar by contracting your abdominal muscles throughout the movement.
3: Do not let your upper body touch the floor in the low position.You must feel a significant tension and stretching of the entire abdominal area.
4: Return to the starting position by bringing the abdominal muscles back to your rib cage to roll the bar.
5: Repeat the exercise until you have done the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: This exercise is a challenge for the abs and you will need time to perfect your technique.
If you do this exercise for the first time, do not drive too far.With regularity, your abdominals will become stronger and will allow you to roll further.
Keep your arms and back straight permanently.
To increase the intensity, you can do this exercise from the standing position.

name: Hip Thrust at the Smith Machine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with Hip Thrust at the Smith Machine.

How to do the Hip Thrust at the Smith Ma: 1: Placez un banc de weight training devant une Smith Machine.
2: Attach a thick protective foam in the center of the bar.You can also use a rolled towel if you don't have one.
3: Place the top of your Bench, then put your feet in front of you, roughly the width of the epaules.
4: Position the bar at the fold of your hips.You may have to experiment several positions of the bench to achieve it.
5: Detach the bar by expanding hips, while ensuring that your abdominal strap is well contracted, that your rib cage is lowered (and not raised) and your chin is tucked (do not fix the ceiling).
6: Then lower the bar by stretching your glutes, then reversing the movement by contracting your glutes to bring your hips as high as possible.
7: Strongly contract your glutes in a high position, taking care not to hyperextension of your spine when you lock the movement.
8: Go down the bar while holding the tension in the glutes and repeat the movement to make 3 to 5 series of 8 to 20 repetitions.

Training advice: Discard your feet by about 15 degrees to put your hips in external rotation (which increases the activity of the glutes).
Actively tighten the glutes as hard as possible during these 2 to 4 seconds in the high position.It may cause muscles burn, a sign that your muscles work thoroughly.
There is no perfect position of the feet, but as a rule, if your feet are closer to the bench, you will activate Vosquadriceps more, while if you are moving them away, you will seek your legacy more.
Do not use a load too heavy to maintain a good amplitude of motion.

Keep your toes on the ground and focus on the push with the heels throughout the series.People who tend to put themselves on tiptoe are those who have a strong dominance of the quadriceps, or who do not know how to execute the movement correctly.

name: Developed unilateral shoulder on his knee with Landmine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the unilateral shoulder developed with the Landmine.

How to make the developed unilateral sho: 1: Place a floor mat or other type of padding (folded towel, etc.) under your knees (for more comfort).
2: Catch with one hand the end of the bar placed in the Landmine and put on a knee.The knee on the ground will be on the same side as the pressure arm.
3: Close enough from the bar for the end of the bar to descend to your deltoid.

4: Keeping the chest completely straight and the abdominal muscles contracted, slightly tilt the bust and head forward and develop the bar above your head until full extension.Unlike the exercise with bar or dumbbell, you will push up and slightly forward at the same time.
5: Slowly go down the bar in the starting position, while controlling it.
6: Repeat this movement until you have made the number of rehearsals desired, then change your arms.

Training advice: This unilateral exercise is sometimes carried out on both knees rather than on one knee.The version on two knees is slightly more difficult, because you are not as stable without a foot on the ground to help you keep your balance.
You can also do the Landmine standing shoulders, but note that the version is easier.
This exercise can also be carried out with two arms, entering the end of the bar with both hands.
If you want to intentionally activate the upper part of the pectorals, make the two -arms version, keep your head high and the upst (vertical) bust possible.

A rarer variant is the developed with two bars (two arms).For this, you need two bars and two Landmines, although you can wedge the two bars against a wall, in a corner or at the foot of a bodybuilding rack.

For advanced practitioners, you can add an elastic by standing on the elastic and wrapping the other end around the bar.This allows you to add resistance at the top (where there are naturally less), optimize the tension curve and offer you an exceptional training session.

name: The best sheathing exercises for abs

image_src_note.caption: The exercise of the board for the abdominals is a very popular exercise for challenging.
The muscles asked for the Donkey Kick.

How to do the Donkey Kick?: 1: Put on all fours, so that your shoulders are directly above your hands and your hips are above your knees.Your arms must be stretched and your hands should be spread out of the shoulders, the fingers pointing forward.
2: Take your abdominal muscles to stabilize the basin and strengthen the lower back.
3: Make an extension of the hip and, keeping the knee folded, lift a leg behind you, bringing the heel to the ceiling.
4: Go back down your leg and repeat the same movement on the same side or by changing the leg if you wish.

Training advice: Be sure not to hyperextension in the lower back throughout the movement.
Raise the leg until the bottom of your back is hiding (drops) or your hips pivot or tilt;If one or the other of these things happens, you have raised the leg too high.
Avoid rushing to perform the exercise with a complete amplitude of motion and good technique.
You can make this exercise more difficult by wearing ankles.
Perform 20 rehearsals on each leg out of 4 to 5 series.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the alternating biceps curl with dumbbells.

Comment faire le curl biceps altern\u00e: 1: Saisissez une paire d’haltères et mettez-vous debout en tenant les dumbbells le long de votre corps.
2: Your arms should be slightly bent and your palms turned inside your body (thumbs up).
3: Starting with your weakest arm (usually the left), contract your biceps to mount the dumbbell upwards.
4: During flexion, rotate the dumbbell to go from a neutral position (palms inward) to a supination position (palms up).
5: Contract your biceps at the top of the movement, then slowly down the dumbbell without letting it touch your body.
6: Repeat the movement with the other arm.
7: This corresponds to a rehearsal.Continue until you have made the number of rehearsals set.

Training advice: Before starting the movement, slightly flex the weight upwards to exert tension on your biceps.
Keep a regular rhythm and control the load throughout the series.
Do not lean and do not swing back when you lift the dumbbell.This cheat movement reduces the work of biceps and will not help you progress.
Hold the tension on the biceps during the whole series.Do not let the dumbbells hang at the bottom of the movement or rest on the body.

Training advice.caption: The alternating biceps curl with dumbbells in a seated position makes it possible to limit the momentum, but slightly reduces the stabilization work of the abdominals.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested at the Renegade Row.

How to do the Renegade Row?: 1: Tenez un haltère dans chaque main. Accroupissez-vous et placez les dumbbells sur le sol, à peu près à la largeur des épaules.
2: Contract your abdominals and move your feet outward and backwards in the deflected position.Your body must form a straight line.Keep your right cuffs and don't let them sag.
3: Keeping a right arm, bending the other arm and bringing the load up and down of your rib cage.Do not let your hips or shoulders contort.
4: Go back up the dumbbell to the ground, change aside and repeat the movement.Alternate your arms for the duration of the series, keeping your bust well shelved.

Training advice: You can also use kettlebells to carry out this exercise.
Discard your feet so that they are more apart than shoulder width to improve balance and stability.Look at the floor to make sure your neck is neutral.
You can also do this exercise with folded legs and knees on the ground to reduce the work of the abdominal muscles.
To increase the difficulty, you can carry out this exercise in the laplanche of the bear.
