image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the squat with strip of resistance.

How to make the squat with resistance ba: 1: Place an elastic under the central part of your feet.Firmly hold each end of the elastic in your hands that you will place at the shoulders.
2: Stand up, your feet apart with the shoulder width, the toes slightly oriented outwards.
3: Flex the hips and the knees to descend in the squat position.
4: Go down as low as possible while maintaining a good execution.Your thighs must be parallel to the ground or slightly below.
5: Push through the heels to return to the standing position.
6: Repeat the movement until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Start with a strip of resistance adapted to your level of strength.You can increase the resistance as you become stronger.
Keep a good position throughout the exercise.Make sure your knees are aligned with your feet and your back is straight.
Check the descent and climb to avoid any sudden movement.
Discard the feet more widely, the toes pointed outwards, to accentuate the work of adductors (Squat sumo).
Perform the squat in a unilateral position with a raised foot at the rear to target more glutes and quadriceps (Bulgarian Split Squat).

name: Dips sitting in the matrix machine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested from the dips seated in the matrix machine.

How to do the dips seated in the Matrix: 1: Set the load you want to use.
2: Sit, your feet flat on the ground and the buttocks well glued to the backrest.
3: Enter the handles and stretch your arms, without locking them.
4: Flex your arms completely then stretch your arms again.
5: Make the number of rehearsals planned.

Training advice: If there is a seat belt, tie it at the top of your thighs for greater stability.
Keep your arms near the body throughout the exercise (elbows oriented back).

If your elbows start on the side during the movement, you can lift more loads.However, it is only because you have a better lever;Your arms do not become stronger.By letting your elbows deviate to the side, you ask for more muscle fibers of the relevant muscles to perform the movement.
At the bottom of the movement, focus on keeping a slight flexion of the arms to maintain tension on the musclericeps.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the developed declined with elastic.

How to make the declined developed with: 1: Tie the elastic in height on a door using a door hook or wrap it on any medium.Enter the two sides of the elastic with each hand and go forward so that the elastic is tight.
2: Lightly tilt the bust forward, stabilize the elastic and sheath Vosabdominaux for not arranging your back.
3: Bring your shoulder blades back and bring them closer to open your chest.
4: Push the elastic bands in the bottom until your hands are almost touching.
5: Bring your hands back to the starting position by controlling the return.
6: Restore the movement until you make the number of repetitions desired.

Training advice: Do not completely reach out of the movement to maintain tension in your pectorals.
To maximize the muscle contraction of the pectoral desmuscles, you can stay in a low position 1 to 2 seconds by performing a maximum contraction.

The resistance strip must be stretched before the development (as for any other exercise with resistance strip).If there is no resistance at the start of the movement, you will limit the time under tension and slow down your progress!If you can't reach out, you should take a smaller strip and move forward to adjust the tension.
Tighten your fists to keep your wrists stable and solid.If your wrists are loose, you may hurt yourself in short or long term.
Elastics are perfect for improving your explosiveness and typing force.This exercise is therefore very interesting for practitioners of martial arts and combat sports.

name: Extensions des triceps décliné avec dumbbells

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with the extensions of the triceps available with dumbbells.

Comment faire les extensions des triceps: 1: Allongez-vous sur un banc décliné et tenez deux dumbbells en position haute, les bras tendus directement au-dessus de votre poitrine.
2: Descendez ensuite les dumbbells en utilisant uniquement vos avant-bras jusqu’à ce qu’ils arrivent juste au-dessus de votre tête. Inspirez pendant cette partie de l’exercice.
3: Then use your triceps to reassemble the dumbbells, without locking the elbows in the high position.Exhale during this part of the movement.
4: Repeat this chain until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Start with light loads to get used to the charge and master the trajectory of the dumbbells, especially if you are used to doing it with an EZ bar.Indeed, the fact of this one with dumbbells will be a greater effort of the stabilizing muscles of the arms and despels, which are not asked with a bar.

Do not lock your elbows during the concentric phase (positive) of the exercise.Not only could it hurt the elbow joint, but it removes muscle tension.If your goal is to start muscle, do your exercises with continuous tension, without helping these false breaks.
You can do this exercise with an arm at a time at first if you have trouble keeping a good trajectory, then alternating or both arms at the same time.

The elbow joint must in theory remain fixed.If your arms go back and forth when your hands go from top to bottom, you are no longer on a triceps insulation exercise, because your large backbone muscles come into play to help you make the movement.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with unilateral deviations from Landmine.

How to do the unilateral dismissals at t: 1: Lie on the ground, your head oriented towards the anchor point of the mine.The bar will be placed on the side.
2: Put your feet flat on the floor and fold your knees to exert a lever effect.The arm that does not work can also be stretched on the side for more stability, in order to maintain the SolEs.
3: Hold the bar, palm upwards and flex the elbow slightly.Your arm should be positioned directly on the side, in the extension of your shoulder.
4: Make an arm supply: Bring the bar over the chest.
5: Slowly drop the bar until the bar touches the floor, then repeat the movement.

Training advice: Perform slow and controlled movements.
Hold your body to stabilize your body.
This exercise lends itself well to series of 8 to 12 repetitions.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted in the horizontal print in the pulley.

Comment faire le tirage horizontal \u00e: 1: Sit in front of the drawing machine and place your feet on the footrests.
2: Enter the double handle and back up your buttocks until your legs are almost tense.Your bust must be straight and your arms and shoulders must be extended forward.
3: To execute the movement, tighten Vosabdomailau and slowly pull the handle towards your belly, while tightening your shoulder blades and shoulders behind.
4: Take a break, then slowly bring the load in the starting position.
5: Make the number of repetitions set.

Training advice: Do not excessively cam.
Pull the handle by focusing on the movement of the elbows to avoid shooting too much with the biceps.
Avoid swinging the torso from front to back.This creates a momentum that reduces the activation of the muscles you want to work.
Start with a light load and gradually increase it to leave your back time to adapt.
If you do not have the machine with a bench for the horizontal draw, you can perform this exercise on a low pulley as you can see below.

Training advice.caption: Horizontal print with a low pulley with a rope.

Training advice: In order to keep a continuous tension in the muscles, be sure not to rest the weight battery with each rehearsal.
Perform 4 series of 8 to 12 repetitions with 70 to 80 % of your maximum charging to the muscle.
To work the force a little more, increase the load and go on 4 to 6 repetitions.

Training advice.caption: The horizontal print with a large pulley.

name: Extensions des triceps incliné avec dumbbells

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités avec les extensions des triceps avec dumbbells incliné.

Comment faire les extensions des triceps: 1: Choose the appropriate load in the rack and install an adjustable bench with a slight inclination of 25 to 35 degrees.
2: Allongez-vous en gardant les dumbbells près de votre poitrine. Une fois que votredosest à plat contre le banc, levez les dumbbells jusqu’à ce qu’ils soient en position haute avec une prise neutre.
3: Abaissez les dumbbells vers vos épaules en relâchant les coudes tout en maintenant une prise neutre.
4: Lorsque vos avant-bras sont parallèles ou juste en dessous, ramenez les dumbbells en position de départ en contractant les triceps.
5: Repeat the movement until you have made the number of repetitions required.

Training advice: Ideally, your arms should not be vertical, but slightly tilted backwards.This will keep the tension on the brachial triceps during all the amplitude of the movement.
Be sure not to do too much back extension.Keep your rib cage lowered while maintaining tension in the itbdomillars and the fertures.
The use of a slow eccentric (descending part) improves neuromuscular tension and lake.
Keep your arms fixed.Only your forearms should move.The more your elbows move away from your head, the more your shoulders may be requested.
Keep your head in a relatively neutral position, do not let the neck bend forward, as this could exert excessive pressure on the cervical column.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the pumps.

How to do the pumps well?: 1: Put on all fours by placing your shoulders above your wrists and knees directly under your hips.
2: Advance your hands several centimeters, then move your body forward so that your shoulders are again above your wrists.Your hips will then be in front of your knees.

3: From this position, lift your knees from the ground to put you in the high board position.This is where the abdominal sheathing comes into play. To even engage your deep abdominal muscles (stabilizers), tighten your feet!

4: Make sure your heels are placed directly above your toes and that your wrists are always under your shoulders.Your neck should be aligned with your spine (do not raise your chin or your head), and your shoulders should be pulled back and down, far from the ears.Make sure the top of your back and glutes are aligned.Tighten your quadriceps and glutes.This is the starting position.
5: Fold the elbows at an angle of 45 degrees on the sides and lower yourself to the ground, tightening the shoulder blades against each other, while keeping the bust and the legs well aligned.

6: Make as many repetitions as possible (even a few centimeters at the end) for two or three minutes while keeping a good execution.Do not let your hips sag or your buttocks get up.Your body must form a long straight line from the top of your body to the heels, passing through your buttocks.
7: Inspire before going down or going down.
8: Exhale go back to the starting position.

Images.caption: Good and bad high position of a pump.
Good and bad low position of a pump.

In what case not pump?: If you recover from a serious injury, consult a sports doctor first before making pumps.In the event of joint problems, in the wrists, elbows or shoulders, start with the variants offered above.Furthermore, if the pumps cause you acute pain or if you hear a cracking noise accompanied by pain, do not continue and consult a specialist.

28 pump variants.caption: Pump on an arm with Medicine Ball
Pompe avec sangle de weight training
Inclined pump with jump on steps
Explosive pump with double pectoral tap

image_src_note.caption: Muscles used for machine -assisted pull -ups.

How to do the machine -assisted pull -up: 1: Adjust the load you want to subtract and climb on the platform.
2: Enter the handles of the machine with a pronation, a width greater than that of the Executive.
3: Let your body rest on the platform with your arms stretched.
4: Exhale by going up your body until your chin is above the bar.
5: Hold this position for two seconds and actively contract the back muscles.
6: Inspire by lowering your body until your arms are stretched again.
7: Perform the number of rehearsals planned in your series.

Training advice: Depending on the type of machine and your size, you may be more comfortable in kneeling position.
I will never repeat it enough, hoist yourself using the back muscles and not by pulling with your arms.To help you, visualize that you move your elbows down.

Take advantage of this machine to learn how to pull up on a complete amplitude.Many practitioners are able to make a large number of pull -ups, but with a very small amplitude.This obviously limits the optimal development of back muscles.

To intensify your training, perform 6 repetitions with the minimum assistance and then add 10 to 15 kilos of additional help and do as many pull -ups as possible.Make a 4 -degressive minimums.This type of training will help you feel the muscles of your back well, because it allows great muscle congestion.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted in the vertical draw tight.

How to make the tight taken vertical dra: 1: Attach a double triangle handle parallel to the drawing device.
2: Hold the handle with a neutral socket, the palms shot towards each other.
3: Sit on the machine, making sure to adjust the cales-genoux so that your legs are firmly rooted on the ground.
4: Lightly lean your chest backwards, finding the best angle that will allow you to start your large backbone muscles as much as possible during the exercise.
5: Pull the handle towards your chest while keeping the elbows back.
6: Take out your chest and retract your shoulder blades in order to further activate large backbones.
7: Take a short break in the maximum contraction position, then let the load go up by controlling it.
8: Repeat the movement until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Tips for vertical draw tight taken: A slight swing of the body is acceptable throughout the movement, but do not make the common error to load the machine with a huge load and lift the battery with a sloppy technique and a partial motion amplitude.
To impose an even stronger tension on the backbone during your draw, you can also use a pair of lifting straps.In this way, you will not be limited by your grip force.
Do not let your shoulders go up when you go up the handle.Failure to comply with this precaution can cause serious shoulder injuries.
The more you perform this movement, the less you have control, the higher the risk of injury.

image_src_note.caption: And if you want to challenge yourself more, try the different muscle-up versions of this video.

How to make a muscle-up?: 1: Enter the traction with a false socket, that is to say with the thumb above the bar.Your hands should be placed at the width of the epaulesou slightly wider than these.
2: Your arms and legs should be stretched.Your elbows should be slightly bent.
3: Initiate the movement up by quickly pulling on the bar using your back muscles and your arms.Your traction must be fast and powerful.
4: Light up the body while your upper body moves to the bar.
5: Pull up until your chest is higher than the bar.Once your chest has crossed the bar, lean slightly forward to bring your upper body over the bar.
6: Go up the body upwards while stretching your elbows as if you finish a dip.Your shoulders should end slightly in front of the bar.
7: Start the descent movement by folding your elbows to lower your chest to the bar.
8: Pivot your upper body backwards and down around the bar.
9: Go down your body to the starting position.

Advice to progress to muscle-ups: Practice the negative muscle-up by focusing on the eccentric phase of the exercise, that is to say the part of the exercise where you descend.Start above the bar and focus on the descent movement of your body throughout the amplitude of movement.

Perform the muscle-up with Kipping, that is to say using the momentum of the legs to switch your body in high position on the bar.To do this, make a pendulum movement.You have the possibility not to start under the bar, but behind the bar.Then jump to take the bar and swing forward.When returning from this pendulum, you will have acquired the speed that will help you do your traction.You can also hang on to the bar, create the pendulum movement, and make the muscle-up when you feel ready.
For your first muscle-up, try to place one ends of an elastic band the traction bar and stand on the other end to support you.

Advice to progress to muscle-ups.caption: The assisted muscle-up with elastic is an excellent variant to train to make the movement.
The weighted muscle-up allows experienced practitioners to challenge their performance

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the peacock.

How to make the peacock posture?: 1: Start by putting yourself in Envajrasana (diamond posture), then spread your knees to create a space between them.
2: Then lean your shoulder forward to place your palms on the ground, just in front of you, at a good distance.Your fingers point to your knees.
3: Then press your palms on the floor and fold the elbows to rest your chest on the back of the arms.Also keep your elbows near the navel region.
4: When you've been resting your chest on the upper arms, stretch your legs back and balance your body on the palms and toes, so far.
5: From here, engage your abdominal belt to tackle your elbows against it, then lean a little forward to lift your legs.Flee your neck and look straight ahead.
6: This is the final position of the Mayurasana.Stay in balance as long as you want and try to lift your legs by mobilizing the abdominal muscles.
7: Then release the pose by letting the legs go down and then the knees to the ground.Then come back to Vajrasana by straightening the torso.

Training advice: Avoid lifting your legs in a dry blow when you put yourself in Mayurasana's final position.This could lead to a head drop on the ground.It is therefore necessary to go slowly and surely by leaning in the final posture.

Maintaining your body in Mayurasana engages the musclesriceps in an eccentric bontraction.This requires great strength in the forearms and the shoulders.Beginners who have never practiced this Asana should therefore start by strengthening the triceps before embarking on the peacock posture.

A practitioner with excess fat in the belly and weak abdominal muscles may have difficulty engaging the trunk muscles for Mayurasana.It is therefore advisable to reduce the stomach or to strengthen the abdominal muscles before starting the practice of Mayurasana.

In case of difficulty keeping their legs raised during the final posture, practitioners can use the support of a chair under their feet.They can also be helped by another person to find a balance in the posture.
Avoid practicing Mayurasana if you have injuries on the wrist, elbow or shoulder.

name: Curl biceps seated in the machine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at curl biceps seated in the machine.

How to make the biceps curl sitting in t: 1: Start by choosing the load you want to use.

2: Set the seat level so that your arms rest comfortably on the top of the cushion.Some machines offer the possibility of completely lowering the seat and standing up, if this is more comfortable for you.
3: Enter the handles by holding them from below.This is the starting position.
4: While expiring, contract your biceps and flex the elbows to the maximum.Maintain a powerful contraction at the top of the position for a second.
5: Discover the handles in the starting position while inspiring.
6: Repeat the movement to the number of repetitions desired for your series.

Training advice: Keep your arms well tackled against the cushion.If you take them off, your shoulders work and that is not the purpose of this exercise.
Do not go down suddenly.Keep an eccentric contraction time at least 2 seconds for your muscles to work fully.
Keep the body fixed so as not to generate momentum limiting the work of biceps.
If your machine allows unilateral work, and you have time for your training, do not hesitate to do this arm exercise by arm to concentrate a maximum on the contraction of each biceps.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the Hydrant Fire.

How to make the Hydrant Fire?: 1: Put yourself in a four-legged position, knees directly under your hips and hands under your shoulders.Contract your abs and make sure your spine remains neutral, that is to say with the bottom of your back is slightly arched.
2: Keeping the knee and hip bent at 90 degrees, raise one leg up and on the side.
3: The rest of the body remains motionless.Raise your leg to around 45 degrees or more.Make sure your knee and hip remain aligned.
4: Take a break with the leg raised for 1 to 2 seconds, then go down the leg slowly.
5: Repeat this movement to make the number of repetitions desired, then change the leg.

Training advice: Don't bend your arms.
Do not lift your leg too high on the side so that the bottom of your body does not rotate.
A bodybuilding carpet will be very useful for knees, but a simple towel can also be used to reduce the pounds on the patella.
You can use an elastic band to increase the difficulty.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the corbeau posture.

How to posture the crow?: 1: Sit on tiptoe, heels and knees apart slightly more apart than lessee.
2: Place your bent bent at the fold of the internal face of your knees.Yourdosdoit be slightly rounded.
3: Keep your hands slightly higher than your knees, spread out fingers and fingers slightly pointing to the inside.
4: Keep this alignment when you move your weight forward, placing your palms on the ground, roughly shoulder width.
5: Concentrate your gaze on a point located at half a meter (two feet) in front of your fingertips on the ground.
6: Slowly lift your feet on the ground.

7: Bring the two heels back to your hips, while looking at a point on the ground located about 30 cm in front of your fingertips.Keeping the leg muscles engaged during posture, you will also keep the musclesabdominal muscles.
8: Keep the posture briefly, then release it by moving your weight backwards, placing your feet on the floor and relaxing your hands.

Training advice: Slowly go from step to step to make this posture.This avoids injuries.
The angle at your wrists must be 90 degrees.You can adjust this angle by placing a towel folded under the heel of your palm.This places the palm of the hand on an angle, which relieves the wrist.
If you find it hard to take off, try to press your forehead against a cushion on the ground to train weight transfer.
This posture is difficult for wrists, shoulders, knees, the region of the groin and lesischio-legs;So take into account the injuries or problems to which your body is sensitive.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the machine to machine developed.

How to make the machine developed to the: 1: Adjust the height of the machine's seat so that the handles are roughly at your shoulders.
2: By focusing on your deltoids, push the handles up until your arms are completely stretched upwards.
3: Go back down by controlling the loads to return to the starting position.
4: Repeat this movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Keep the tension on your deltoid muscles by not leaving the weight battery to land at the bottom.

Be sure to correctly adjust the height of the seat.If you leave the seat too low, you will reduce your motion amplitude and the weight battery will touch the ground before you have made a complete repetition.

Most shoulder developed machines are equipped with two handles, pronation (palms shot forward) or neutral (palms turned to each other).The pronation is standard, but neutral intake can be used to vary training.

If you do this exercise sitting with a neutral socket and the handles are placed in front, with your arms more in front of the body, you can make the deltoid before.If you perform this variation on a machine that allows elbows to move on the sides, you can more involve the external deltoids.

Training advice.caption: The development shoulders in the neutral plug.

Training advice: If you suffer from pain or tendonitis in the elbow, avoiding complete locking can relieve your elbow from a certain tension.If you are already suffering from a shoulder injury and this exercise intensifies the pain, avoid forcing: try to work with lighter loads and a larger number of repetitions, try the neutral socket or find another exercise.

The Drop Set technique is popular among lesbodybuilderset it is easy to make on machines with weight batteries.You don't even need to get up from your seat.At the end of a complete series, you just have to decline, pull the pin and put it back in a lighter position, then chain rehearsals.A drop set on your latest series of shoulders is an intense and effective way to finish.

name: Curl dumbbell standing on tilted bench

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at Curl Dumbbell standing on inclined bench.

How to make the curl dumbbell standing o: 1: Set an adjustable bench to an angle of approximately 45 degrees.
2: Take a dumbbell and place yourself at the highest end of the bench.
3: Put the back of your arm on the bench and let your arm stretch until the dumbbell almost touches the bench.
4: Hold the dumbbell by holding it from below, palm upwards (pronation).
5: Contract your biceps and slowly go up the dumbbell to the high position.
6: Make a maximum contraction at the top of the movement, then slowly down to the starting position.
7: Repeat the exercise to the desired number of rehearsals, then renew the movement with the other arm.

Training advice: Do not let the dumbbell touch the bench during the series.This makes it possible not to lose tension on the muscle with each rehearsal.
Do not let the dumbbell touch the shoulder because you will also lose tension in the muscle.
By setting the bench with a larger angle (as we see below), you will apply a stronger tension on the muscles.

Training advice.caption: Curl dumbbell standing tilted on a bench

Training advice: Always start by driving your weakest arm.For most people, this is the left arm.
Keep your body motionless and your wrists locked.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with jackknife on Swiss Ball.

How to make the jackknife on Swiss Ball?: 1: Put yourself in the depmpsment position, your ankles resting on the top of the Swiss Ball.
2: Exhale by bending the knees, hips and size to bring the knees forward.
3: Then hold out your legs until you return to the starting position.
4: Repeat this movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: The lower the ball on your tibias, the more reduced the amplitude of the movement.
Therefore, to have a complete amplitude of motion and be able to bring your knees back to your chest, start with the ball near your knees.
Be sure to hold your neutral position in your exercise (even when bringing your knees to your chest).If your back is rounded up when you bring your knees back to your chest, you may hurt the lumbar.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used to side elevations in the pulley.

Comment faire les \u00e9l\u00e9vations l: 1: Réglez la position des poulies de la pulley vis-à-vis en position basse et sélectionnez la charge que vous souhaitez utiliser.
2: Enter the left handle with your right hand and the right handle with your left hand.
3: Stand straight, arms in front of you (crossed).The weight should be slightly behind compared to the pulleys.This is the starting position for the movement.
4: With their arms slightly bent, raise your elbows until they arrive at the shoulders.Take a break and slowly down the weight in the starting position.
5: Repeat the movement to the desired number of repetitions.

Training advice: It is possible to work at the same time the posterior or anterior part of the shoulders during side elevations.Indeed, as this electromyographic analysis shows (2), the activity of the anterior deltoid increases during the external rotation of the humerus, while that of the posterior deltoid increases during the internal rotation of the humerus.
Keep your elbows high throughout the movement.

As the illustration above shows, it is possible to carry out this exercise unilaterally if you do not have a pulley vis-à-vis or if it is already occupied.The advantage of this variant is that it is possible to work with higher attention on each arm, but also to have a slightly larger amplitude of motion.

There is no need to take heavy loads with this exercise.The most important thing is to achieve a constant, fluid and break -in movement at the bottom of the movement in order to make the most of the continuous tension of the pulley.Lateral elevations in the pulley vis-à-vis are ideal for people who appreciate working until you get a burning sensation in their muscles.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested from side elevations with Landmine.

How to make side elevations with Landmin: 1: Stand up, your back straight and your feet positioned with a distance a little larger than your hips.
2: Hold the bar in front of your body with a hand in pronation.
3: Keeping your arm stretched, raising your arm diagonally and bring it up from the upper body.
4: Slowly drop the bar in the starting position by controlling the trajectory, speed and your posture.
5: Repeat the movement to the number of repetitions desired and change your hand to work the other shoulder.

Tips for side elevations with Landmine: This exercise is more difficult than it seems.Start with an empty bar, and don't make the movement too quickly.
Inhale at the bottom of the movement and exhale while lifting the bar to the top.
Be sure not to look back when you lift the bar.
Don't let your head look too much forward.

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités avec le leg curl avec sangles de suspension.

How to do the leg curl with suspension s: 1: Sit in front of the suspension straps and make sure you have enough space around you.Then place your feet in the calves of the straps.
2: Lie, put your hands along your body and lift your hips from the ground.
3: Be sure to maintain constant pressure with your feet down, so that the suspension straps do not relax and do not fall.
4: Raise your hips a few centimeters from the ground.
5: Inhale deeply and bring your heels back to your buttocks, expiring.
6: Faites une pause pour contracter vos hamstrings et revenez lentement en position de départ, les hanches étant toujours décollées du sol.
7: Repeat steps 5 and 6 until you have made the number of repetitions planned, then rest before performing the next series.

Training advice: The abdominals must be engaged throughout the movement.
The shoulders remain flat on the ground throughout the exercise.
If you are looking to make this exercise easier, get closer to the anchor point of suspension straps.Conversely, to make it more difficult, settle further.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the flag dragon.

How to make the flag dragon?: 1: Pour commencer, allongez-vous sur le dos et mettez vos bras derrière vous pour vous accrocher à un poteau, un montant de cage à squat ou un banc de weight training solide. Certaines personnes utilisent des kettlebells ou des haltères, mais l’utilisation d’un objet fixe et stable est plus adaptée et plus sûre.
2: Go up the hips by transferring your weight to your shoulders.
3: Raise your feet, legs and chest to form a straight line.

4: Once you have reached the top, keeping the abs and tight buttocks, slowly lower your legs in a controlled movement without leaving any part of your body touching the bench, with the exception of the top of the back and shoulders.
5: Repeat the movement as much as possible.

Training advice: Point your toes to help maintain a good alignment of the body.
Do not put your body weight on your neck.Be sure to keep the weight on the top of your back and your shoulders.
Be sure to keep your legs attached and straight throughout the movement.
Do not stop your back.By arranging the lower back, you relieve your abs and transfer the effort to the lower back, with a risk of injury.
Make sure you are well warmed up before doing the flag dragon.
Be sure to take sufficient rest between the series, from one to three minutes.
For more difficulty, you can keep your body just above the ground and keep this position before going up.

If you are sagging, if you drop your hips or if you curm your back, it means that you do not yet have the necessary strength and that you should not continue to practice this exercise.To gain strength, train yourself to practice the progress exercises below.

name: Leg curl seated in the machine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the LEG CURL seated in the machine.

How to do the LEG CURL seated in the mac: 1: Adjust the machine lever according to your size and sit on the machine by placing your back against the folder.

2: Place the back of the bottom of the leg on the padded lever (just a few centimeters under the calves) and fix the upper padding against your thighs, just above the knees.Then enter the side handles of the machine and make sure that the legs are straight in front of you.It will be your starting position.
3: By expiring, lower the machine lever as far as possible towards the back, bending your knees.Keep your bust immobile at all times.Maintain the position contracted for a second.
4: Return slowly to the starting position while inspiring.

Training advice: Keep a slow and controlled movement.

Keeping your flexed ankles (toes pointing to your tibias) when you perform the seated leg curl, this allows a recruitment of gastrocnemians (calves muscles) to help make the movement.If you want to isolate the hamstring muscles as much as possible, orient your tips forward.
A common error is to try to work with an overly heavy load.If you feel that your calves are trying to dominate the movement, reduce your charge.
Always use a complete amplitude of motion.

Training advice.caption: Realization of the LEG CURL seated in the machine.

name: Curl dumbbell taken hammer at the desk

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the curl dumbbell taken hammer with a desk.

How to make the curl dumbbell taken hamm: 1: The curl dumbbell taken hammer in the desk is a good exercise to isolate the biceps and work the forearms.Adjust the height of the bench so that when you sit on it, the bottom of your arm rests comfortably flat on the desk.
2: Catch a dumbbell with your left hand and sit on the seat.
3: Press the back of your left arm on the bench, turn the dumbbell so as to have a neutral socket (the thumb turned to the body) and let your arm are completely stretched.
4: Contract the left arm and slowly put the dumbbell as high as possible.
5: Perform a powerful contraction of the biceps at the top of the movement, then slowly drop the dumbbell to the starting position.
6: Repeat the exercise for the desired rehearsals, then repeat the exercise with the right arm.

Advice for the curl dumbbell taken hamme: In general, always work on the weakest arm first.In most cases, this is the left arm.
Maintain a slight bending of the arms at the bottom of the movement to protect your elbow joint and keep a greater tension on the muscles.
Keep a slow pace and control the load during the descent.
Focus on the movement of your forearm.

name: Unilateral leg extension on an assisted dip machine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted with unilateral leg extensions on an assisted dip machine.

How to do this exercise?: 1: Hold the handles of the machine to keep you in position, while placing the not active foot on the lateral support.
2: Place the foot that allows you to train on the platform, and press the heel until the leg is stretched.
3: Take a break at the bottom and contract the glutes for 1 to 2 seconds before letting the platform go up slowly to the high position.
4: Take a break at the top and repeat to the number of rehearsals desired before changing legs.

Training advice: Depending on the length of your leg compared to the platform race, you can let the platform go up to the full stop or prevent it from going up if this brings you to compromise your positioning.
For those who find it difficult to feel the contraction of their glutes, lighter loads, with more rehearsals, while paying particular attention to the "sensation" of the exercise, could help.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the piqued pumps.

How to do the piqued pumps?: 1: Place two flat benches side by side, spaced each other with the width of the shoulders.
2: Place each hand at one end of each bench and each foot on the other end of the benches.
3: Raise your buttocks and stretch your legs.
4: Keeping your legs stretched, inspire by lowering your head between the two benches.
5: Exhale by going up your body to the starting position.
6: Repeat this movement until you have made the number of repetitions planned.

Training advice: Hold the back in a neutral position and the legs stretched throughout the exercise.
Contract them from the movement.

As illustrated and described above, the stuck pumps must be carried out on two benches, as this allows you to descend your head between the two benches and thus ensures a complete amplitude of motion.However, if you do not have two benches, you can perform this exercise with a single bench and a pair of dumbbells, or three chairs as illustrated below.

Training advice.caption: Pumps stitched with dumbbells, a more demanding variant in terms of balance.
Pumps stitched with chair, an ideal variant for

Training advice: Can't do this exercise?It's not serious.Try to break down the movement and work on the basics.Train the board to strengthen the strength and stability of your shoulders and your abdominal strap.Then perfect your pumps, so that your shoulders are strong enough and stable to allow you to try this version.

Do not stay too long in the reverse position: when we have the head down, the blood flows towards the head, which can have adverse effects.If you are starting to feel dizzy or nauseating, raise your head and breathe a little before continuing.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the posture of the bridge.

How to make the posture of the bridge?: 1: Lie comfortably on ledos with a yogasous you.
2: Fold your knees and keep a distance from at least the width of the hips between your feet.
3: Do not lift your feet from the ground.
4: Place your arms along your body, the palms flat on the ground.

5: Take a great inspiration and slowly lift your back.Continue lifting it until only yourepaulestouche the soil.Support your body on your arms, shoulders and feet.Remember to hire your buttocks and your your buttocks.
6: Retrott the pelvis and bring your arms behind the head.
7: This is the position where your body looks like a bridge.Breathe normally and slowly and hold the posture for at least 30 to 60 seconds.
8: To release it, exhale and let your arms gradually come back to the front on the ground, then lower your back.

Training advice: Always perform a preliminary warm -up and wear large and comfortable clothes.
Do not eat heavy meals at least an hour before yoga.The best is to do yoga in the morning on an empty stomach.
Avoid moving your head on the left or right when you do this yoga.
If you have undergone surgery in the knee, back or legs, consult a doctor before practicing yoga.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the biceps curl with elastic.

How to make the biceps curl with elastic: 1: Place yourself standing on the resistance elastic with your feet apart at the width of the hips.Hold one end of the elastic in each hand.Your arms must be completely stretched, your palms turned forward, and the elastic must be under tension.
2: Keeping your elbows near your body, fold your arms and put the elastic towards your shoulders.Take a break at the top of the movement, by contracting your biceps well.
3: Then slowly lower the elastic band, stretching your arms to return to the starting position.
4: Repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Start with 2 to 3 series of 10 to 15 repetitions, depending on your level of physical condition.You can gradually increase the number of repetitions and series as you feel more comfortable with the exercise.
It is important to control the movement during the descent to maintain the tension in the biceps.
Inhale by slowly lowering your hands and exhale while lifting the elastic towards your shoulders.
To target different angles of the biceps, you can try to change your socket on the elastic by placing the palms upwards (supination intake) or inward (neutral intake).
If you find the exercise too easy, you can increase the resistance of the elastic using a thicker elastic or adding another elastic to increase tension.
Keep your body stable throughout the exercise.Avoid swinging the body backwards or moving your shoulders to help lift the elastic.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested from the Romanian earth.

How to make the Romanian earth lifted?: 1: Tenez la barre avec une prise de la largeur des épaules. Si vous utilisez une charge lourde, il peut être utile d’utiliser des sangles de weight training pour éviter que votre prise ne devienne défaillante.
2: Stand up, feet apart at the width of the hips.Pull your shoulders down and back, contract your abs and slightly fold your knees.
3: Without bending the legs more, push your buttocks back and lean forward from the hips, taking care not to round the lower back.Bring the bar down along your legs.
4: Go down as low as your flexibility allows.However, the bar should not touch the ground.
5: Reverse the movement by bringing your hips forward and straightening up.
6: Repeat this movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: Keep your neck aligned with the rest of your back while you look.

Stop looking at your hips when you feel stretching in the hamstrings.The bar does not need to reach the ground.In fact, you can perfectly stop the movement when the bar reaches almost the height of the knees, depending on your flexibility.
Do not tilt back at the top of the movement.
Use a bodybuilding belt to strengthen the bottom of your back if you lift heavy loads.
Keep your arms stretched throughout the movement: do not pull the bar with your arms.

Hold the bar using a pronation socket.The mixed/alternating socket, with a palm up and the other down, is not recommended even if it allows you to take heavier.Use lifting straps to increase gripping force.
Move the bar slowly and with control, avoiding any sudden movement.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the Deadlift Reeves.

How to do the Deadlift Reeves?: 1: Standing, place a bar loaded at the laces of your shoes.
2: Turn your hips back and lean forward until your chest is almost parallel to the ground.
3: Start your arms down and enter the plates with your hands.
4: Push your feet on the ground to pull the bar upwards.
5: Once you have locked the hips, reversed the movement by pushing the hips back and leaning forward.
6: Bring the bar to the ground, reset the position and repeat this movement until you have made the required number of repetitions.

Training advice: Keep your abdominal belt well committed during the execution of this exercise.
Make sure the bar follows a straight line while you hold your legs and hips.

You can only do the Reeves Deadlift only if you have sufficient wingspan to enter the bar discs.If your arms are not long enough, you can replace the conventional bar with Latrap Bar, which is about 25 % shorter.
If you want the exercise to use your gripping force, use discs with integrated holes, which will facilitate handling.

As a reminder, Deadlift is a rocking movement, no flexion of legs.If you place the hips that are too low, you will place yourself in a disadvantageous position on the biomechanical plane and will limit your maximum lifting potential.

To prevent the bar from moving away from the body, you have to focus on the contraction of the back muscles which allow the bar to stay in contact with the body and to move linearly.Do not retract your shoulder blades.It is mechanically ineffective and self -limiting, as it shortens the length of the arms and therefore requires greater amplitude of motion.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the Bird Dog.

How to do the Bird Dog?: 1: Put on all fours so that your hands are under your shoulders and knees under your hips.
2: Build firmly on the floor by feeling the shoulder blades moving away from each other and going down.
3: Raise a right arm in front of you, the palm of your hand down.
4: Raise the opposite leg behind you.
5: You must form a straight line between the fingers and the toes.The line will not be perfectly straight, but you see what I mean.
6: Hold this position for two seconds and repeat the exercise with the opposite hand and leg.

Training advice: Do not raise your arms and legs too high, as it could put pressure on the lower back and shoulders.The arm should be stretched at the shoulders and the heel should be aligned with the hip.
Keep the right and neutral basin during the realization of this exercise in order to maximize the commitment of the abdominal muscles.
The hips must remain well aligned, without rotation of the basin.
Perform this exercise slowly, by mastering the movements.This will allow you to maintain your balance more easily.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the pullover with two dumbbells.

Comment faire le pullover avec deux dumb: 1: Lie on a bench lengthwise for more comfort (Option: Lie along the bench).
2: Tenez les dumbbells avec une prise neutre (prise marteau).
3: Commencez par placer les dumbbells au-dessus de votre poitrine.
4: Abaissez lentement les dumbbells derrière votre tête jusqu’à ce qu’ils soient dans l’axe de votre corps ou aussi loin que votre souplesse vous le permet.
5: Find out to feel stretching in the low position.
6: En vous concentrant sur les muscles dorsaux, remontez les dumbbells jusqu’à la position de départ.

Training advice: One of the advantages of the position across the bench is that it allows you to lower your hips during the exercise, which allows you to further stretch the back muscles.
The advantage of the length of the bench length (as illustrated above) is better comfort.

The pullover is considered an insulation movement and is ideally carried out with moderate or light loads and a perfect technique.By doing this exercise with overly heavy loads, you may cause fatigue or tension at the level.An overly heavy load can also cause pain in the elbows, although it can be reduced while keeping the elbows slightly bent, and not completely tense.
You can intensify this exercise by simply increasing the number of repetitions or the load when it starts to be easily controllable.

You can also try to do this exercise with grouped dumbbells or with separate dumbbells.Most people find that the variant with close dumbbells is a little easier and that the variant with separate dumbbells is a little more difficult, which can be considered a certain form of intensification.

name: Extensions des calves sur une marche

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités aux extensions des calves sur une marche.

Comment faire les extensions de calves s: 1: Put yourself in the starting position with the heels falling from walking.Always make sure that your ankles, knees and hips are aligned vertically to protect your joints throughout the exercise.In this position, you can feel a stretch at the calf.
2: Go back slowly and as high as possible on tiptoe.Keep your musclesabdominal controlled, making sure you move vertically, not forward or rear.Hold this position for 5 to 10 seconds.
3: Go down with a slow and regular movement to the starting position.Be careful not to lean forward or back.
4: Repeat this exercise to the number of rehearsals planned.

Training advice: You can increase the difficulty by working on a single leg.In this way, the work of the calves will be more important.The work of balance will also be increased, as well as that of the abdominal strap.
Taking a pair of dumbbells can possibly be used to intensify the work of the muscles.
Do not hesitate to vary the orientation of the toes (inside or outside), in order to recruit the muscle fibers differently.
Train at the bottom of the steps rather than above.In the event of a fall following an imbalance, the risk of injury will be less important.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked with machine -assisted dips.

How to make the machine -assisted dips?: 1: Get on your knees on the platform of the assisted DIPS and grab the parallel bars on each side.
2: By keeping the right bust and elbows near the body, inspire by lowering yourself until you feel a slight stretch in your shoulders.
3: Exhale go back to the starting position, until your elbows are almost locked.
4: Repeat until the number of rehearsals desired.

Training advice: Keep your head slightly leaning down and the right bust.
Do not lock your elbows at the top of the movement.By keeping them slightly bent, you maintain a certain tension on the triceps.
Pay attention to the tension exerted on your shoulders.Do not go too low if you start to feel strong tension.Otherwise, you may injure your shoulder.
It is important to keep the bust and elbows near the body so that the accent is put on the brachial triceps rather than on the large pectoral.
If you want to involve the pectorals, lean slightly forward and spread the elbows out of the movement.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested at Curl Zottman.

How to make the Zottman curl?: 1: Stand up with a dumbbell in each hand.
3: Inspire and shelter your abdominal strap, your fertures and your pepper.
4: Contractez fortement les biceps pour commencer à monter les dumbbells vers le haut. Gardez les coudes fixes.
5: At the top of the flexion, in a complete contraction position, contract your biceps as strongly as possible and take a pause of two seconds.
6: Now rotate the wrists and forearms until the hands are in pronation, the palms turned down.
7: Redescendez lentement les dumbbells jusqu’à la position de départ. Une fois encore, gardez les coudes immobiles.
8: Une fois en bas, expirez et faites pivoter les dumbbells pour revenir en position de supination.
9: Repeat this sequence until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.

Tips for Curl Zottman: Make slow movements and make sure you have total weight control at any time.
Do not swing the dumbbells and do not use the momentum by giving a pool to make the rehearsals.This will maximize your earnings.

image_src_note.caption: Muscles used to hip thrust.

How to do hip thrust?: 1: Sit on a flat bench and place a bar in your hips.
2: Put yourself in the low position while keeping your shoulders in contact with the bench.
3: Hold the bar firmly, with a spacing of the shoulder width and holding it from above (hands in pronation).Your feet should be flat on the floor and your legs should be folded at 90 degrees.
4: Let your hips down to the floor and feel a stretch at the glutes.
5: Then contract your buttocks to go up the buttocks and return to the starting position by pushing with your heels.
6: Repeat the exercise until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Training advice: The upper back should be glued to the edge of the bench, well -plated shoulder blades.This position makes it possible to solicit the glutes and not the lumbar.The gaze looks forward to avoid hyperlordosis.
A spacing too tight of the feet makes the quadricepsplus that the glutes.Conversely, too discarded, they are the legs that take over.The right position is between these two extremes.

It is essential to descend as low as possible, until you touch the ground, and to climb as high as possible by locking the position well.This makes it possible to solicit the glutes on all their amplitude.
Use a light bar if you do hip thrust for the first time.
Do not hesitate to use a foam protective sleeve on the bar for better execution comfort.
If a standard 20 -kilo Olympic bar is too heavy, use a shorter less heavy bar with fixed weight (the one usually used for biceps training).
When you lower your glutes, do not let them touch the ground.This helps maintain continuous muscle tension.
Perform a powerful contraction of the glutes at the top of the movement to optimize your training.

Errors to avoid: A back arched in high position, which makes the lumbar work work;
Shoulders peelled from the bench, moving the load up of the body;
A rapid movement with rebound, which decreases muscle contraction.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested with the posture of the warrior 3.

How to do Virabhadrasana III?: 1: In a standing position, feet joined, put your hands in front of you in namasté and look in front of you to find a point of concentration.
2: Left the bust forward while you hold a leg behind you.
3: Amenez le buste et la jambe levée sur une même ligne droite, en pointant les orteils du pied levé en arrière
4: Your arms, always tense, will now reach out forward.
5: Look slightly forward to find the balance.
6: Engage the muscles of your thighs and abs.Stretch your body with your fingertips to the raised heel.
7: Hold the posture for 30 seconds.To relax, exhale by gently lowering your foot up to the ground.Lower your arms and put yourself in the mountain laposture.Repeat the posture on the opposite side.

Training advice: If you have trouble finding balance, try to practice this posture with a wall or a chair at a distance from an arm in front of you.Then put your hands on the wall or the chair to support you.
Do not lock the knee of your vertical leg.
Do not place your leg lifted higher than your hips or your head.Try to keep your arms, trunk and leg lifted on the same line.
Your head should be in the axis of your chest and spine, not tilted down or up, which can cause fatigue of your neck.
Focus on stretching, not on uprising!The height of your leg does not matter if your alignment is not correct.Try to maintain an energy and effort balance between the two legs.
Close your eyes during the posture of warrior III will help you focus on your breathing and develop your balance.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the developed declined at the helm.

How to do the developed declined at the: 1: Lie flat on a declined bench, place your hands just outside the shoulder width, and place your feet under the support provided for this purpose.
2: Place your shoulder blades by hugging them and pushing them into the bench.
3: Inhale deeply and peel off the bar.
4: Let the charge stabilize and make sure the upper back remains very firm after reception.Exhale gently.
5: Inspire again and let the bar go down slowly by relaxing the elbows.
6: Lower the bar in a straight line until it is at the sternum and touch your chest.
7: Push the bar in a straight line by pressing the bench and stretching the elbows.
8: Repeat this movement until you have reached the desired number of rehearsals.

Advice for the developed declined at the: Keep the bar in the axis of your wrist and your elbows and make sure it moves in a straight line.In order to keep the wrist straight, try to position the bar as low as possible in the palm while being able to wrap the thumb.
Ideally, call a partner to help you take off the bar to keep the tension in the upper back.
If you want to keep more tension in the triceps and chest, stop each repetition just before locking at the top of the movement.

A camber can be recommended according to your objectives, but make sure that most of the camber comes from the middle or the upper back and not from the lower back.If you have pain in the lower back when you prepare to lift the load, you are not in a position and you may injure yourself.
Make sure that the shoulder blades remain retracted and do not let them change positions while you do the movement.
The fessiers and the shoulder blades must remain in contact with the bench for the duration of the movement.

name: Extension verticale à la pulley basse

image_src_note.caption: Les muscles sollicités aux extensions verticales à la pulley basse.

Comment faire les extensions verticales: 1: Installez la pulley à la hauteur de la taille et attachez une corde. Si votre pulley n’est pas réglable en hauteur, servez-vous de la pulley basse.
2: Enter each end of the rope with a firm socket.
3: Tournez votre corps dans le sens opposé à la pulley et placez vos bras derrière votre tête de façon à ce que vos coudes soient pliés et que vos triceps soient étirés.
4: Keep your elbows as close as possible to your head.
5: Fucked your triceps vigorously until your elbows are in full extension.
6: Go down the rope in a controlled way until you feel a significant stretch in your triceps, then start the movement again.

Training advice: Do not take an overly heavy load which would prevent you from maintaining a stable position of the body.This is an insulation exercise that does not require excessive loads.An overly heavy load can also be dangerous for your elbows.
Keep your arms near your head for a maximum commitment of the triceps.
To vary your training, you can do this exercise with a “V” handle, or unilaterally with a simple rope.

Training advice.caption: This exercise can also be carried out unilaterally with a simple rope.

image_src_note.caption: Muscles used to frontal elevations.

How to make front elevations?: 1: Tenez-vous debout, les pieds écartés à la largeur des épaules. Gardez le dos droit et les pieds à plat sur le sol. Vos bras tenant les dumbbells doivent pendre vers le bas.
2: Mettez les dumbbells horizontalement devant les cuisses, les paumes des mains tournées vers l’arrière. Assurez-vous d’avoir une prise ferme.
3: Hold the abdominal muscles under tension.

4: Inspirez et soulevez les dumbbells vers le haut, les bras tendus vers l’avant et les paumes de mains orientées vers le sol. Gardez les coudes légèrement fléchis pour réduire le stress sur les articulations des coudes. Marquez un temps d’arrêt lorsque les bras sont à peu près à l’horizontale par rapport au sol et profitez-en pour contracter fortement les muscles des épaules.
5: Ramenez les dumbbells à la position de départ au niveau des cuisses avec un mouvement lent et contrôlé tout en expirant.
6: Repeat this movement until you have reached the number of repetitions and desired series.

Advice for front elevations: If this exercise is new to you, train with light weights to properly perform the movement.

Increase the loads to each series, little by little, until the technique deteriorates.In general, when the charge is too heavy to be mastered, the body begins to make back and forth movements to allow loads to mount using the momentum, and not using themuscle contraction.
Your wrists must be in a neutral position, without being folded up or down.If you cannot maintain a neutral position, the weights used are surely too heavy.

name: Hex press at the Smith Machine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with Hex Press at the Smith Machine.

How to do hex press at the Smith Machine: 1: Place a flat bench under the bar in the length of the Smith Machine.
2: Adjust the flat bench or, if you want to target more the top and the middle of the pectorals, regulate it in the inclined position.For the instructions for this exercise, I will use a flat bench.
3: Lie on the bench, your feet firmly tackled on the ground.
4: Place the V -HAPED Under the bar of the Smith Machine.Take there with a neutral socket (hands face to face).
5: Align under the bar so that it happens directly between the pectorals in the low position.
6: Push the bar upwards to unlock it and start slowly going down the load until the V Handle touches your chest.
7: Push the bar up using the pectorals and by losing a maximum contraction of a second at the top.
8: Slowly lower the bar by performing the eccentric movement to your chest.
9: Repeat this movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.
10: To rest the bar, rotate the V in V.

Training advice: First do some rehearsals with a small load to familiarize yourself with the movement.Know that it is not always easy to remove and put the bar back in place;You can ask for help from someone or a training partner.
After lying on the bench, many practitioners tend to spread the elbows on the sides.If your elbows move away from the body, you lose the clamping effect.

Avoid rounding up the epauleset to keep ledosplat against the bench.When you round your shoulders, the latter are more requested to lift the load.To avoid this error, bring the shoulder blades back and down to create a slight camber from the back.This will help you maximize the contraction of your pectorals.
Do not bounce the bar on your chest.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with reverse Rowing under a table.

How to do inverted rowing under a table?: 1: Place yourself under the table, lengthening on your back and placing your body so that the top of your chest is under the edge of the table.

2: Depending on your strength and experience, you can either put your feet flat on the ground with the bent knees (easy version), or tender your legs and place the heels on the ground (difficult version).
3: Raise your arms and grab the edge of the table with a slightly wider socket than the width of Explaces.

4: From the low position, the outstretched arms, go up towards the table, keeping the brought abdominals and the body in a straight line of the heels on the shoulders (knees on the shoulders if you make the variant with the bent knees).
5: Going up, open the chest, keep the body position in a straight line and pull until your chest touches or almost the table.
6: Go down until your arms are almost tense, then repeat the movement until you finish the number of repetitions desired.

Training advice: If you are extremely in a hurry and want to perform an ultra fast training, but complete from the upper body to the house without using free loads, you cannot do better than combine Despompes (horizontal thrusts) and inverted rowing (drawhorizontal).If you simply make 3 series of each exercise, without rest (and a short rest between Lessupersets), you will work all the muscles of the upper body: pectoral, back, shoulders, biceps, tricet, in addition, you will activate the abdominal muscles.Advanced practitioners will be able to increase this number of series to 4 or 5 per exercise.You will still have finished in a few minutes.

For the version with table, make sure that the table is in place on the ground and that it is not likely to slip when you exercise.It goes without saying that you must also make sure that the table is solid (I decline any responsibility in the event of breakage of the table, you are warned).

For the chair version, make sure that the broom handle or the bar are also stable and solid enough to support your weight.If necessary, you can fold a towel on each chair to prevent the broom handle from running on top of the chairs.

You can modify the width of your socket, by choosing a position of the hands that is more comfortable to you, where you feel the most stimulation in the back muscles, or you can change the plug just to vary.The medium and close sockets will tend to make the flexors of the arm work more.If you use a narrow table, you can also sometimes adopt a neutral socket.
If you do the reverse rowing between chairs using a broom handle, you also have the possibility of adopting a pronation or supination.The supination will make your biceps work much more intensely.

Remember that the smaller the angle of your body, the more difficult the exercise will be, because the more horizontal your body, the less your weight rests on your feet and the more you have to lift the weight of your body.This means that if you want to make the exercise more difficult, just put your feet on a chair, a stool, a bench, a box or a balloon (to add a balance of balance).

When you reach the stage where you can make a large number of rehearsals with the tense legs, and if that seems too easy, you can start adding weight.The ideal is to use a weighted.If you don't have one and you don't want to invest in a vest, you can load a backpack and put it on you.

The most difficult technique to practice (only for experienced practitioners) is that which consists in using only one arm at a time.Even the best athletes can have difficulties with this advanced variant, especially with the tense legs (you can do it with the bent knees, the feet on the ground or the tense legs).

If you have access to a bodybuilding room equipped with dumbbells, most people will prefer to make Durowing with dumbbells that it is inverted to an arm, at least if the main objective is to develop muscle mass and strength.But if you don't have dumbbells, you now know how to build your back.

Remember that increasing the number of repetitions is another form of progression, particularly useful for body weight exercises.If you normally make series from 8 to 12 and 12 repetitions are starting to become easy, do not hesitate to increase the number of repetitions of this exercise to 15, 20 or even more, if you can do the same.This is a possibility, rather than going to a more difficult variant or adding load.

Increasing the number of series is also a way of progressing, so if you are used to doing 3 series and you cannot or do not want to make a different variant or add weight, you can simply add a series.You cannot add series eternally, and more series and rehearsals are not always better, but it is still a way of reaching a progressive one.

Training advice.caption: This version with the bent legs reduces body weight and is therefore more accessible for beginners.

name: Unilateral leg curl standing in the machine

How to make the unilateral leg curl stan: 1: Load the machine on each side with a light load to warm up.

4: Tilt your upper body forward and rest your elbows on the tray and grab the handles firmly.This is the starting position.
5: Contractez vos muscles hamstrings afin de remonter le rouleau aussi haut que possible.
6: Perform a powerful contraction in the high position and then go down the load slowly to the starting position.
7: Make the desired number of rehearsals then change legs.

Training advice: Do not put too heavy disc from the start of training, you may hurt yourself.Indeed, the hamstrings are subject to muscle tears when they are cold.

The upper body can be subjected to swinging movements when the load is heavy.Try to limit them as much as possible to reduce this form of counterproductive momentum for the contraction of muscle fibers.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted in crunch on Swiss Ball.

How to do the crunch on Swiss Ball?: 1: Choose a Swiss Ball (stability ball) of a height equivalent to that of your knees and which is very firm.
2: Sit on the ball with your knees folded at a 90-degree angle.
3: Log your feet away by rolling back, so the bottom of your back is supported on the ball.
4: For a balloon crunch, the arms can be crossed above your chest or, for a more difficult exercise, you can reach your arms over your head.
5: Start the movement by initiating your bust first and contracting your abdominal muscles.A voluntary effort is necessary for these muscles to contract.

6: Then, by soliciting the right muscle of the abdomen, bring your shoulders and your chest up towards the ceiling.It is advisable to choose a ceiling point directly above the head to ensure that the neck remains in a neutral position.
7: With mastery, go down your shoulders and chest to touch the ball.Abdominals must remain tight throughout this exercise.

Crunch tips on Swiss Ball: Return your navel to your spine and hold it along the movement in order to keep the transverse of the contracted abdomen.
The interest of this exercise is that it allows you to work with a large amplitude of motion.To maximize the contraction of the muscles, start each repetition by stretching your abs.
Close your eyes during movement will allow you to strengthen your proprioception.
To increase the difficulty as much as possible, you can pose only one leg on the ground, forcing the muscles of your abdominal strap, and in particular the obliques to remain sheathed.

name: 8 hip mobility exercises to increase the amplitude of movements

4: For a balloon crunch, the arms can be crossed above your chest or, for a more difficult exercise, you can reach your arms over your head.

7: With mastery, go down your shoulders and chest to touch the ball.Abdominals must remain tight throughout this exercise.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles used with the lifting of earth with machine.

How to make the earth lifted with machin: 1: Load the machine with the same load on each side.
2: Stand up between the handles of the machine.
3: Go down in the low position, your feet flat, and grab the handles on the sides.
4: Lift the load with the handles by expanding hips and knees until the full extension.
5: Bring back the load by bending the hips backwards while allowing the knees to fold slightly forward, keeping the back straight and the knees pointing in the same direction as the feet.
6: Repeat the movement until the number of repetitions is fixed.

Training advice: Do not go down the hips that are too low like a squat when you place yourself in the low position.The lifting of the earth is above all a movement of hunches bending and the flexion of legs must be as small as possible for maximum efficiency.Indeed, the closer your buttocks, the more your hips are far from the bar, which increases the lever arm.
Keep your back in a neutral position throughout the movement.
Your chest should be raised to help you keep a good posture.
Your arms must be completely tense so as not to generate unnecessary tensions on biceps tendons.
Pull the shoulders back at the top of the movement if they are rounded forward.
As with the lifting earth with bar, do not hyperextension at the end of the movement.
To complete the movement, you can make an upper shoulder upride to solicit the upper trapezoid muscles even more.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles contacted at the Kickback.

How to do the kickback?: 1: To start the exercise, place a knee on the bodybuilding bench.Lean forward and also place your hand on the bench.If your right knee is on the bench, your right hand will be on the bench.
2: Your left foot remains on the ground.Your body naturally bows forward from the hips.Hold your back straight and shealed and keep your head in the extension of your spine.

3: Take a dumbbell in your left hand (assuming your right hand is on the bench).The left arm will be stretched under the shoulder.The palm of the hand should be oriented towards the bodybuilding bench.
4: Raise your left elbow so that it is aligned with your chest (parallel to the ground).The elbow should be folded at 90 degrees.
5: By keeping the elbow in a fixed position, stretch the lower part of the arm with the load.In full extension, you must have the impression that the weight is going to your hip behind you.
6: Keep the set fixed (arm parallel to the ground) and bring the load to the starting position (with a bending of 90 degrees at the elbow).
7: Repeat the movement, keeping the shoulders relaxed and the back straight.

Kickback advice: It is important to keep the elbow high so that the arm remains parallel to the ground.This helps you work against gravity and strengthen triceps.It is common to drop the elbow when the triceps are tired.Try to exercise in front of a mirror so that you can observe the placement of the elbow.If you still have trouble keeping your elbow in high position, reduce the load.

By focusing on the movement of the arm, it is possible to release the position of the back and let the chest are sagging during this exercise.However, it is important to maintain the commitment of the musclesabdomaux and keep your back straight.A strong spine will help you maintain a correct alignment in shoulders and hips.
Keep your head high and your eyes directed forward, it will help you keep your back straight.
Focus on the dumbbell movement with your triceps, keeping control of the load when you lower it slowly to the starting position.

image_src_note.caption: Complete tutorial for rope climbs.

How to climb rope?: 1: The descent once you have finished the rocking, your bust is again perpendicular to the ground (you are practically straightened).You can then press with your leg by making a squat movement.During this phase, to maximize the climb, you can (finally!) Start shooting up with your arms.In order to descend effectively, there are several techniques that can be used.However, here we will discuss the technique that takes up the positioning of the feet we have presented in the locking for the climb.Once you are ready to descend the rope, you must make sure that: you are as straight and perpendicular to the ground as possible.In other words, you must get as close as possible to the rope. Bras must be bent and your hands must grab the rope at the height of the Executive. To initiate the descent, you must release your feet to reduce locking andAllow the rope to slide slowly between your feet. Lightly the rope in your hands to avoid “burning” your skin for friction.
2: You are as straight and perpendicular to the ground as possible.In other words, you need to get as close as possible to the rope.

4: To start the descent, you have to release your feet to reduce the locking and allow the rope to slide slowly between your feet.
5: Lightly drop the rope in your hands to avoid “burning” your skin for friction.

Training advice: The first rule to follow to climb a rope is to come equipped with the right equipment.Let's start with shoes ... It is essential to use shoes designed for functional fitness or crossfit so as not to shive them completely.If you think your running pair will do the trick, you may damage them, starting with the soles of wear.

It is also necessary to protect the rest of your body.When you go up and descend a rope, the risk of burning by friction is very real.It is not uncommon to see people burning the shins, calves and thighs.If you want to protect your skin from your body (not from the rope), make sure you have a protective garment where your body will be in contact with the rope.These can be classic sportswear, long socks or kneeworms to avoid burning with friction.

name: Hyperextension inverted to the Swiss Ball

How to do the reversed hyperextensions t: 1: Put yourself on the Swiss Ball, placing the ball between you and the bench and placing the world's world at the top of the abdominals.Your hips will have to be by the ball.

3: Your legs are released.When you are ready, inspire and raise your legs tense by contracting your glutes, until they are parallel to the ground.
4: Strongly contract your glutes in high position, then slowly return to the starting position by slowly expiring.

Training advice: Contract your glutes to lift your legs until your thighs are aligned with your bust.Your feet will be slightly higher, because you will naturally have a small knee bending when you raise your legs.It is therefore necessary to raise your legs until the knees, hips and shoulders are aligned.
Never mate to get into high position.And never bring your head back when you raise your legs.Keep your head motionless.
This exercise can be carried out without bench, with the ball directly on the ground.However, you will have a less important amplitude of motion.

image_src_note.caption: The muscles asked for the Windmill.

How to do the Windmill?: 1: Standing, feet apart with a width slightly higher than that of the hips, take a dumbbell with your left hand and bring it directly above your head straight.
2: Go down the right arm in front of your right thigh, the palm turned inward.In this position, your arms can look like the two arms of a windmill.

3: Turn the hips to lower the upper body down and on the left side.Your right hand will stay inward while it slides forward in your right leg towards your foot.Keep the left arm motionless and completely stretched above your head.In the lowest position (with the right hand near the right foot), your chest will be tilted to the right, but slightly turned to the left.If the movement is well done, you will feel the weight move to the left hip.
4: Reverse the movement, by raising the body while keeping the spine very straight.Keep the load stable and above the left shoulder.
5: Repeat the movement until you have made the desired number of rehearsals.Then change aside.

Training advice: Use a light dumbbell and perfectly perfect your technique if you have never done this exercise before.
Keep the chest completely straight and do not fold it in order to reach a greater amplitude during the eccentric or descent phase.
Focus on the hip joint and do not bend your knees at all during the movement.
Your gaze (and therefore your head) must constantly follow the dumbbell.
To increase the difficulty, try to do the Windmill with Kettlebell.
It is possible to do this exercise without weight if you have fragile, not very muscular shoulders or if you have an injury.

name: Rowing in pronation sitting at the Technogym machine

image_src_note.caption: The muscles requested in rowing in pronation sitting in the machine.

How to rowing in the machine pronation: 1: Choose the load with which you want to work.
2: Adjust the seat height so as to place your chest on the chest cushion.Your feet must reach the footrests, your hands must reach the handles and the cushion must support your chest.
3: Enter the handles taken in pronation (palms of the hands down), keep your back straight, look forward and put your muscles under tension.
4: Exhale and pull the handles towards you, making sure to tighten your shoulder blades as much as you fold as you fold your elbows.
5: Perform a maximum contraction at the end of the movement.
6: Return slowly to the starting position by inspiring and stopping just before the weights are based on their supports.
7: Continue the following rehearsals until you finish your series.

Training advice: Rowing seated in the machine lends itself well to unilateral work which generally allows a more important work amplitude.
If your socket is limiting after a few series, do not hesitate to use bodybuilding disangles;But do not use them from the start of your training to work on your catch.
A common error is to work with a partial amplitude.In theory, you must go from the stretched arm position with a very slight flexion, to the position where your elbows are behind your shoulders.
